description:
It was a time when pirates ruled the seas. Several bands of pirates were battling over the great hidden treasure, One Piece, which was left by the now legendary pirate captain, Gold Roger. There was a young boy who admired the pirates, his name was http://anidb.net/ch474 [Monkey D. Luffy]. One day, he mistakenly eats the devil`s fruit and turns himself into a rubber human being.
Ten years have passed since that incident. Luffy sets out to sail all alone. He sets out to become a great pirate captain and that`s when his great adventure begins. "I`m going to be the Pirate King! I`m going to get One Piece!".

REGULAR.description:

Source: crunchyroll

The Straw Hats stop for supplies at a harbor town plagued by a mayor who taxes anything and everything. Over lunch, Luffy and Nico befriend a kooky scientist who`s obsessed with the Rainbow Mist.

The showdown with Mayor Wetton builds towards an explosive finale as the Straw Hats scramble to escape the Rainbow Mist - or be trapped inside forever.

REGULAR.description:
Nico`s handy work unearths a solitary dreamer who may know the way to Sky Island. All Luffy and his crew have to do is survive the sonic onslaught of simian salvagers seeking to sink the Going Merry!

titles.title: Capitano Orangutan

Luffy and his mates reach the home of Mont Blanc Cricket: the man with the key to reaching Sky Island. There`s just one tiny problem - he comes from a long line of legendary liars.

REGULAR.description:
Montblanc Cricket agrees to help the Straw Hats reach Sky Island, but first they must venture deep into the darkest depths of a spider-infested forest to capture a mysterious bird with a keen sense of direction.

titles.title: Cap sur les nuages ! À la recherche du South Bird
Kumo Kaji Ippai! Southbird o Oe!

REGULAR.description:
While the Straw Hats battle creepy-crawly forest creatures on their quest to capture a South Bird, Mont Blanc and his monkey minions are brutally attacked by the Bellamy Pirates!

titles.title: Dreams Don`t Come True?! Bellamy vs. the Saruyama Alliance!
Les rêves ne se réalisent pas ? Bellamy contre les Forces Spéciales Simiesques

REGULAR.description:
Luffy turned the other cheek during his first encounter with Bellamy, but now he`s out to settle the score for old man Mont Blanc. Meanwhile, a fearsome pirate crew takes aim at the Straw Hats, eager to earn a bad reputation!

titles.title: 100 Million Man! World`s Greatest Power and Pirate Black Beard!

Thanks to some modifications to the Going Merry, the Straw Hats are on their way to that island in the sky! But with the Blackbeard Pirates in hot pursuit, navigating the vertical currents will be anything but easy.

REGULAR.description:
Reaching the sea of clouds proves easier than surviving in it when giant sea creatures attack the Going Merry, Usopp nearly drowns in a cloud, and a strange sky knight issues the Straw Hats a warning!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il mare in mezzo al cielo e il paradiso

After hitching a ride on a speedy shrimp, the Straw Hats reach the land of Skypiea! The intrepid pirates have much to learn about their new surroundings, but a beautiful angel makes a perfect tour guide.

titles.title: Godland, Skypiea! Angels on a Beach of Clouds!

REGULAR.description:
Nami`s eagerness to explore the forbidden realm of Upper Yard brings her face to face with the wrath of god, and the Straw Hats incur Heaven`s Judgment for failing to pay their immigration fees!

titles.title: Il mistero dell`Upper Yard

The Straw Hats are no strangers to living on the wrong side of the law, but unpaid immigration fees and Nami`s assault of a White Beret earns Luffy`s crew a sentence of death by cloud drifting!

titles.title: Already Criminals?! Skypiea`s Upholder of the Law!

Nami, Zoro, Chopper, and Robin are trapped aboard the Going Merry when it`s commandeered by a monstrous lobster! To rescue his crew, Luffy must venture onto the sacred grounds of Upper Yard!

titles.title: Dasshutsu Naru ka!? Ugokihajimeta Kami no Shiren!

Zoro dukes it out with a hungry Skyshark in the shadow of the Sacrificial Alter. On the other side of Upper Yard, Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp try to survive their visit to an island that wants them dead!

Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp tangle with Satori and his exploding, snake-filled Surprise Clouds. The sky priest may look like a dancing dango, but the impact of his mantra leaves the pirates bloodied and boatless.

Usopp and Sanji try to regain control of the Crow, and Luffy stirs up a brutal barrage of bursting balls when he attacks Satori. Meanwhile, Chopper whistles for the Sky Knight to avoid becoming a sacrificial reindeer!

titles.title: "Tama no Shiren" no Kyoui! Mayoi no Mori no Shitou

When Gan Fall is badly burned during his battle with Shura, Chopper musters the courage for a death-defying leap of faith. Elsewhere, Luffy may have finally discovered a way to defeat Satori!

titles.title: Makafushigi! Himo no Shiren to Koi no Shiren!?

REGULAR.description:
The Shandorians prepare for an all-out attack on their priestly adversaries, Chopper meets the mysterious creatures that saved his life, and Nami makes an astonishing discovery about the origins of Upper Yard.

While the Shandorians continue their battle for control of Upper Yard, the Straw Hats celebrate their happy reunion by swapping stories over a campfire and feasting on barbequed Skyshark!

Jaya, la Cité d`Or dans le ciel ! Objectif : le sanctuaire divin !

The electrifying deity of Skypiea, God Eneru, grants his priests unlimited power in their hunt for the Straw Hats. Usopp has a plan to get the mysteriously-repaired Going Merry back in the water, but it involves using Chopper as bait!

titles.title: Enter God Eneru! Farewell to the Survivors!

The Straw Hats scatter when their search for gold uncovers a giant python, and Gan Fall reveals the tragic story of Jaya`s arrival in the sky. Meanwhile, Wyper readies the Shandorians for a raid on Eneru`s shrine!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Giant Snake Bares Its Fangs! The Survival Game Begins!
Kibamuku Uwabami! Tsui ni Hajimaru Survival Game

REGULAR.description:
As the heartless god of Upper Yard eagerly anticipates the dawning of Sky Warefare, the Shandorian forces are savagely snared by the Ordeal of String, and Luffy wanders into the fight of his life!

titles.title: Eneru all`attacco!

Zoro rushes to perfect a deadly technique known as the Flying Blade Attack. The move proves difficult to master, but it could be the key to the swordsman surviving a battle with the Shandorian warrior, Braham.

titles.title: Duel aérien acharné ! Zoro le pirate face au guerrier Braham

Fierce Midair Battle! Pirate Zoro vs. Warrior Braham!

REGULAR.description:
Sanji and Usopp are driven to their knees by the electrifying presence of god, Luffy is nearly incinerated by Wyper`s Burn Bazooka, and Nami joins Gan Fall in a fight against two killer clones!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le hurlement du Burn Bazooka ! Luffy le pirate face à Wiper, le démon furieux

REGULAR.description:
Chopper unleashes the fury of his Rumble Ball during a sticky slugfest with a swap cloud spewing priest of Upper Yard. Can the little reindeer discover his opponent`s lone weakness before it`s too late?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`Ordalie des marais. Chopper, le pirate, contre Gédatsu le prélat
La prova della palude!
Numa no Shiren! Chopper VS Shinkan Gedatsu!!

Испытание болотом! Чоппер против жреца Гедацу!

REGULAR.description:
Nami and the Knight of the Sky team up to obliterate two bumbling, balloon-shaped bad guys, and God Eneru relies on his astounding invincibility to torment a noble Shandorian warrior.

titles.title: L`imbattibile superiorità di Eneru

Robin`s search for a mystical city of gold is interrupted by Yama, one of Eneru`s faithful servants. When the rampaging warrior destroys some ancient ruins, he provokes the wrath of Robin`s many fists of fury!

titles.title: Ikari no Jet Pistol: Luffy vs Kurohige

REGULAR.description:
Ace is to be executed in a matter of hours, and Magellan`s toxic breath is singeing the back of Luffy`s neck. Ivan uses a devastating Death Wink to buy some time, but the warden`s Poison Hydra may be more than he can handle!

Luffy dons a suit of waxy armor in preparation for his rematch with Warden Magellan. Outside the prison walls, Jimbei turns a door into a boat, so Crocodile and Buggy can commandeer an escape vessel!

Magellan takes his toxic attack to the next level by unleashing the hideous and deadly Venom Demon! If Jimbei and Crocodile don`t return with a rescue ship soon, Luffy won`t survive long enough to save Ace!

Luffy and his merry band of escapees are safely onboard the rescue ship, but they`re not out hot water just yet. A fleet of marines is bombarding them with cannon balls, and an impenetrable gate looms on the horizon!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Ivan mourn the loss of Bon Clay, and Captain Buggy`s reputation gets a boost when a phone call from the Marines reveals the secrets of his past.

Sanji tries to fight his way off a most peculiar island, but his frilly battle costume threatens to awaken his inner maiden. Elsewhere, Chopper tries to avoid being served in a hot pot!

Nico Robin lends her many hands to an overmatched gang of revolutionaries in a frigid land of eternal suffering, and Usopp bulks up to avoid becoming a snack for a hungry, hungry island!

Zoro`s attempt to reunite with his friends leads him a massive tomb and a host of shadowy swordsmen. Elsewhere, Brook uses his status as Satan to get an eyeful of undergarments!

While the marines prepare for Ace`s execution, Luffy looks back on all the good times he shared with his brother, and Jimbei reveals the shocking details of the day Fire Fist Ace went down in defeat!

Luffy and his gang continue on their way to Marineford, but once he arrives, the rubber-man must defeat both Navy Admirals and Warlords of the Sea before he can save Ace!

Citizens and soldiers alike prepare for all-out war as Ace is led to the site of his execution. While the world watches, the true identity of the condemned man`s father is shockingly revealed!

Flashbacks reveal the agonizing sacrifice made by Ace`s mother in order save his life - and the secret behind his connection to Luffy. Back in the present, Whitebeard makes a unexpected entrance!

As a massive seaquake rocks Marineford, Ace recalls the ups and downs of his life as a pirate, including his first encounter with Whitebeard - and the unthinkable betrayal that led to his capture!

Whitebeard begins his attack with a tsunami-spawning sea quake, but the marines counter with a blast of frigid air that turns the tidal wave into an iceberg! Will Luffy and his crew arrive in time to join the battle?

A towering giant of a giant known as Little Oars Jr. carves a path of death and destruction as he fights to save Ace. The monstrous mauler is within arm`s reach of his friend when he`s intercepted by the seven warlords of the sea!

In the wake of Little Oars Junior`s tragic defeat, Admiral Sengoku hatches a devious plan to speed up the countdown to Ace`s execution. The situation looks beyond bleak until a hero enters the fray from on high!

Luffy appears on the field of battle with a ferocious sense of urgency. Ace could be executed at any minute, and the rubber-man`s refusal to back down impresses even the most feared men in all the world!

Luffy leaps into action, attacking the Naval forces with a frantic display of brutality. Meanwhile, Ace watches in horror as an army of zombies rises up to attack his brother!

Luffy and his pirate brethren have their hands full with an ominous army of unbeatable Kumas! While the inhuman minions march onward, Whitebeard encounters a former ally!

Whitebeard shrugs off his injuries and leads a ferocious charge into the heart of the enemy`s defenses, but three deadly Admirals join forces to silence his shock wave attack as the pirates find themselves surrounded by impenetrable walls!

REGULAR.description:
With the ice melting beneath his feet, Luffy begins a desperate final charge towards his soon-to-be-executed brother. Should his rescue attempt fail, death will surely embrace them both!

Crocodile`s unexpected assistance creates an opening for Luffy to advance, and Whitebeard has a surprise lurking beneath the ice that might swing the momentum in favor of the pirates!

The battle rages on and the bodies pile up as Whitebeard squares off against an Admiral, Luffy gets knocked cold, and the legendary Vice-Admiral Garp finally enters the fray!

While awaiting his execution, Ace flashes back to a trouble youth spent seeking the truth about his father. Meanwhile, Luffy begs Ivan for a potentially-deadly treatment that will allow him to continue fighting!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy makes short work of face from his past, and Whitebeard struggles to withstand the full force of the Marine onslaught. With the executioner`s swords hovering above Ace`s head, Straw Hat Luffy discovers a new ability!

Whitebeard orders his men to help Luffy clear a path to the execution scaffold, but someone close to the Rubber-man rises up to derail the rescue mission at the last second!

Luffy must defeat the man who taught him how to fight - his own grandfather - in order to save Ace. Battling his own flesh and blood won`t be easy, but a waxy ally is there to provide back up!

Un pouvoir détonant. Gladius explose tout !
Лопающийся человек. Мощные взрывы Гладиуса
الإنسان المتفجر! انفجار غلاديوس الكبير
破裂[パンク]人間 グラディウス大爆発!

REGULAR.description:
With the Tontattas beaten, Robin turned into a toy, and Luffy, Franky, and the others all busy elsewhere, Usopp is the last hope for Operation SOP! But will he be able to muster the confidence and courage to face the terrible Trebol? Among the cries of the Tontattas, Usopp has a difficult decision to make - run and fight another day or face his own doom and challenge Trebol!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Liar! Usoland on the Run!
Menteur, menteur. Usoland se débine !
Usotsuki Usoland Tousouchuu!
Врун! Усоланд убегает!
كاذب! أوسولاند الهارب!
ウソつきウソランド逃走中!

REGULAR.description:
The deep and tragic story of Kyros is revealed! The legend of this invincible gladiator is tied up with the royal family of Dressrosa! Meanwhile, Trebol`s defeat at the hands of Usopp is not a sure thing yet!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Fateful Encounter! Kyros and King Riku!
Une rencontre historique. Kyros et le roi Riku !
Unmei no Deai: Kyros to Riku Ou
Судьбоносная встреча. Кирос и Король Рику
لقاء مقدّر! كيروس والملك ريكو
運命の出会い キュロスとリク王

REGULAR.description:
In the Royal Palace, Viola, Luffy, and the Toy Soldier have hidden themselves outside Doflamingo`s chamber, only to have more enemies approach from behind, leaving them surrounded! Meanwhile, Franky is knocked out cold by the Navy, and all hopes rest on Usopp to provide the miracle everyone needs!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sakusen Shippai! Eiyuu Usoland Shisu!?
The Operation Failed! Usoland the Hero Dies?!
Échec total. Usoland mordra-t-il la poussière ?
Операция провалена. Герой Усоланд погиб?!
فشلت الخطّة؟! موت البطل أوسولاند؟
作戦失敗! 英雄ウソランド死す!?

REGULAR.description:
Usopp manages to knock Sugar out and Operation SOP is accomplished! The toys in Dressrosa start turning back to their original forms and the people are slowly realizing who Doflamingo really is! In the meantime, the legendary hero Kyros reverts to his true form - and this mighty champion of the Colosseum has a score to settle!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu Fukkatsu! Kyros Konshin no Ichigeki
La légende renaît. Kyros s’élance à corps perdu
The Legend Is Back! Kyros` All-out Blow!
Легенда возвращается. Решительная атака Кироса
عودة الأسطورة! ضربة كيروس بكامل قوّته!
伝説復活! キュロス渾身の一撃

REGULAR.description:
Kyros finally taking down Doflamingo leaves Doflamingo’s clan shocked! Meanwhile at the Colosseum, Rebecca gets her memories of her loving father Kyros back, and Sabo makes a move to end the championship battle by blowing up the whole ring! Will he be able to snag the Flare-Flare Fruit?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaken Sakuretsu! Fukkatsu Meramera no Mi no Chikara
L’explosion du poing ardent. Le pouvoir du Pyro-fruit est de retour !
The Fire Fist Strikes! The Flare-Flare Fruit Power Returns!
Взрыв Огненного Кулака. Сила возрожденного фрукта Мера-Мера
انطلاق قبضة النار! عودة قوّة فاكهة اللّهب!
火拳炸裂! 復活メラメラの実の力

REGULAR.description:
Luffy hurries to free Law, but with their pirate alliance dissolved, will Law still see Luffy as an ally? Meanwhile, Usopp has convinced his new-found followers to destroy the factory! Doflamingo`s defeat has thrown Dressrosa into chaos, but the Young Master may have a trick left up his sleeve...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dashing onto the Scene! The Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army, Sabo!
Sassou Toujou: Kakumeigun Sanbou Souchou Sabo!
Une arrivée fracassante. Sabo l’officier Révolutionnaire !
Сорвиголова. Начальник штаба Революционной армии, Сабо
اندفاع نحو الحدث! رئيس أركان الجيش الثوري، سابو!
颯爽登場 革命軍参謀総長サボ!

REGULAR.description:
The mystery of Doflamingo`s return from the dead is revealed! But there isn`t much time to ponder how it happened, as his plan to silence the country of Dressrosa unfolds, spelling doom for the Straw Hats!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akuma no Wana: Dressrosa Senmetsu Sakusen
The Devil`s Trap! A Dressrosa Extermination Plan!
Une piège démoniaque. Bain de sang à Dressrosa !
В ловушке дьявольского фрукта. План уничтожения Дресс Роуз
فخّ الشّيطان! خطّة إبادة دريسروزا!
悪魔の罠 ドレスローザ殲滅作戦

REGULAR.description:
As the people of Dressrosa see their friends and loved ones slaughter each other under the manipulation of Doflamingo, memories of 10 years ago rush back, and the truth of that event becomes clear. Doflamingo announces the rules for his deadly game - targeting Luffy, King Riku, and Law, but with the highest bounty reserved for Usopp!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Go-oku no Otoko: Nerawareta Usoland!
L’Homme qui valait 500 millions. Usoland dans le collimateur !
The 500 Million Berry Men! Target: Usoland!
Награда - 500 миллионов белли. Цель - Усоланд
الرّجل صاحب مكافأة 500 مليون بيري! الهدف: أوسولاند!
五億の男 狙われたウソランド!

REGULAR.description:
Doflamingo and Fujitora`s agreement to not engage each other lasts for the moment - meaning all eyes are turned towards taking down the Straw Hats and claiming the rewards! And as Luffy starts heading to the Royal Palace along with Zoro and Law, Fujitora stands in his way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Breaking Through Enemy Lines! Luffy and Zoro Launch the Counter-Attack!
Brisez les lignes ennemies. Luffy et Zoro contre-attaquent !
Tekijin Toppa: Luffy Zoro Hangeki Kaishi
Прорыв сквозь вражескую линию. Контратака Луффи и Зоро начинается
اجتياز خطوط العدوّ! يشنّ لوفي وزورو هجومًا مضادًّا!
敵陣突破 ルフィ・ゾロ反撃開始

REGULAR.description:
Robin, Usopp, the Tontatta`s and the others make moves to rejoin Luffy as Doflamingo`s deadly game rages on! Meanwhile, Kin`emon makes it to the trash heap in his search for his friend Kanjuro - just as Pica emerges in the town and changes the stakes of the game!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daichi Meidou: Hakai Kami Kyoudai Pica Kourin
La Terre et le Ciel ébranlés. Pica le géant destructeur !
With a Rumbling of the Ground! The God of Destruction - Giant Pica Descends!
Сотрясая землю. Появление Пики - гигантского Бога-разрушителя
بزمجرة من الأرض! إله الدّمار، ينزل بيكا العملاق!
大地鳴動 破壊神巨大ピーカ降臨

REGULAR.description:
With Luffy and the others recovering from Pica`s attack, the game is afoot! Luffy has just enough time to regroup and set out to find Doflamingo, only to find that the dastardly Warlord has more enemies than he might realize! A strange argument breaks out - to decide who gets to take down Doflamingo once and for all!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daishuuketsu! Luffy to Kyouaku Senshi Gundan
Gathering into a Powerful Front! Luffy and a Group of Brutal Warriors!
Tout le monde sur le pont. Luffy et les affreux !
Объединившись в могучий отряд. Луффи и группа брутальных воинов
الاجتماع في طليعة قويّة! لوفي ومجموعة من المحاربين الغاشمين!
大集結! ルフィと凶悪戦士軍団

REGULAR.description:
Don Chin Jao and Elizabello successfully break Pica’s giant arm but the rock giant is unfazed and starts throwing even more destructive punches at Luffy and his band of unwanted collaborators! Meanwhile, Navy Admiral Fujitora moves into action, summoning all the Navy soldiers on the island!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaishingeki! Luffy Gundan vs Pica!
L’assaut est lancé ! L’armée de Luffy contre Pica !
Steady Progress! Luffy`s Army vs. Pica!
Интенсивное наступление. Армия Луффи против Пики
تقدّم ثابت! جيش لوفي ضدّ بيكا!
快進撃! ルフィ軍団VSピーカ!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Moocy fast approach the showdown with Doflamingo - while the others with a beef against him continue to tag along. Meanwhile, Violet finds the key to Law`s handcuffs, and Rebecca pledges to deliver it to him. Finally, Law`s reason for despising Doflamingo is revealed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shocking Confession! Law`s Soulful Vow!
Shougeki Kokuhaku! Law Atsuki Tamashii no Chikai!
Un aveu déconcertant. Le serment exalté de Law !
Шокирующее признание. Эмоциональное обещание Ло
اعتراف صادم! نذر لو الرّوحيّ!
衝撃告白! ロー熱き魂の誓い!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy makes headway toward Doflamingo`s refuge, making his way through Doflamingo`s guards, while down below Admiral Fujitora faces off against Sabo, who has the power of the Fire Fist from eating the Flare-Flare Fruit! But with Fujitora`s ability to call down a meteor, will Sabo have to power to save himself?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Big Collision! Chief of Staff - Sabo vs. Admiral Fujitora!
Daigekitotsu! Sanbou Souchou Sabo vs Taishou Fujitora
Un duel de choc. Sabo le chef d`État-Major contre l`Amiral Fujitora !
Грандиозное столкновение. Начальник штаба Сабо против адмирала Фуджиторы
اصطدام كبير! رئيس الأركان سابو ضدّ الأميرال فوجيتورا!
大激突! 参謀総長サボVS大将藤虎

REGULAR.description:
Luffy cuts a lucky break as Kelly Funk shows him a shortcut to the Palace! But all may not be as it seems... Meanwhile, Franky and Zoro are locked in one-on-one duels, while Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo enlist the help of the Tontattas to catch up with Luffy and Law!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Gets Caught in a Trap!
Situation désespérée. Luffy est pris au piège !
Zettaizetsumei: Wana ni Kakatta Luffy!
Отчаянная ситуация. Луффи в ловушке
وضع يائس! يقع لوفي في فخّ!
絶体絶命 罠にかかったルフィ!

REGULAR.description:
Penned in at the bottom of a well, Luffy and Law are caught in a trap! But someone has come to save them who they least expect! Meanwhile, the Tontattas help Franky break in to the SMILE factory, and Bartolomeo resorts to tactics he used in the Colosseum to defend himself and protect Robin and Rebecca!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Escape! Luffy`s Tide-Turning Elephant Gun!
Daidasshutsu! Luffy Kishikaisei no Elephant Gun
Une grande évasion ! L`Eléphant Gun de Luffy qui fait tourner la roue
Великий побег. Слонобой Луффи пробивает путь наружу
هروب عظيم! مسدّس فيل لوفي الّذي يقلب الموازين!
大脱出! ルフィ起死回生の象銃[エレファントガン]

REGULAR.description:
The Tontattas locate their captive comrades and seem to be able to get the message to them - the prison break is on! Meanwhile, heavy-hitters from the Colosseum turn from wringing each other`s necks towards a unified plan, which might just be enough to get Luffy the chance to make it to a final showdown with Doflamingo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A United Front! Luffy`s Breakthrough to the Victory!
Kyoudousensen: Luffy Shouri e no Toppakou
Un front uni. La percée de Luffy vers la victoire
Единым фронтом. Луффи прорывается к победе
جبهة موحّدة! يشقّ لوفي الطّريق إلى النّصر!
共同戦線 ルフィ勝利への突破口

REGULAR.description:
Hidden far underground, Kin`emon finds his old friend Kanjuro, whose powers allow the two to, quickly, but not elegantly, escape to the surface! Meanwhile, Cavendish shares his fears that the "Birdcage" game Doflamingo is playing has been rigged all along - and that the only way to win is to take the Warlord down!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Futarime no Samurai: Yuudachi Kanjuurou Toujou
Le second samouraï. Kanjuro la Douche du Soir apparaît
The Second Samurai! Evening Shower Kanjuro Appears!
Второй самурай. Ливень Канджуро
السّاموراي الثّاني! ظهور وابل المساء كانجورو!
二人目の侍 夕立ちカン十郎登場

REGULAR.description:
The Tontattas are in full revolt! But can they keep their wits about them long enough to make it out? Meanwhile, Zoro finally gains the upper hand against Pica, and Franky finds a way to deal with Señor Pink.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hard-Fought Battle Against Pica! Zoro`s Deadly Attack!
Funtou to no Pica: Zoro Ichi Todome no Ichigeki
Un combat acharné contre Pica. L`attaque mortelle de Zoro !
Сражение с Пикой. Коронная техника Зоро
قتال صعب ضدّ بيكا! هجوم زورو القاتل!
奮闘とのピーカ ゾロ一とどめの一撃

REGULAR.description:
Franky finally makes it into the factory and the Tontattas are reunited with their captive friends! But Princess Mansherry is nowhere to be found. Factory manager Kuween becomes irate when ignored and launches an attack on Franky while Señor Pink, wise to Frankie`s deception, arrives on the scene ready for a manly showdown!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kobito no Hime: Toraware no Mansherry
La princesse des Nains. Mancherie prisonnière
The Little People`s Princess! Captive Mansherry!
Принцесса лилипутов. Пленница Маншери
أميرة الأقزام! مانشيري الأسيرة!
小人の姫 囚われたのマンシェリー

REGULAR.description:
Robin, Rebecca, and Bartolomeo draw closer to the Flower Field on the fourth level of the Royal Palace plateau, but a sudden attack by Gladius exploding spheres sends Robin and Bartolomeo hurtling towards the level below - and directly into Luffy and the others` battle with the creepy Headcracker Dolls!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fujimi! Kyoufu no Atamawari Ningyou Gundan
Invincible ! La terrible armée de poupées casses-têtes
Invincible! A Gruesome Army of Headcracker Dolls!
Неуязвимые. Жуткая армия щелкунчиков
منيعة! جيش الدّمى كاسرة الرّؤوس المرعب!
不死身! 恐怖の頭割り人形軍団

REGULAR.description:
Rebecca makes it to the Flower Field alone, but unfortunately finds company there that is less than friendly! Meanwhile, Bartolomeo pushes himself to the limit in order to help Luffy advance, but does he leave himself vulnerable in the process? Meanwhile, Sabo tastes Fujitora`s full might!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Au péril de leur vie ! Luffy est l`atout pour la victoire
Inochi Kakete! Luffy wa Shouri no Kirifuda
Risking Their Lives! Luffy Is the Trump Card for Victory!
Рискуя жизнью. Луффи - наш победный козырь
مخاطرون بحياتهم! لوفي هو الورقة الرّابحة للظّفر بالنّصر!
命かけて! ルフィは勝利の切り札

REGULAR.description:
Diamante has Rebecca pinned and completely overpowered. If only the Soldier-san of her youth were able to protect her! Meanwhile, Luffy and Law finally surmount incredible odds to land themselves in striking distance of Doflamingo -- but Sugar stands in their way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Tearful Reunion! Rebecca and Kyros!
D`émouvantes retrouvailles. Rebecca et Kyros !
Namida no Saikai: Rebecca to Kyros
Трогательная встреча. Ребекка и Кирос
لمّ شمل مؤثّر! ريبيكّا وكيوروس!
涙の再会 レベッカとキュロス

REGULAR.description:
Usopp uses Viola`s Clairvoyance to prepare his ammunition to take Sugar out! But the slightest hesitation now will spell disaster -- and the end of Luffy! Luckily for the Straw Hats, Usopp`s ammunition has been specially designed for this specific situation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ichigeki Hissatsu: Dressrosa o Sukuu Otoko
One Shot One Kill! The Man Who Will Save Dressrosa!
Un coup mortel. L`homme qui sauva Dressrosa
Мастерский выстрел! Человек, который спасет Дресс Роуз
ضربة بقتلة! الرّجل الّذي سيُنقذ دريسروزا!
一撃必殺 ドレスローザを救う男

REGULAR.description:
The final showdown with Doflamingo begins, but the Warlord still has several tricks up his sleeve - including turning one of Luffy`s own friends against him! Meanwhile Franky and Señor Pink are in a standoff to find out who is the coolest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anger Erupts! Luffy and Law`s Ultimate Stratagem!
Ikari Bakuhatsu: Luffy Law Saikyou no Hisaku
La colère explose. Luffy et Law, l`ultime stratagème
Дать волю гневу. Секретная тактика Луффи и Ло
انفجار الغضب! حيلة لوفي ولو المطلقة!
怒り爆発 ルフィ・ロー最強の秘策

REGULAR.description:
All hopes rest on Luffy and Law being able to take down Doflamingo; but the Warlord has other plans in mind as he gives the two the fight of their lives, and reveals his true, shocking history! Meanwhile, Sabo finds out Fujitora’s true intention…
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Noble Family! The True Identity of Doflamingo!
Kedakaki Ichizoku! Doflamingo no Shoutai!
Une famille noble. La véritable identité de Doflamingo !
Благородная Семья! Настоящая личина Дофламинго!
عائلة نبيلة! هويّة دوفلامينغو الحقيقيّة!
気高き一族 ドフラミンゴの正体!

REGULAR.description:
With Fujitora`s stalemate arousing suspicion in the Navy ranks, Law and Luffy stand seconds away from execution at the hand of Doflamingo! But before he dispatches them both, he shares the secret of his sway over the Celestial Dragons!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die ultimative Kraft – Das Geheimnis der Operations-Frucht!
Kyuukyoku no Chikara: Op-Op no Jitsu no Himitsu!
Le pouvoir ultime. Le véritable secret du Ope Ope no Mi !
The Ultimate Power! The Secret of the Op-Op Fruit!
Апогей силы. Тайна фрукта Опе-Опе
القوّة المطلقة! سرّ فاكهة العمليّات
究極の力 オペオペの実の秘密!

REGULAR.description:
The horrible secret of Flevance, the White Town, is revealed, giving clues to Law`s traumatic past! A rage born from the lies of the World Government created a child who had the will to kill Corazon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanashiki Kioku: Shiroi Machi no Shounen Law!
Sad Memories! Law the Boy from the White Town!
Traurige Erinnerungen – Law, der Junge aus der weißen Stadt!
Tristes souvenirs. Law, le gamin de la Ville Blanche !
Печальные воспоминания. Ло - мальчик из Белого города
ذكريات محزنة! لو الصّبيّ من البلدة البيضاء!
悲しき記憶 白い町の少年ロー!

REGULAR.description:
Law`s attack on Corazon looks less successful than he thought! And after he`s accepted into the Doflamingo Family, Corazon`s mysterious silence hides a fact that may save Law`s life - and a hidden danger Law must face in Doflamingo himself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Celestial Dragon! Doffy`s Stormy Past!
Die Weltaristokraten! – Defis stürmische Vergangenheit
Tenryuubito! Doffy no Souzetsu Naru Kako
Un tenryûbito ! Le passé tumultueux de Doffy
Теньрьюбито. Бурное прошлое Доффи
تنّين سماويّ! ماضي دوفي العاصف!
天竜人! ドフィの壮絶なる過去

REGULAR.description:
Things grow stranger for Law as he learns the secret behind why Corazon feigns being mute! But the mysterious Corazon`s actions are only beginning to baffle Law as he takes him on a journey to cure his White Lead Disease.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Rocky Road! Law and Corazon`s Journey of Life!
Ein steiniger Weg! – Laws und Corazóns Reise ums Überleben!
Kunan no Michi: Law to Corazon Inochi no Tabi
Un chemin ardu. Le périple de Law et Corazon
Трудный путь! Жизненное путешествие Ло и Коразона
طريق وعر! رحلة حياة لو وكورازون!
苦難の道 ローとコラソン命の旅

REGULAR.description:
Corazon`s double-dealing with the Navy raises suspicions both with Doflamingo and Law. But all that is secondary as Corazon finally has a chance to grab the Op-Op Fruit during a staged handoff arranged by the Government.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Zeit läuft ab! – Holt euch die Operations-Frucht!
Le compte à rebours est lancé ! S`emparer du Ope Ope no Mi !
The Time Is Ticking Down! Seize the Op-Op Fruit!
Toki Sameru! Op-Op no Mi o Ubae!
Гонка со временем. Стащить фрукт Опе-Опе
الوقت ينفد! احصل على فاكهة العمليّات!
時迫る! オペオペの実を奪え!

REGULAR.description:
The Op-Op Fruit is in Corazon`s hands! But the price he paid to get it might be too high... When Law goes for help, unfortunate coincidences intervene and leave the two vulnerable! Meanwhile, Doflamingo and his clan finally land at Minion Island; the location of Corazon and Law!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Moment der Entscheidung – Corazóns Abschied!
Kakugo no Toki: Corazon Wakare no Egao!
L`instant de résolution. Le sourire d`adieu de Corazon !
The Moment of Resolution! Corazon`s Farewell Smile!
В момент решимости. Прощальная улыбка Коразона
لحظة الحزم! ابتسامة وداع كورازون!
覚悟の時 コラソン別れの笑顔!

REGULAR.description:
Doflamingo and his Family begin to zero in on Corazon and Law`s whereabouts, but Corazon has a plan to hide Law long enough to let him escape - even if that means sacrificing his own life. However, when things turn sour, it`s a chain of lucky coincidences that allows the plan to be set into motion - almost as though someone or something is keeping Law alive!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Advance, Law! The Kindhearted Man`s Final Fight!
Va de l`avant Law. Le combat final d`un homme bienveillant !
Vorwärts, Law – Der letzte Kampf eines fürsorglichen Mannes!
Yuke Law: Yasashiki Otoko Saigo no Tatakai!
Уходи, Ло. Последняя битва добросердечного человека
تقدّم يا لو! معركة الرّجل الطّيّب الأخيرة!
行けロー 優しき男最期の戦い!

REGULAR.description:
Violet runs down the status of the open battles raging in Dressrosa - the Straw Hats, the Tontattas, the executives of the Doflamingo Family - all of them clash around the island, but it`s Law`s revelation to Doflamingo that moves the action forward!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Für die Freiheit! – Laws Injection Shot trifft ins Schwarze
Jiyuu e! Law Injection Shot Sakuretsu
Pour la liberté ! Law délivre un Injection Shot
To Be Free! Law`s Injection Shot Blasts!
За свободу! Техника Ло: Внутренняя Инъекция!
من أجل الحرّيّة! طلقات حُقن لو المتفجّرة!
自由へ! ロー注射[インジェクション]ショット炸裂

REGULAR.description:
Luffy continues to battle Fake-mingo, but keeps accidentally battling Bellamy instead. Meanwhile the tide of battle turns against Law as painful scars from the past resurface. And Zoro gets unexpected help in his battle with Pica.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Intense Battle! Law vs. Doflamingo!
Atsuki Tatakai: Law vs Doflamingo
Eine intensive Schlacht – Law vs. De Flamingo
Un combat intense. Law vs. Doflamingo
Напряженная битва. Ло против Дофламинго
معركة شديدة! لو ضدّ دوفلامينغو!
熱き闘い ローVSドフラミンゴ

REGULAR.description:
Bellamy escapes Doflamingo`s control, but it might be too late. His long history with Doflamingo unfolds and leads to an inglorious end. Meanwhile, Hajrudin has been beaten down, but a fire still burns in him to pay back the favor he owes!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Decisive Battle Against the Executives! Proud Hajrudin!
Entscheidender Kampf gegen die Offiziere – Der stolze Hajrudin
Kanbu Kessen: Hokori Takaki Hajrudin
Une bataille décisive contre les officiers. Le fier Hajrudin
Решающая битва против Лидеров. Гордость Хаджрудина
معركة حاسمة ضدّ المسؤولين! خير الدّين الفخور!
幹部決戦 誇り高きハイルディン

REGULAR.description:
Lao G and Don Chin Jao duke it out as each brings their most devastating attacks to the battle. But a misunderstanding caused by Baby 5 has Sai and Don Chin Jao distracted - are they distracted enough for Lao G to gain the upper hand?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai no Kessen: Shintouryou Sai tai Baby 5
Kampf der Liebe – Der neue Anführer Sai gegen Baby 5
Le combat de l`amour. Le nouveau leader Sai vs. Baby 5
The Battle of Love! The New Leader Sai vs. Baby 5!
Битва во имя любви. Командующий флотом Сай против Детки 5
معركة الحبّ! القائد الجديد ساي ضدّ بيبي 5!
愛の決戦 新棟梁サイVS[たい]ベビー5

REGULAR.description:
Law is at the whim of Doflamingo and Trebol, while Luffy still has to deal with Bellamy, who fights to keep his honor even after being released by Doflamingo! Meanwhile, Gladius is about to detonate the ground around Cavendish and Bartolomeo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Stolz eines Mannes – Bellamys finaler Angriff!
La fierté d`un homme. La dernière charge de Bellamy !
Otoko no Iji: Bellamy Saigo no Totsugeki!
The Man`s Pride! Bellamy`s Last Charge!
Мужская гордость. Последний бой Беллами
كبرياء الرجل! اندفاع بيلامي الأخير!
男の意地 ベラミー最期の突撃!

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious force that resembles Cavendish menaces the battlefield - but while it appears to help Bartolomeo and the others at first, it sets its sights on Robin! Meanwhile, the deeply-wounded Ideo sees Dellinger’s horrible true nature!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Strong Wind and a Surge! Hakuba vs. Dellinger!
Shippuudotou: Hakuba tai Dellinger
Sturm gegen Sturmflut – Schimmel gegen Dellinger
Tempête et tension. Hakuba vs. Dellinger
Буря и натиск. Хакуба против Деллинджера
رياح عاصفة واندفاع! هاكوبا ضد ديلينجر!
疾風怒濤 ハクバVS[たい]デリンジャー

REGULAR.description:
Bartolomeo is in a neck and neck battle against Gladius to save Robin, and is faced with an impossible dilemma. With all his options leading to their defeat, can his cunning ploy save the day? Meanwhile, Robin is face to face with Cavendish, but his evil aspect Hakuba keeps complicating the situation more!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bari-Bari. L`attaque de l`hommage du poing de dieu !
Baribari: Homage Shinken Hatsudou!
Barrier-Barrier! Homage God Fist Strikes!
Hommage an die Gum-Gum-Pistole – Bartolomeo schlägt zurück!
Бари-бари. Удар кулаком поклонения
فاكهة الحاجز! تسديد لكمة الولاء المقدّس!
バリバリ オマージュ神拳発動!

REGULAR.description:
Princess Mansherry`s amazing power - to heal living beings completely - is in the hands of the Donquixote executive. If she is able to heal all the executives who`ve gone down in battle - the Straw Hats and their allies stand no chance! It`s up to Leo to save the day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die heilende Prinzessin – Rettet Moncherry!
Iyashi no Hime: Mansherry o Sukue!
La princesse guérisseuse. Au secours de Mancherie !
The Healing Princess! Save Mansherry!
Принцесса-целительница. Спасение Маншерри
أميرة الشفاء! أنقذوا مانشيري!
癒しの姫 マンシェリーを救え!

REGULAR.description:
Señor Pink and Franky continue their knock-down, drag-out, manly fight. As both of them are pushed to their limits, we learn Señor`s tragic past! Meanwhile, Princess Mansherry`s rescue hits a snag as she stubbornly refuses to leave!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Duell zwischen Männern – Señor Pink und das Klagelied der Liebe
Le duel des hommes. L`élégie d`amour de Señor
Otoko no Kettou: Senor Ai no Banka
The Manly Duel! Senor`s Elegy of Love!
Мужской поединок. Элегия сеньора о любви
النزال الرجولي! رثاء حب سينيور!
男の決闘 セニョール愛の挽歌

REGULAR.description:
Franky and Señor Pink end their harrowing duel in a manly way - but victory knocks the wind out of even the winner`s sails! Meanwhile, Diamante and Kyros struggle desperately on the Sunflower Field, each demonstrating their extreme prowess even in near defeat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Poussière d`étoiles mortelles. Le déluge d`attaques de Diamante
Shi no Hoshikuzu: Diamante Moukou no Arashi
Stardust of Death! Diamante`s Storm of Vicious Attacks!
Tödlicher Sternenstaub – Diamantes Sturm der bösartigen Angriffe
Звёздная пыль смерти. Буря беспощадных атак Диаманте
غبار نجم الموت! عاصفة هجمات ديامانتي الوحشيّة!
死の星屑 ディアマンテ猛攻の嵐

REGULAR.description:
Kyros, unbowed by Diamante`s vicious attacks, fights back with the anger and retribution of all of Dressrosa in order to fulfill his promise to protect Rebecca. If he is successful, only a few executives will remain, setting the stage for the Straw Hats` victory.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Trueno Bastardo! Kyros` Furious Strike!
Trueno Bastardo! – Kyros` ultimative Attacke!
Trueno Bastardo: Kyros Ikari no Ichigeki
Trueno bastardo ! L`assaut furieux de Kyros !
Получи, ублюдок! Яростная атака Кироса
رعد اللقيط! هجوم كيروس الغاضب!
雷の破壊剣[トゥルエノバスタード] キュロス怒りの一撃

REGULAR.description:
Pica loses his temper and turns his full wrath against King Riku, whom he hopes to destroy, ending the revolution against Doflamingo. Meanwhile, Zoro, who has been distracted by Pica and drawn far from the battle, has to hatch a plan to save the king!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daichi Oudan: Kyozou Pica Kishuu Sakusen!
Die Erde bebt erneut – Picas großes Überraschungsmanöver!
La grande marche. La manœuvre surprise de Pica, la statue géante !
Moving Across the Ground! The Giant Statue Pica`s Surprise Maneuver!
Пересекая землю. Неожиданный ход гигантской статуи Пики
التنقّل في جميع أنحاء اليابسة! مراوغة تمثال بيكا العملاق المفاجئة!
大地横断 巨像ピーカ奇襲作戦!

REGULAR.description:
With the lives of King Riku, Usopp, and the others on the old King`s Plateau in the balance, Zoro must dig deep and discover a powerful technique to counter Pica`s near-unstoppable onslaught. Meanwhile, King Riku ponders what it means to be a good king.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Decisive Battle in Midair! Zoro`s New Special Secret Technique Blasts!
Combat aérien décisif. La nouvelle botte secrète explosive de Zoro !
Ein Luftkampf, der alles entscheidet – Zorros Geheimtechnik!
Kuuchuu Kessen: Zoro Shin Hissastsu Ougi Sakuretsu!
Решающая битва в небе. Взрыв новой особо секретной техники Зоро
معركة حاسمة في منتصف الهواء! إطلاق تقنية زورو السريّة الجديدة!
空中決戦 ゾロ新必殺奥義炸裂!

REGULAR.description:
Zoro finishes off Pica, and those below his crumbling body rush to find shelter. Meanwhile, the Tontattas finish up demolishing the SMILE Factory, and Luffy`s hand is forced in his duel with Bellamy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A plus ! Le coup d`adieu de Bellamy !
Abayo! Bellamy Wakare no Ichigeki!
Mach`s gut! – Bellamys Schlag zum Abschied!
So Long! Bellamy`s Farewell Blow!
Как долго. Прощальный взрыв Беллами
وداعًا! ضربة بيلامي الوداعيّة!
あばよ! ベラミー別れの一撃!

REGULAR.description:
Taking down Bellamy only enrages Luffy in his fight against Doflamingo, his anger multiplying when he finds Law`s lifeless body! Meanwhile, Doflamingo takes the next step to end the game he started, which will endanger everybody in Dressrosa!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Law Dies! Luffy`s Raging Onslaught!
Law Shisu: Luffy Fundo no Moukougeki!
Law est mort. La violente attaque enragée de Luffy !
Law stirbt – Ruffys wütender Angriff!
Ло умирает. Яростная атака Луффи
موت لو! انقضاض لوفي الغاضب!
ロー死す ルフィ憤怒の猛攻撃!

REGULAR.description:
The Birdcage draws tighter and tighter around Dressrosa, threatening to destroy all life on the island kingdom! Meanwhile, Doflamingo stands down Luffy for a final confrontation, but a surprising twist shocks everyone on the top of the Royal Palace!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Blade of Tenacity! The Gamma Knife Counterattack!
Die Klinge des eisernen Willens – Der Gamma-Knife-Gegenangriff!
Shuunen no Yaiba: Gyakushuu no Gamma Knife!
Une lame de ténacité. Le Ganma Knife de la contre-attaque !
Клинок упорства. Контратака Гамма-ножом
نصل من الدأب! هجوم سكين غامّا المضاد!
執念の刃 逆襲のガンマナイフ!

REGULAR.description:
Law`s attack proves powerful - but Doflamingo`s power has depths which he and Luffy haven`t bargained for. When Doflamingo makes his counterattack, Luffy stares him down with an amazing power.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Collision of Haki! Luffy vs. Doflamingo!
Confrontation brutale de haki. Luffy vs. Doflamingo
Haki Gekitotsu: Luffy tai Doflamingo
Zusammenprall der Haki – Ruffy gegen De Flamingo
Столкновение Хаки. Луффи против Дофламинго
تصادم الهاكي! لوفي ضد دوفلامينغو!
覇気激突 ルフィVS[たい]ドフラミンゴ

REGULAR.description:
Trebol`s wrath is fully inflamed as Law summons enough energy to speak, denouncing the Doflamingo Family executives as pawns in Doflamingo`s game. But Law gathers enough energy to do more than just speak out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Invulnérable. Le secret renversant de Trebol
Kougeki Funou: Trebol Shougeki no Himitsu
Unangreifbar – Trébols schockierendes Geheimnis
Unassailable! The Stunning Secret of Trebol!
Неприступный. Ошеломляющий секрет Требола
منيع! سر تريبول الصاعق!
攻撃不能 トレーボル衝撃の秘密

REGULAR.description:
Cavendish has to make a difficult decision when the severely wounded Law begs him to be left behind. Meanwhile, seeing even his Second Gear or Third Gear attacks aren`t working against Doflamingo, Luffy decides to use his ultimate technique!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Anger Erupts! I Will Take Everything Upon Myself!
Der Ärger bricht aus – Ich werde alles auf mich nehmen
Explosion de colère. Je prendrai tout sur moi
Ikari Bakuhatsu: Ore ga Zenbu Hikiukeru
Вспышка ярости. Я всё возьму на себя!
انفجار الغضب! سأنجز كلّ شيء بنفسي!
怒り爆発 おれが全部引き受ける

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Doflamingo duke it out while the Birdcage tightens its grip on Dressrosa! Zoro sets off with a plan to stop it from slicing apart the country, while Luffy`s Fourth Gear proves quite potent against Doflamingo!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fourth Gear! The Phenomenal Bounce-Man!
Gear 4 ! L`incroyable Bound-Man !
Gear 4! – Der phänomenale Boundman!
Gear Fourth! Kyoui no Bounce Man!
Гир 4. Невероятный упругий человек
المستوى الرابع! الرجل الواثب الاستثنائي!
ギア4[フォース]! 驚異のバウンドマン!

REGULAR.description:
The Birdcage continues its merciless constriction, sending the residents of Dressrosa fleeing towards the center of the island, while King Riku calls out to his people; survive long enough for Luffy to vanquish the last of the royal family - Doflamingo himself!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Massive Counterattack! Doflamingo`s Awakening!
Daigyakushuu! Doflamingo no Kakusei!
Ein massiver Gegenangriff! – De Flamingos Erwachen!
La grande contre-attaque ! L`éveil de Doflamingo !
Достойный ответ. Пробуждение Дофламинго
هجوم مضاد هائل! انتفاض دوفلامينغو!
大逆襲! ドフラミンゴの覚醒!

REGULAR.description:
Fourth Gear gives Luffy the power he needs to head off Doflamingo at every strike! But the energy required to keep Fourth Gear going starts to take a toll on Luffy. Will he have enough left to finish the job?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy ! Leo Bazooka à pleine puissance
Luffy! An All-Out Leo Bazooka!
Luffy! Konshin no Leo Bazooka
Ruffys Trumpf! – Die Leo Bazooka
Луффи. Тотальная львиная базука
لوفي! بازوكا النمر بقوّة كاملة
ルフィ! 渾身の獅子[レオ]バズーカ

REGULAR.description:
Bounce-man`s power has drained Luffy, leaving him in need of a rest before he can reuse his Haki, but luckily the gladiators from the Colosseum have come around and are focusing on taking down Doflamingo! Sabo steps in at a crucial moment to defend his brother, Luffy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Flammendrachenkönig – Beschützt Ruffys Leben
Flame Dragon King! Protect Luffy`s Life!
Kaen Ryuuou: Luffy no Inochi o Mamorinuke
Roi Dragon de Feu. Protège la vie de Luffy
Пламя короля драконов, защитить жизнь Луффи!
ملك  تنانين اللهب! احموا حياة لوفي!
火炎竜王 ルフィの命を守りぬけ

REGULAR.description:
With Luffy and so many of the Straw Hats` allies incapacitated, victory seems inevitable for Doflamingo - but the compassion of Mansherry may be enough to turn the tide and renew their hope - to stop the Birdcage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Wundertränen – Moncherrys Kampf!
Kiseki no Namida: Mansherry no Tatakai!
Les larmes du miracle. Le combat de Mancherie !
Tears of Miracles! Mansherry`s Fight!
Слёзы чудес. Бой Маншерри
دموع المعجزات! قتال مانشيري!
奇跡の涙 マンシェリーの戦い!

REGULAR.description:
With just over a minute to spare, everyone in Dressrosa turns their efforts towards slowing down the Birdcage as it squeezes the life out of the country! Meanwhile, Viola seeks Doflamingo out herself, for a shocking confrontation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: As Long As We Breathe! Stop the Deadly Birdcage!
Inochi no Kagiri: Shi no Tori Kago o Tomero!
Jusqu`à la mort. Arrêter la mortelle Cage à Oiseaux !
Solange wir am Leben sind – Haltet den Vogelkäfig auf!
Пока мы дышим. Остановить смертельную птичью клетку!
سنوقف قفص الطّيور المميت ما دام فينا عرق ينبض!
命の限り 死の鳥カゴを止めろ!

REGULAR.description:
Only a bit more time remains before Luffy returns to the scene! But as time slips by, those who had been roused by Princess Mansherry`s powers begin to falter! Meanwhile, Rebecca, under the control of Doflamingo, is about to attack Viola!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dead or Alive! A Fateful Countdown!
Mort ou vif. Le compte à rebours du destin
Sei ka Shi ka: Unmei no Countdown
Tot oder lebendig – Ein schicksalhafter Countdown
Живые или мертвые. Судьбоносный отсчет
حياة أو موت! العدّ العكسي المصيريّ!
生か死か 運命のカウントダウン

REGULAR.description:
Luffy regains enough Haki to face off against Doflamingo, but his health is still poor. With the Birdcage closing in, is there a technique left in his repertoire that is strong enough to take down Doflamingo?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attack on a Celestial! Luffy`s King Kong Gun of Anger!
Himmelskampf – Ruffys rasende King Kong Gun
L`attaque du ciel. Le King Kong Gun de la colère de Luffy
Ten o Utsu: Luffy Ikari no King Kong Gun
Удар с небес! Яростная Обезьянья Царь-Пушка Луффи!
هجوم على سماويّ - مسدّس الملك كونغ المليء بغضب لوفي
天を討つ ルフィ怒りの大猿王銃[キングコングガン]

REGULAR.description:
With Doflamingo thoroughly quashed and the Birdcage collapsing, the people of Dressrosa shed tears of joy remembering the hardships they`ve endured, and the actions taken by Luffy and the others to free them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Für die Freiheit! – Dress Rosas Freudentränen!
Jiyuu e! Yorokobi no Dressrosa!
Pour la liberté ! le soulagement de Dressrosa !
To Be Free! Dressrosa`s Delight!
Быть свободными! Эйфория на Дрез Роуз!
من أجل الحرّيّة! فرحة دريسروزا!
自由へ! 喜びのドレスローザ!

REGULAR.description:
Jesus Burgess of the Blackbeard Pirates tries to agitate Sabo, mocking Ace`s final words in order to unsettle him enough that he can try to steal the Flare-Flare Fruit! Meanwhile, people of Dressrosa beg King Riku to resume the crown when Navy Admiral Fujitora steps in and takes a stunning action!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Sans précédent. La décision inattendue de l`amiral Fujitora !
The Unheard-of! Admiral Fujitora`s Surprising Decision!
Unglaublich – Admiral Fujitoras überraschende Entscheidung!
Zendaimimon: Taishou Fujitora Shougeki no Ketsudan!
Невиданное! Шокирующее решение адмирала Фуджиторы!
قرار الأميرال فوجيتورا المفاجئ غير المسبوق!
前代未聞 大将藤虎衝撃の決断!

REGULAR.description:
Repercussions of Doflamingo`s defeat reverberate around the world! Fujitora`s actions put the Navy in a tight spot, and the "Worst Generation" beings to stir into action!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ausbreitende Schockwelle – Die Schlimmste Generation tritt in Aktion!
Gekishin Hashiru: Ugokidasu Saiaku no Sedai!
La terre tremble. La pire génération commence à bouger !
Sending a Shockwave! The Worst Generation Goes Into Action!
Мир трепещет! Худшее Поколение начинает действовать!
تداعيات الموجة الصّادمة! يبدأ الجيل الأسوأ بالتّحرّك!
激震走る 動き出す最悪の世代!

REGULAR.description:
The combatants in the battle for Dressrosa can finally begin to recoup, but those who stay awake are treated to the story of how Sabo joined the Revolutionary Army!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu Tanjou: Kakumei Senshi Sabo no Bouken!
Die Geburt einer Legende – Die Abenteuer des Revolutionskämpfers Sabo!
La naissance de la légende. Les aventures de Sabo le guerrier révolutionnaire !
The Birth of the Legend! The Adventures of the Revolutionary Warrior Sabo!
Рождение новой легенды! Приключение революционера Сабо!
ولادة أسطورة! مغامرات محارب الجيش الثّوريّ سابو!
伝説誕生 革命戦士サボの冒険!

REGULAR.description:
Sabo recounts his surprising reunion with Luffy at the Colosseum as the Straw Hats and the others continue to recoup. Meanwhile, Fujitora gambles on how to make his next move - and the odds are in Luffy`s favor!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Bündnis der Brüder – Die Geschichte von Ruffys und Sabos Wiedersehen
Kyoudai no Kizuna: Luffy Sabo Saikai Hiwa
Le lien fraternel. L`histoire cachée derrière les retrouvailles de Luffy et Sabo
The Brothers` Bond! The Untold Story Behind Luffy and Sabo`s Reunion!
Братские узы! История воссоединения Луффи и Сабо!
رابط الإخوة! القصّة غير المرويّة وراء لمّ شمل لوفي وسابو!
兄弟の絆 ルフィ・サボ再会秘話

REGULAR.description:
As Sabo departs, our attention shifts to the other Straw Hats waging a fierce battle on a mysterious island. And a new drama is set into motion as ill portents fall from the sky!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die stärkste Kreatur aller Zeiten – Kaido der hundert Bestien
La créature la plus forte. Le Yonkou Kaido aux cent bêtes
Saikyou no Seibutsu: Yonkou - Hyakujuu no Kaidou
The Strongest Creature! One of the Four Emperors: Kaido, King of the Beasts!
Сильнейшее существо! Царь Зверей Кайдо!
الكائن الأقوى! اليونكو ملك الوحوش كايدو!
最強の生物 四皇・百獣のカイドウ

REGULAR.description:
As Luffy and the others begin to come to their senses, major players in the Navy arrive to search Dressrosa for the Straw Hats! Also, Rebecca`s history is whitewashed with a fake cover story - but why?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fujitora Takes Action! The Complete Siege of the Straw Hats!
Fujitora Ugoku: Mugiwara no Ichimi Kanzen Houimou
Fujitora avance. Le siège parfait des Mugiwara
Fujitoras nächster Schritt – Die vollständige Belagerung der Strohhüte
Фуджитора начинает действовать! Мугивары полностью окружены
يبدأ فوجيتورا التّحرّك! محاصرة طاقم قبّعة القشّ الكاملة!
藤虎動く 麦わらの一味完全包囲網

REGULAR.description:
Fujitora`s flirting with chance has turned out poorly for the Straw Hats as the full Navy force bears down on Dressrosa searching for the pirates! Luffy and the others make a mad dash for the east port to get off the island, but not without finishing up a piece of business...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A State of Emergency! Rebecca Is Kidnapped!
Ein Notfall – Rebecca wird entführt!
Hijoujitai: Sarawareta Rebecca!
Situation d`urgence. L`enlèvement de Rebecca !
Чрезвычайное положение! Ребекка похищена!
حالة طوارئ! اختُطفت ريبيكّا!
非常事態 さらわれたレベッカ!

REGULAR.description:
Rebecca has precious little time to follow Luffy`s lead and make it to Kyros. Can she make it in time? Meanwhile, Fujitora is closing in on Bartolomeo and the other Colosseum warriors while Trafalgar Law faces the shadows of his past!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Band zwischen Vater und Tochter – Kyros und Rebecca!
Le lien entre un père et une fille. Kyros et Rebecca !
Oyako no Kizuna: Kyros to Rebecca!
The Bond Between Father and Daughter! Kyros and Rebecca!
Узы Отца и Дочери! Кирос и Ребекка!
الرّابط بين الأب والابنة! كيروس وريبيكّا!
父娘[おやこ]の絆 キュロスとレベッカ!

REGULAR.description:
Law and Sengoku share memories of Corazon, and the secret of Trafalgar Law`s name. Meanwhile, Fujitora uses the destruction caused by the battle in Dressrosa as a weapon, and squares off one-on-one with Luffy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Stolz eines Mannes! – Ruffys Kopf-an-Kopf-Kampf gegen Fujitora!
La volonté d`un homme. Luffy vs. Fujitora, l`affrontement
Men`s Pride! Luffy vs. Fujitora, Head-to-Head!
Otoko no Iji: Luffy tai Fujitora Makkou Shoubu
Мужская гордость! Луффи против Фуджиторы в бою один на один!
كبرياء الرّجال! لوفي ضدّ فوجيتورا رجلاً لرجل!
男の意地 ルフィVS[たい]藤虎真向勝負

REGULAR.description:
The people of Dressrosa show their appreciation to the Straw Hats one last time by foiling Fujitora`s strategy. As Luffy and the others are able to finally make their break from the island, however, an unbelievable new chapter opens in the story of the Straw Hat Pirates!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aucune échappatoire. La traque impitoyable de l`amiral Fujitora !
Kein Entkommen – Fujitoras unbarmherzige Verfolgungsjagd!
Nigeba Nashi: Taishou Fujitora Hijou no Tsuigeki!
No Way Out! Admiral Fujitora`s Ruthless Pursuit!
Яростная атака Фуджиторы! Смертоносные обломки, заполонившие небо!
لا مهرب! مطاردة الأميرال فوجيتورا الشّرسة!
逃場無し 大将藤虎非情の追撃!

REGULAR.description:
With newfound allies won in the battle at Dressrosa, and as the Navy watches, Luffy and the Straw Hats depart Dressrosa for open water. But will Luffy accept the oath of allegiance given by his new fleet?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kobun no Sakazuki: Kessei! Mugiwara Daisendan!
La coupe de sake des partisans. Formation ! La grande flotte des Mugiwara !
Sakeschalen der Gefolgschaft! – Die Entstehung der Strohhut-Großflotte!
Sons` Cups! The Straw Hat Fleet Is Formed!
Отцы и дети! Формирование флота Мугивары!
أكواب الأبناء! تشكّل أسطول قبّعة القشّ!
子分の盃 結成! 麦わら大船団!

REGULAR.description:
While the Straw Hats are underway, Doflamingo has serious predictions for the upset of the world order! Meanwhile, the recent actions in Dressrosa have led to surprising results!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gun`yuukakyo: Arekuruu Shinsekai no Kaibutsu-tachi
Kämpfer unter sich – Die wütenden Monster der Neuen Welt
L`affrontement des rivaux. Les monstres du Nouveau Monde se déchaînent
The Numerous Rivals Struggle Amongst Themselves! The Raging Monsters of the New World
Конфликт Сильнейших! Безумные монстры Нового Мира!
صراع المتنافسين! وحوش العالم الجديد الهائجة!
群雄割拠 荒狂う新世界の怪物達

REGULAR.description:
While heading to the next island, Zou, Luffy’s appetite causes them trouble and he and Bartolomeo find themselves entangled in the scheme of a pirate lord who can manipulate silver.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die silberne Festung! – Ruffys und Bartolomeos großes Abenteuer!
Gin no Yousai: Luffy to Barto Daibouken
La forteresse d`argent. La grande aventure de Luffy et Barto
The Silver Fortress! Luffy and Barto`s Great Adventure!
Серебряная крепость! Приключения Луффи и Бартоломео!
الحصن الفضّيّ! مغامرة لوفي وبارتو العظيمة!
銀の要塞 ルフィとバルト大冒険

REGULAR.description:
The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill`s group hides a terrible secret!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!
Chika Meikyuu: Luffy tai Torokko Ningen
Le labyrinthe souterrain. Luffy vs. l`homme-wagon
Tief in der Mine! – Ruffy gegen den menschlichen Zug!
Подземный Лабиринт! Луффи против Человека-вагонетки!
متاهة تحأرضيّة! لوفي ضدّ رجل العربة!
地下迷宮 ルフィVS[たい]トロッコ人間

REGULAR.description:
Luffy, Bartolomeo, and Desire make their way up the mineshaft, but Bill`s assassin, Peseta, has other plans! Just when the going gets tough, help arrives, and Zoro battles the assassin head on!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In der Hitze des Gefechts – Law und Zorro eilen zur Hilfe!
Kengi Hakunetsu: Law Zoro Tsui ni Kenzan!
La technique à l`épée explose. Law et Zoro, prêts pour la rencontre finale !
The Sword Technique Heats Up! Law and Zoro Finally Appear!
Разогрев Стиля Мечей! Появление Ло и Зоро!"
تتأجّج مهارات السّيف! يظهر لو وزورو أخيرًا!
剣技白熱 ロー・ゾロ遂に見参!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy, Desire, and Bartolomeo go up against Bill! But the mad, Smelt-Smelt man becomes deranged and lets his true power unfurl! Do Luffy and the others have any hope of exposing Bill`s self-serving aims and turning his gang against him?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Desperate Situation! Luffy Fights a Battle in Extreme Heat!
Eine ausweglose Situation! – Der heiße Kampf auf Silver Mine!
Situation désespérée. Le combat décisif de Luffy dans une chaleur extrême
Zettaizetsumei: Luffy Kyokugen no Shakunetsu Kessen
Отчаянное положение! Луффи сражается в экстремальной жаре!
وضع يائس! يخوض لوفي معركة في حرارة مستعرّة!
絶体絶命 ルフィ極限の灼熱決戦

REGULAR.description:
Bartolomeo recounts the formation of the Straw Hats, sharing their moving story with the rest of his crew! Meanwhile, the mysterious island of Zou approaches in the distance, obscured by fog. But when the haze clears, no one is expecting what they see!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bouken Kaimaku: Maboroshi no Shima "Zou" Touchaku!
Curtain-up on a New Adventure! Arriving at the Phantom Island, Zou!
Ein neues Abenteuer beginnt – Ankunft auf der Phantominsel Zou!
Le rideau se lève sur une nouvelle aventure. Arrivée sur l`île fantôme, Zō !
Начало нового приключения! Прибытие на таинственный остров Зоя!
يُسدل السّتار على مغامرة جديدة! الوصول إلى الجزيرة الشّبح زو!
冒険開幕 幻の島「ゾウ」到着!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and the others arrive at the mysterious land of Zou, and find the Sunny. But when they board, they find the other Straw Hats have already disembarked. Thus, Luffy, Zoro, Robin and the others take on the challenge of climbing the monstrous elephant!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der neue Samurai der Meere – Der Sohn des berüchtigten Whitebeard
Le nouveau Shichibukai. Le fils légendaire de Barbe Blanche apparaît
Shin Shichi Bukai: Densetsu Shirohige no Musuko Toujou
The New Warlord! The Legendary Whitebeard`s Son Appears!
Новый Шичибукай! Появление сына легендарного Белоуса!
الشّيتشيبوكاي الجديد، ظهور ابن اللّحية البيضاء الأسطوريّ
新七武海 伝説・白ひげの息子登場

REGULAR.description:
Finally scaling the elephant`s back, the Straw Hats continue their search for the other half of their crew! But the mysterious "island" on the back of the elephant may hold more danger than they bargained for, as they learn they are not alone!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Deadly Elephant Climb! A Great Adventure on the Back of the Giant Elephant!
Ein gefährlicher Aufstieg – Das Abenteuer auf dem Rücken des Elefanten!
Kesshi no Tozou: Kyozou no Se no Daibouken!
Une ascension d`éléphant mortelle. Une grande aventure à dos d`éléphant !
Смертельный подъем на слона! Большое приключение на спине Гигантского Слона!
تسلّق فيل مميت! مغامرة عظيمة على ظهر فيل عملاق!
決死の登象 巨象の背の大冒険!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy pushes deeper into the mysterious forest on the elephant’s back, but he`s treading in territory where is not welcome! Meanwhile, Usopp and the others make a startling discovery in a ruined city!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Battle Begins! Luffy vs. the Mink Tribe!
Ein Kampf beginnt – Ruffy gegen den Mink-Stamm!
La bataille commence. Luffy vs. la tribu Mink !
Sentou Kaishi: Luffy vs Mink-zoku!
Битва начинается! Луффи против Племени Минков!
تبدأ المعركة! لوفي ضدّ قبيلة المينك!
戦闘開始 ルフィVSミンク族!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and the others survive the Rain-Ruption and learn of its vital role in maintaining life on Zou. They continue on towards the fortress learning more about the mysterious Mink Tribe, and are finally reunited with the others - but is that the whole story?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Galchu! – Die Wiedervereinigung der Strohhüte
Garchu! The Straw Hats Reunite!
Garchu. L`équipe des Mugiwara au complet
Garchuu! Mugiwara no Ichimi Saishuuketsu
Гарчу! Воссоединение Мугивар!
غارتشو! لمّ شمل طاقم قبّعة القشّ!
ガルチュー! 麦わらの一味再集結

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and the others are unexpectedly welcomed at the fortress and treated well by the Minks, although they have to navigate some cultural differences… And Nami starts sharing what happened to them after they left Dressrosa.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auf zum Gegenangriff – Die große Leistung der Kringelhut-Piraten!
Début de la contre-attaque. L`équipage du "sourcil torsadé" en action !
Hangeki Kaishi: Guruwara no Ichimi Daikatsuyaku!
Start to Counterattack! Great Moves by the Twirly Hat Crew!
Начать контрнаступление! Великий план команды Спиральной Шляпы!
بدء الهجوم المضاد! تحركات عظيمة من طاقم القبعة الملتوية!
反撃開始 ぐるわらの一味大活躍!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and the others learn about the dangerous intruders who have come to Zou, and why the island is wrecked! Afterwards, Luffy`s loose lips get them into trouble!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Threat Descends! The Beast Pirates, Jack!
Eine Bedrohung erscheint – Jack von der Bestien-Piratenbande!
Kyoui Shuurai: Hyakujuu Kaizokudan Jack!
Une menace s`abat. Jack des pirates aux cent bêtes !
Опасное вторжение! Джек из команды Царя Зверей!
وصول تهديد! قراصنة الوحش، جاك!
脅威襲来 百獣海賊団ジャック!

REGULAR.description:
Duke Dogstorm - the Straw Hats finally meet the ruler of this strange land, and learn more about the battle that took place here; and the mysterious system by which the island is ruled!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Herrscher am Tage – Herzog Inuarashis Auftritt!
Hiru no Ou: Inuarashi Koushaku Toujou!
Le roi du jour. Le duc Inuarashi fait son apparition !
The King of the Day! Duke Dogstorm Appears!
Дневной правитель! Появление князя Инуараши!
ملك النهار! وصول الدوق إينواراشي!
昼の王 イヌアラシ公爵登場!

REGULAR.description:
Day turns to night as the Minks keep up their onslaught against the invading Beast Pirates! But Jack`s amazing Devil Fruit power may end the elephant island once and for all!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Herrscher in der Nacht – Nekomamushi greift ein
Le roi de la nuit. Le maître Nekomamushi bondit
The King of the Night! Master Cat Viper Emerges!
Yoru no Ou: Nekomamushi no Danna Kenzan
Ночной правитель! Появление мастера Некомамуши!
ملك الليل! وصول السيّد نيكوماموشي!
夜の王 ネコマムシの旦那見参

REGULAR.description:
Night and day, Jack faces the fury of the two sworn defenders of Zou, but while they put up a good fight, the Minks aren`t able to subdue Jack, especially after he brings out his secret weapon...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Hauptstadt in Trümmern – Auftritt der Kringelhut-Piratenbande!
La capitale anéantie. L`équipage du sourcil torsadé à la rescousse !
Shuto Kaimetsu: Guruware no Ichimi Jouriku!
The Exterminated Capital! The Twirly Hat Crew Arrive!
Разрушение столицы! Прибытие команды Спиралебрового!
العاصمة المبادة! وصول طاقم القبعة المدوّرة!
首都壊滅 ぐるわらの一味上陸!

REGULAR.description:
In the aftermath of Jack`s deadly attack on the island of Zou, Chopper and Sanji rush in to save the fallen Mink Tribe - but they will need the help of Caesar to overcome the poisonous effects of the gas!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Zeitfenster schließt sich! – Das Band zwischen den Minks und den Strohhüten!
La capitale anéantie. Le lien entre l`équipage et la tribu Mink !
Limit Semaru: Mink-zoku to Ichimi no Kizuna!
The Time Limit Closes In! The Bond Between the Mink Tribe and the Crew!
Время заканчивается! Связь между племенем Минков и командой!
يقترب انتهاء المدّة الزمنيّة! الرابط بين قبيلة المينك والطاقم!
刻限[リミット]迫る ミンク族と一味の絆!

REGULAR.description:
More of the dramatic happenings on Zou are revealed as we learn that Jack`s pirate band were not the only visitors to the elephant island! And what about the mysterious fate of Sanji?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akudou Kikyou: Yonkou Big Mom no Shikaku
Heimkehr eines Halunken – Der Auftragskiller der Kaiserin Big Mom!
Le délinquant de retour chez lui. Les assassins du Yonkou Big Mom
The Delinquent Comes Home! Emperor Big Mom`s Assassins!
Нарушитель возвращается домой! Убийцы Большой Мамочки!
عودة الجانح! قتلة اليونكو بيغ مام!
悪童帰郷 四皇ビッグ・マムの刺客

REGULAR.description:
The mystery of Sanji`s disappearance deepens as Luffy learns that Big Mom`s lackeys have caught up with him and the rest - and carry with them an invitation from Big Mom that simply can`t be refused!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Wahrheit über Sanjis Verschwinden – Eine unerwartete Einladung
La vérité derrière la disparition. Sanji reçoit une invitation surprenante
Shissou no Shinjitsu: Sanji Kyougaku no Shoutaijou
The Truth Behind the Disappearance! Sanji Gets a Startling Invitation!
Правда об исчезновении! Шокирующее приглашение для Санджи!
الحقيقة خلف الاختفاء! يتلقّى سانجي دعوةً مفزعة!
失踪の真実 サンジ驚愕の招待状

REGULAR.description:
Sanji`s dire situation has become clear, but instead of rallying against Big Mom`s crew, he submits to go along with them to bring an end to this situation. But being separated from one of his crew is more than Luffy is willing to tolerate!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A mes amis. Le mot d`adieu de Sanji
An meine Freunde – Sanjis Abschiedsbrief
To My Buds! Sanji`s Farewell Note!
Yarou Domo e: Sanji Wakare no Okitegami
Моим друзьям! Прощальная записка Санджи!
إلى رفاقي! رسالة سانجي الوداعيّة!
野郎共へ サンジ別れの置手紙

REGULAR.description:
There`s only one key to finding out what happened to Sanji - and Luffy and the others make their way towards finding out more about their friend`s disappearance, but on their way the indigenous fauna give them trouble!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Allons rencontrer maître Nekomamushi.
Let`s Go and Meet Master Cat Viper!
Nekomamushi no Danna ni Ai ni Ikou
Patron Nekomamushi, wir wollen dich seh`n!
Мы едем повидаться! С мастером Некомамуши!
لنذهب ونلتقي بالسّيّد نيكوماموشي!
ネコマムシの旦那に会いに行こう

REGULAR.description:
Luffy hatches a plan to help Sanji, but he`ll have to go alone to avoid an all-out war with Big Mom. Meanwhile, Kin`emon and Kanjuro finally arrive at Zou, unwittingly setting the stage for the Minks` thirst for revenge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La décision de Luffy. Sanji est sur le point d`abandonner !
Luffy Ketsudan: Sanji Dattai no Kiki!
Luffy`s Decision! Sanji on the Brink of Quitting!
Ruffys Entschluss – Holt Sanji zurück!
Решение Луффи! Проблема в уходе Санджи!
قرار لوفي! سانجي على عتبة الانسحاب!
ルフィ決断 サンジ脱退の危機!

REGULAR.description:
The samurai have landed! And they make their way into the country of Zou unaware of the welcome they will receive by the Minks! The Straw Hats try their best to stop the fight - but as day meets night and Cat Viper and Dogstorm face each other, tensions run high in the elephant country!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Volatile Situation! The Dog and the Cat and the Samurai!
Eine flüchtige Begegnung – Der Hund, der Kater und die Samurai!
Isshokusokuhatsu: Inu to Neko to Samurai!
La situation s`envenime. Le chien, le chat et le samouraï !
Взрывоопасная ситуация! Пес, Кот и Самурай!
وضح حرج! الكلب والقطّ والسّاموراي!
一触即発 イヌとネコと侍!

REGULAR.description:
Revelations abound as the true nature of the Wano clan and their relationship with the Minks is revealed! Momonosuke`s role is greater than any had imagined! But even more shocking - the visage of Raizo the Ninja!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Dritte im Bund! – Raizo des Taunebels!
Le troisième ! Raizō de la brume, le ninja, apparaît
Sanninme! Ninja Kiri no Raizou Toujou
The Third One! Raizo of the Mist, the Ninja, Appears!
Третий! Появление ниндзя - "Туман" Райзо!
الثّالث! ظهور النّينجا رايزو الضّباب!
三人目! 忍者・霧の雷ぞう登場

REGULAR.description:
The mysteries of ninjutsu enthrall the Straw Hats as Raizo, the implausible ninja, makes his true powers known! Meanwhile, a mysterious artifact points the way towards the end of the Grand Line!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Red Stone! A Guide to the One Piece!
Akai Ishi! "One Piece" e no Michishirube
Der rote Stein! – Ein Wegweiser zum One Piece
Une stèle rouge ! Un guide pour le One Piece
Красный камень! Указатель пути к One Piece!
حجر أحمر! دليل إلى الوان بيس!
赤い石! "ひとつなぎの大秘宝[ワンピース]" への道標

REGULAR.description:
The mystery of the Ponegliffs is revealed - their true significance, and the story of their creation, leads closer to the Straw Hats than they might have imagined!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Geheimnis von Wano-Land – Der Kozuki-Klan und die Porneglyphs
Le secret du pays de Wano. La famille Kozuki et les ponégyphes
The Secret of the Land of Wano! The Kozuki Family and the Ponegliffs!
Wano Kuni no Himitsu: Kouzuki-ke to Rekishi no Ponegliffs
Секрет Страны Вано! Клан Козуки и Понеглифы!
سرّ بلاد وانو! عشيرة كوزكي والبونيغليف!
ワノ国の秘密 光月家と歴史の本文[ポーネグリフ]

REGULAR.description:
More mysteries of the Kozuki Clan are revealed - and the samurai propose an alliance to help topple Kaido! But Luffy`s response will shock the crew... and force the young daimyo to take responsibility!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Vow Between Two Men! Luffy and Kozuki Momonosuke!
Ein Schwur zwischen Männern – Ruffy und Momonosuke Kozuki
Okoto no Chikai: Luffy to Kouzuki Momonosuke
Un serment d`hommes. Luffy et Kozuki Momonosuke
Мужская клятва! Луффи и Козуки Момоноске!
عهد بين رجلين! لوفي وكوزكي مومونوسكي!
男の誓い ルフィと光月モモの助

REGULAR.description:
Dogstorm and Cat Viper share their story of being on the journey with Oden and Roger but are interrupted by Nami who is concerned about the sea route. Meanwhile, Jack is plotting to bring down the Mokomo Dukedom again!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Densetsu no Koukai: Inu to Neko to Kaizokuou!
Eine legendäre Reise – Der Hund, der Kater und der Piratenkönig!
Le voyage légendaire. Le chien, le chat et le roi des pirates !
The Legendary Journey! The Dog and the Cat and the Pirate King!
Легендарное путешествие! Пес, Кот и Король Пиратов!
الرّحلة الأسطوريّة! الكلب والقطّ وملك القراصنة!
伝説の航海 イヌとネコと海賊王!

REGULAR.description:
The plans are set! The Straw Hats divide and conquer, one group heading to save Sanji, the others to the Land of Wano! But in the final moments before their departure, the tremendous elephant island begins to quake!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akumu Futatabi: Fujimi no Jack Kyoushuu
Erneuter Albtraum – Angriff des unbesiegbaren Jack
Le retour du cauchemar. Le terrible assaut de l`invincible Jack
The Nightmare Returns! The Invincible Jack`s Fierce Attack!
Возвращение кошмара! Жесточайшие атаки Джека Засухи!
عودة الكابوس! هجوم جاك المنيع الشّرس!
悪夢再び 不死身のジャック強襲

REGULAR.description:
After being aggressively attacked by Jack`s fleet, the monstrous Zunesha comes to life and beckons to those on its back! But can the Straw Hats understand its cry? And realize in time what the elephant island needs from them?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Battle to Defend Zou! Luffy and Zunesha!
Une guerre pour Zō. Luffy et Zunesha !
Zou Boueisen: Luffy to Zunesha!
Zou muss verteidigt werden – Ruffy und Zounisha!
Оборонительный бой Зо! Луффи и Зуниша!
معركة لحماية زو! لوفي وزونيشا!
ゾウ防衛戦 ルフィとズニーシャ!

REGULAR.description:
With the skirmish with Jack now over, the Straw Hats move on to trying to bandage the great elephant`s wounds! But just as the whole island puts the plan into action, unseen danger lurks on horizon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Helft Zounisha – Die Rettungsaktion der Strohhutbande!
Sauver Zunesha. L`opération sauvetage des Mugiwara !
Save Zunesha! The Straw Hat`s Rescue Operation!
Zunesha o Sukue: Mugiwara Rescue Daisakusen!
Спасти гигантского слона! Спасательная операция Мугивар!
أنقذوا زونيشا! يشنّ طاقم قبّعة القشّ عمليّة إنقاذ!
巨象[ズニーシャ]を救え 麦わら救急[レスキュー]大作戦!

REGULAR.description:
The Straw Hats and the others split up into four teams, each on different missions! Some from the Mink Tribe insist on leaving with Luffy’s team! Meanwhile, Usopp makes a weapon for Nami that seems to work like magic!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Abschied vom Elefanten – Sanjis Rettung beginnt!

titles.title: La résolution de Pudding. La forêt tentatrice !
Pudding`s Determination! Ablaze! The Seducing Woods!
Puddings Entscheidung! – Der Wald der Versuchung brennt!

عزيمة بودينغ! غابة الإغواء تشتعل!
プリンの決意 大炎上! 誘惑の森

REGULAR.description:
Zeus pursues the Straw Hats as Nami keeps him occupied. She has a shocking surprise in store for him, however, that might stop Big Mom in her tracks! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper find the Shark Submerge in a strange situation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Lightning Counterattack! Nami and Zeus the Thundercloud!
Ein donnernder Gegenangriff! – Nami und die Gewitterwolke Zeus
Hangeki no Ikazuchi: Nami to Raiun Zeus!

反撃の雷[いかずち] ナミと雷雲ゼウス!

REGULAR.description:
Big Mom is relentless in her pursuit of the Straw Hats! Even being buried alive doesn`t stop her! The plan to recreate the cake to stop her onslaught progresses and Pudding’s changeable heart confuses all those looking on!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Coincidental Reunion! Sanji and the Lovestruck Evil Pudding!
Ein Wiedersehen voller Emotionen! – Sanji und die verliebte Pudding!
Guuzen no Saikai: Sanji to Koi Suru Waru Purin

Неслучайное воссоединение! Санджи и злая влюблённая Пудинг!
لمّ شمل بالصّدفة! سانجي وبودينغ الشّرّيرة العاشقة!
偶然の再会 サンジと恋する悪プリン

REGULAR.description:
Mama`s onslaught continues as Pudding keeps battling the contradictory urges in her head - to kill or kiss Sanji! Meanwhile, Brook and Chopper are at Perospero`s mercy - and are being reduced to sweetened versions of themselves!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il faut protéger le Sunny. Chopper et Brook luttent héroïquement !
Rettet die Sunny! – Der erbitterte Kampf von Chopper und Brook
Save the Sunny! Fighting Bravely! Chopper and Brook!
Sunny o Mamore: Funsen! Chopper & Brook
Спасти Санни! Храбрая битва Чоппера и Брука!
إنقاذ السّفينة ساني! يقاتل تشوبّر وبروك بشجاعة!
サニーを守れ 奮戦! チョッパー&ブルック

REGULAR.description:
Sandwiched between Big Mom and her advancing fleet, the only hope is the Sunny`s Coup-de-Burst! But can the Straw Hats prepare it in time? Meanwhile, Pedro comes face to face with his past, and embraces a dramatic end to be sure that the tides of time continue to flow!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Before the Dawn! Pedro, the Captain of the Guardians!
Juste avant l`aube. Pedro, le capitaine des gardiens !
Vor der Morgendämmerung – Pedro, Anführer der Wächter
Yoake Mae: Guardians Danchou Pedro

قُبيل الفجر! بيدرو، قائد الحرّاس
夜明け前 侠客団[ガーディアンズ]団長ペドロ

REGULAR.description:
The last chance the Straw Hats have is the Coup de Burst! Pedro has made the ultimate sacrifice to give them this one chance to escape, but Big Mom`s naval forces are closing in and poised to knock them out! Luffy has to put himself on the line again to save his crew!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Be Back! Luffy, Deadly Departure!
Ich komme wieder! – Ruffys gefährlicher Aufbruch!
Je reviendrai. Luffy part jouer sa vie !
Kanarazu Modoru: Luffy Inochigake no Shukkou!
Я вернусь! Луффи, Смертельное отправление!
سأعود! لوفي، مغادرة قاتلة
必ず戻る ルフィ命がけの出航!

REGULAR.description:
Nami and the others who escaped the Whole Cake Island by Pedro’s sacrifice mourn over his death. Jimbei, however, keeps his calm which makes Brook lose his temper. Meanwhile, Luffy confronts the formidable Sweet General Katakuri in the Mirroworld.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 10 Oku no Otoko: Saikyou no 3 Shousei Katakuri
10億の男 最強の3将星カタクリ
Ein Kopfgeld von über einer Milliarde! – Katakuri, der stärkste Sweet General!
L`homme qui valait un milliard. Katakuri, le plus fort des généraux sucrés !

Человек с наградой в миллиард! Сильнейший Конфентный генерал, Катакури!
الرّجل صاحب مكافأة المليار! جنرال الحلوى الأقوى، كاتاكوري

REGULAR.description:
Pudding and Sanji arrive at Cacao Island and begin to remake the only cake that will calm Big Mom! But their fake nuptials get in the way as they bicker like a married couple! Meanwhile, Luffy has lost the battle of his life - and the flame goes out of him... until the Sunny becomes the target of a new threat!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Hard Battle Starts! Luffy vs. Katakuri!
Der Kampf geht weiter! – Ruffy gegen Katakuri
Gekitou Kaimaku: Luffy tai Katakuri

تبدأ معركة صعبة! لوفي ضدّ كاتاكوري
激闘開幕 ルフィVS[たい]カタクリ

REGULAR.description:
Luffy keeps the forces out to destroy the Straw Hats at bay, however the crew needs to destroy all the mirrors - the final link that secure his safe return - on the ship in order to save themselves! At the same time, the ship is on a course for disaster, with Jimbei at the helm!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Green Room! – Jinbei, der unbesiegbare Steuermann!
Green Room: Muteki no Soudashu Jinbee
La chambre verte. Jinbei, un timonier hors-pair !
