الغرفة الخضراء! رُبّان لا يُهزَم، جينبي
波の部屋[グリーンルーム] 無敵の操舵主ジンベエ

REGULAR.description:
Nami and the others start breaking all the mirrors on the Sunny in order to keep their enemies out while she and Luffy discuss where to rendezvous – but little do they know the plan is overheard! Meanwhile, Luffy’s grueling battle against Katakuri intensifies!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Bedrohung durch Mogura! – Ruffys stiller Kampf!
La menace de Mogura. Le combat silencieux de Luffy !
Mogura no Kyoui: Luffy Chinmoku no Tatakai!
The Threat of the Mole! Luffy`s Silent Fight!
Копьё земляного дракона! Молчаливый бой Луффи!
تهديد الخُلد! قتال لوفي الصّامت
土竜の脅威 ルフィ沈黙の戦い!

REGULAR.description:
Both powerful combatants and strong users of Haki, Luffy and Katakuri are a dead match for each other. Every move is matched by their opponent! Elsewhere, the Big Mom Pirates square off against Germa! With so much at stake, Luffy falls to Katakuri, spelling his doom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !نهاية المعركة المميتة؟ إيقاظ كاتاكوري الغاضب
Das Ende der tödlichen Schlacht?! – Katakuris zorniges Erwachen
La fin du combat mortel. L`éveil rageur de Katakuri !
Shitou Kecchaku!? Katakuri Ikari no Kakusei
The End of the Deadly Battle?! Katakuri`s Awakening in Anger!
Смертельной битве конец?! Пробуждение фрукта Катакури!
死闘決着!? カタクリ怒りの覚醒

REGULAR.description:
Katakuri retires to his sanctuary to enjoy the merienda - a chance for him to savor the sweetness of his crew of chefs and replenish his Haki! But he`s not the only one who`s doing eating, as Straw Hat uses his mouth to get out from under the mochi mountain crushing him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das verbotene Geheimnis – Katakuris Merienda
Kindan no Himitsu: Katakuri no Merienda

The Forbidden Secret! Katakuri`s Merienda!
Страшный секрет! Катакури принимает полдник!
السر المحرّم! عصرونيّة كاتاكوري
禁断の秘密 カタクリのおやつの時間[メリエンダ]

REGULAR.description:
Luffy discovers the secret to Katakuri`s unearthly fighting ability, and just might have a solution for how to stop him! Meanwhile at the Sweets Factory, Pudding receives a call from Brulee who has bad news for the Straw Hats!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !لوفي يقاوم! نقطة ضعف المنيع كاتاكوري
La contre-attaque de Luffy ! Le point faible de l`invincible Katakuri !
Luffy Fights Back! The Invincible Katakuri`s Weak Point!
Luffy Hangeki: Muteki Katakuri no Jakuten!
Ruffy schlägt zurück! – Die Schwachstelle des unbesiegbaren Katakuri
Луффи бьёт в ответ. Слабое место неуязвимого Катакури!
ルフィ反撃 無敵カタクリの弱点!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy runs out of his Haki and has to buy some time - in the most peculiar way! Meanwhile the Big Mom Pirates mobilize their entire fleet to squelch the pirate threat, and the replacement cake nears completion!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !أزمة أخرى! المستوى الرابع ضد الدونات التي لا يمكن إيقافها
Another Crisis! Gear Four vs. Unstoppable Donuts!

危機[ピンチ]再び! ギア4VS[たい]無双ドーナツ

REGULAR.description:
When Chiffon comes under attack, Sanji must choose between defending her or revealing himself to his enemies! Meanwhile, Luffy uses Brulee as a human shield to avoid the wrath of Big Mom!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !الابنة الثائرة، شيفون! خطّة سانجي الكبيرة لنقل الكعكة
Chiffon la rebelle. Le plan pour transporter le gâteau de Sanji !
Die rebellische Tochter Chiffon – Sanjis großer Plan zum Transport der Hochzeitstorte

Непокорная дочь Шифон! План Санджи по перевозке торта
反逆の娘[シフォン] サンジのケーキ輸送大作戦

REGULAR.description:
Bege arrives on the scene, seemingly willing to risk it all to bring down the Big Mom Pirates in a blaze of glory, but of course he has a trick up his sleeve! Meanwhile Luffy keeps on the move to regain his Haki, but begins to ponder just how far his limits can be pushed!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !أسلوب حياة رجل! عزيمة بيجي ولوفي القبطانيّة
A Man`s Way of Life! Bege and Luffy`s Determination as Captains!
Ein Leben, wie es sich für einen Mann gehört! – Die Entschlossenheit der Kapitäne Bege und Ruffy!
Le mode de vie d`un homme. La détermination des capitaines Bege et Luffy
Otoko no Ikizama: Bege to Luffy Senchou no Ketsui

男の生き様 ベッジとルフィ船長の決意

REGULAR.description:
Sanji and Bege get together and get off of Cacao Island successfully but their plan is in jeopardy as Oven begins to boil the sea itself! As Chiffon and the others who are on the ship are cornered, a surprising savior comes in to fight Oven!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cake Chinbotsu!? Sanji & Bege Toubousen
Die Torte sinkt?! – Sanjis und Beges umkämpfte Flucht!
Le gâteau a coulé ! Sanji et Bege fuient la bataille
The Cake Sank?! Sanji and Bege`s Getaway Battle!
Торт утонул?! Побег Санджи и Беджи
غرق الكعك!؟ معركة هروب سانجي وبيجي
ケーキ沈没!? サンジ&ベッジ逃亡戦

REGULAR.description:
A vicious pincer attack bears down on the Straw Hats! Three fleets converge and try to squeeze the life from them! Daifuku himself take the lead! But Carrot draws on a deep power within and springs in to action under the light of the moon!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Su Long! – Carrots geheimnisvolle Verwandlung!
Sulong! Carrot`s Big Mystic Transformation!
Sulong. La transformation mystique de Carrot
Sulong: Carrot Shinpi no Daihenshin
Большая мистическая трансформация Морковки
سولونغ! تحوّل كاروت الكبير الخفيّ

REGULAR.description:
The much anticipated wedding cake is on its way, but there is a debate at the last minute! Shouldn`t this opportunity be used to slip poison into Big Mom`s meal to topple the Emperor of the Sea? Meanwhile, Carrot`s unearthly ability based on the power of the moon saves the day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Break Through! The Straw Hat`s Mighty Sea Battle!
Durchbruch! – Eine große Seeschlacht für die Strohhüte!
Passer au travers ! La puissante bataille navale des Mugiwara !
Toppa Seyo: Mugiwara no Ichimi Dai Kaisen!
На прорыв! Невероятный морской бой!
اختراق! معركة قراصنة قبّعة القشّ البحريّة الجبّارة
突破せよ 麦わらの一味大海戦!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy, through sheer force of will, can almost use his Haki to battle Katakuri! Meanwhile, the Sunny catches fire while the Straw Hats try to kick out Big Mom but that’s when Jimbei steps up to the plate and takes a swing at her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !أخيرًا تحدث المواجهة! اليونكو ضد طاقم قبّعة القشّ
Eine direkte Konfrontation – Die Kaiserin gegen die Strohhüte!
Finally, They Clash! The Emperor of the Sea vs. the Straw Hats!
Ils s`affrontent enfin. La Yonkou contre l`équipage des Mugiwara
Tsui ni Gekitotsu: Yonkou tai Mugiwara no Ichimi

遂に激突 四皇VS[たい]麦わらの一味

REGULAR.description:
Luffy tries to enhance his Haki to foresee Katakuri’s next move but Katakuri’s attacks keep pulling him down! However, when he summons every bit of wisdom from his training with Rayleigh, he remembers something important that could turn the tables for him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !توجيهات ملك الظلام المباشرة! تنقلب المعركة ضدّ كاتاكوري
Dark King`s Direct Precepts! The Battle Against Katakuri Turns Around!
Die Anweisungen des dunklen Königs – Der Wendepunkt im Kampf gegen Katakuri
Les préceptes du seigneur des ténèbres. Renversement de situation contre Katakuri
Meiou Jikiden: Katakuri Sen Dai Gyakuten Kaishi
Наставления Тёмного Рыцаря. Реванш в битве с Катакури!
冥王直伝 カタクリ戦大逆転開始

REGULAR.description:
The cake is finally prepared and brought before Big Mom! With the end of her vicious rampage in sight, there is a chance for the Straw Hats to flee! Big Mom`s crew is forced to decide who to attack! Meanwhile, Luffy grows ever closer to using his Haki!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Er ist zurück! – Sanji, der Mann, der einen der vier Kaiser aufhalten wird!
Finally He Returns! Sanji, the Man Who`ll Stop the Emperor of the Sea!
Il est de retour. Sanji, l`homme voulant arrêter un Yonkou
Tsui ni Kikan: Yonkou o Tomeru Otoko Sanji
Возвращение Санджи! Тот, кто остановит императрицу!
أخيرًا يعود، سانجي، الرجل الذي سيوقف اليونكو!
遂に帰還 四皇を止める男サンジ

REGULAR.description:
Hiding her presence, Flampe shoots her blowgun at Luffy to support her dear brother Katakuri. Meanwhile, Oven launches a dastardly plan to fence Luffy in - by destroying every mirror on the island! And Smoothie is on the tail of the Sunny as it makes its way towards Cacao Island!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !تترصّد في الظلام! قاتلة تستهدف لوفي
Ein Schuss aus dem Hinterhalt! – Ruffy im Visier der Attentäterin!

Tapi dans l`obscurité. un assassin attaquant Luffy !
Yami ni Hisomu: Luffy o Osou Ansatsusha!
Прятки в темноте. За Луффи охотится убийца
闇に潜む ルフィを襲う暗殺者!

REGULAR.description:
Katakuri notices his sister Flampe is sneakily providing poison needle back up in the shadows. Becoming enraged, he takes unexpected action that surprises everyone. Meanwhile, Smoothie increases her size and closes in on the Sunny.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Mann und seine Bestimmung! – Katakuris Kampf auf Leben und Tod!
La résolution d`un homme. Katakuri met sa vie en jeu
One Man`s Determination! Katakuri`s Deadly Big Fight!
Otoko no Kakugo: Katakuri Inochigake Ooshoubu
Решение одного Генерала. Катакури решает биться на смерть
عزيمة رجل! قتال كاتاكوري المميت
男の覚悟 カタクリ命がけ大勝負

REGULAR.description:
Luffy leans on his training to bring out the power of his Haki! Meanwhile the children of Big Mom gather as a massive force ready to smash Luffy and the Straw Hats. Their resentment at being embarrassed fuels their desire to get revenge!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !أفِق! هاكي ملاحظة قادر على تجاوز الأقوى
Erwache! – Das Observationshaki erreicht ein neues Level!
L`éveil. Une perception capable de surpasser le meilleur !
Mezamero: Saikyou o Koeru Kenbun Shoku!
Wake Up! The Color of Observation Able to Top the Strongest!
Пробуждение воли наблюдения! Превзойти сильнейшего!
目覚めろ 最強を越える見聞色!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Katakuri are locked in a duel to end all duels! Their powers ensure that each blow could be the last! Luffy must rely on his training, let all his thoughts out, and keep pushing on! Meanwhile, Sanji is about to land at Cacao Island!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !قبضة بسرعة سماويّة! تفعيل استخدام آخر للمستوى الرابع
A Fist of Divine Speed! Another Gear Four Application Activated!
Poing fulgurant. Activation du nouveau Gear Fourth !
Shinsoku no Ken: Aratanaru Gear 4 Hatsudou!
Volles Tempo – Eine neue Gear 4 Technik wird freigesetzt!
Кулак божественной скорости! Новая форма 4 Гира
神速の拳 新たなるギア4発動!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy`s dramatic battle finally draws to a close! But even if he is able to pull out victory in the last moment, can he remember the key to escaping the Mirrorworld?! Meanwhile, the whole host of the Big Mom Pirates watch the lonely mirror to see who will come through!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !انتهت أخيرًا! نهاية المعركة الشرسة ضد كاتاكوري
Das Finale – Der Kampf gegen Katakuri erreicht seinen Höhepunkt!
Finally, It`s Over! The Climax of the Intense Fight Against Katakuri!
Le dénouement tant attendu. Résultat du combat acharné contre Katakuri
Tsui ni Shuuketsu: Souzetsu Karakuri Sen no Yukue
Она наконец закончена! Кульминация битвы с Катакури
遂に終結 壮絶カタクリ戦の行方

REGULAR.description:
Luffy emerges safely! And Pekoms` bravery ensures he and the Straw Hats have a fighting chance! But can they withstand the full force of the Big Mom Pirates? At the last moment - a surprise explodes onto the scene!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Desperate Situation! The Iron-tight Entrapment of Luffy!
Eine verzweifelte Lage! – Ruffy in eisenharter Belagerung
Une situation désespérée ! Luffy pris dans un piège infernal !
Zettaizetsumei: Teppeki no Luffy Houimou!
Отчаянная ситуация! Непробиваемая западня Луффи!
وضع يائس! مُحاصرة لوفي المُحكمة
絶体絶命 鉄壁のルフィ包囲網!

REGULAR.description:
Sanji tries his best to save himself and his captain, Luffy! But the arrival of Germa has complicated matters. Whose side do these powerful superhumans fight on? In the end, sisterly love will see Sanji saved!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !الإفلات من حافة الهاوية. التعزيزات العظيمة، جيرما
Eine unerwartete Wendung – Germa 66 zur Rettung!
Kishikaisei: Saikyou no Engun Germa!
Pulling Back from the Brink! The Formidable Reinforcements: Germa!
Retournement de situation. Le meilleur des renforts, Germa !
Отступаем от края пропасти! Грозное подкрепление - Джерма!
起死回生 最強の援軍ジェルマ!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Sanji are safe! But the critical moment approaches - the fate of Totto Land rests on the taste of the wedding cake! Will it be sweet release or bitter defeat? Meanwhile, a cunning pincer attack leaves the Straw Hats hopelessly trapped. Only old, reliable comrades can save the day!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die letzte Hoffnung – Das Auftauchen der Sonnenpiraten!
Le dernier rempart. Les Pirates du Soleil débarquent
Saigo no Toride: Taiyou no Kaizokudan Arawaru
The Last Hope! The Sun Pirates Emerge!
Последняя надежда. Появления пиратов Солнца
الأمل الأخير! ظهور قراصنة الشمس
最後の砦 タイヨウの海賊団現る

REGULAR.description:
With the help of the Sun Pirates, the Straw Hats see their chance to escape! And the Sun Pirates bid farewell to their former captain. Mama finally tastes the Wedding Cake and the results are positively scrumptious!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Captivating Flavor! Sanji`s Cake of Happiness!
Ein hinreißender Geschmack – Sanjis Torte des Glücks
Miwaku no Aji: Shiawase no Sanji no Cake
Une saveur captivante. L`irrésistible gâteau de Sanji
Пленительный аромат! Торт счастья Санджи!
مذاق آسر! كعكة السعادة لسانجي
魅惑の味 幸せのサンジのケーキ

REGULAR.description:
The Big Mom Pirates fooled! The Straw Hats have eluded their would-be tormentors with the help of the Sun Pirates! However, as the fleet of the Big Mom Pirates is still coming after them, Jimbei makes a crucial decision to help the Sunny to get away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Mann von Güte und Gerechtigkeit! – Jimbei und die tosende Meeresströmung
Jingi no Otoko: Jinbee Kesshi no Taikairyuu
L`homme au code d`honneur. Un courant défiant la mort
The Man of Humanity and Justice! Jimbei, a Desperate Massive Ocean Current
Человек гуманности и правосудия - Джимбей. Отчаянный поток в океане
رجل الواجب والعدالة !جينبي والتّيّار البحريّ الضّخم اليائس!
仁義の漢[おとこ] ジンベエ決死の大海流

REGULAR.description:
At a great cost of energy and life, the Straw Hats make it out of Totto Land. Left behind in their wake are allies and friends, and would-be lovers. As the sea opens before them, what price has been paid for their escape?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le temps des adieux. Le dernier souhait de Pudding
Sekibetsu no Toki: Purin Saigo no "Onegai"
The Parting Time! Pudding`s Last Wish!
Zeit des Abschieds – Puddings letzter Wunsch
Время расставания. Последнее желание Пудинг
وقت الفراق! أمنية بودينغ الأخيرة!
惜別の時 プリン最後の"お願い"

REGULAR.description:
Luffy`s recent exploits make their way around the world! The reputation of this mighty pirate begins to grow as all eyes look towards the Straw Hats` next move! Also - German 66 leaves an artifact behind which excites the crew!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !العالم متفاجئ! ظهور الإمبراطور الخامس
Die Welt in Erstaunen! – Er ist der fünfte Kaiser der Meere!
Le monde entier abasourdi. Le cinquième Empereur
Sekai Kyougaku: Daigo no Umi no Koutei Arawaru!
The World Is Stunned! The Fifth Emperor of the Sea Emerges!
Мир в шоке! Появление пятого Ёнко
世界驚愕 第五の海の皇帝現る!

REGULAR.description:
As the royals make their way to the Reverie, the mighty Navy takes all precautions to make sure they don`t fall prey to kidnappings! At the vanguard is Koby, who glimpses Luffy`s exploits and remembers their shared past. Meanwhile, Luffy is confronted with a staggering change to his bounty!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !إلى ريفيري! اجتماع حلفاء طاقم قبعة القش
Auf zur Reverie! – Die Strohhut-Allianz versammelt sich!
Cap sur Rêverie. Les alliés de Luffy réunis
Reverie e: Shuuketsu! Mugiwara no Meiyuu-tachi
To the Reverie! The Straw Hats` Sworn Allies Come Together!
На собрание! Союзники Мугивары собрались вместе!
世界会議[レヴェリー]へ 集結! 麦わらの盟友達

REGULAR.description:
A vicious pirate group led by Pinkbeard who describes himself as one of Blackbeard’s affiliates attacks a town in the Kingdom of Lulucia while their king and able-bodied soldiers have gone to the Reverie. And four bizarre individuals come to help. They’re the captains of the Revolutionary Army.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !تحرك سابو! ظهور جميع قادة الجيش الثوري
Sabo Goes into Action! All the Captains of the Revolutionary Army Appear!
Sabo Ugoku: Kakumeigun Zengun Taichou Toujou!
Sabo sort de l`ombre. Les commandants révolutionnaires
Sabo tritt in Aktion! – Die Kommandanten der Revolutionsarmee erscheinen!
Сабо приступает к действиям! Появление всех капитанов революционной армии
サボ動く 革命軍全軍隊長登場!

REGULAR.description:
At New Marineford, Sakazuki, the new Admiral of the Fleet, hears the news about Luffy and recalls the tumultuous Paramount War that haunts the Navy! That game-changing war has repercussions that last into the present!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Er tritt in Aktion! – Der neue unerbittliche Großadmiral Sakazuki!
Going into Action! The Implacable New Admiral of the Fleet - Sakazuki!
Sakazuki passe à l`action. Le bouillant nouvel amiral
Ugokidasu: Shuunen no Shin Gensui Sakazuki
Пора действовать! Новый безумный главнокомандующий Сакадзуки!
التحرك! أميرال الأسطول الجديد الذي لا يلين - ساكازوكي
動き出す 執念の新元帥サカズキ

REGULAR.description:
Nobles from around the world gather for the Reverie as the echoes of the Paramount War resound! Among them are Shirahoshi and her family from the Ryugu Kingdom under the sea. Meanwhile, Admiral Fujitora has a conversation with his new colleague, Admiral Ryokugyu.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: !حرب القمة! إرادة ملك القراصنة الموروثة
Choujou Sensou: Tsugareta Kaizokuou no Ishi
Die Gipfelschlacht! – Der weitervererbte Wille des Piratenkönigs!
La guerre au sommet. L`héritage du Roi des pirates
The Paramount War! The Inherited Will of the King of the Pirates!
Великая война! Унаследованная воля Короля Пиратов
頂上戦争 継がれた海賊王の意思

REGULAR.description:
Stelly, Sabo’s adopted brother and now the king of the Goa Kingdom, walks up to Garp who is escorting the royal family of the Fish-Man Island, with an air of importance and something up his sleeve. Meanwhile, Shirahoshi sees the surface world for the first time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ihrem Traum ein Stück näher! – Shirahoshis Weg zur Sonne!
One Step Forward for Her Dream! Shirahoshi Goes Out in the Sun!
Plus près de son rêve. Shirahoshi sous le soleil
Yume no Ippo: Shirahoshi Taiyou no Shita e!
Один шаг к её мечте! Ширахоши выходит на солнечный свет!
‫خطوة إلى الأمام نحو حلمها! شيراهوشي تخرج إلى الشمس!
夢の一歩 しらほし太陽の下へ!

REGULAR.description:
Shirahoshi and her family finally reach the Holyland of Mariejois! But all the unexpected attention confuses her. Meanwhile, Vivi from Alabasta meets Leo and Rebecca from Dressrosa, and tells them the story of her journey with the Straw Hats.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aitai: Vivi to Rebecca no Omoi
I Miss Him! Vivi and Rebecca`s Sentiments!
Ich vermisse Ihn! – Vivis und Rebeccas Sehnsucht!
Nous voulons le revoir. Les souvenirs de Vivi et de Rebecca
Я скучаю по нему! Воспоминания Виви и Ребекки!
أفتقده! مشاعر فيفي وريبيكا!
会いたい ビビとレベッカの想い

REGULAR.description:
Vivi reunites with Dalton and Dr. Kureha from the Sakura Kingdom and they share their memories of the Straw Hats with Shirahoshi and Rebecca. Meanwhile, a shadowy figure descends a long staircase at the castle in the Holyland and opens a mysterious door.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dans l`ombre de la Terre Sainte. Le mystère du chapeau de paille géant !
In den Tiefen des heiligen Landes! – Ein mysteriöser riesiger Strohhut!
In the Dark Recesses of the Holyland! A Mysterious Giant Straw Hat!
Seichi no Yami: Nazo no Kyodai na Mugiwara Boushi
Тёмные секреты Святой Земли! Таинственная гигантская Соломенная шляпа!
ظُلمة الأرض المقدّسة !قبّعة القشّ العملاقة الغامضة!
聖地の闇 謎の巨大な麦わら帽子

REGULAR.description:
Shirahoshi crosses the fancy of a Celestial Dragon, and those living gods are not open to having their whims disobeyed! As she is dragged away, King Neptune comes to her rescue, risking life and limb by defying the Celestial Dragon, but luckily an old friend of the Ryugu Kingdom is on hand and tries to defuse the situation!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aufruhr im heiligen Land! – Shirahoshi in Ketten!
Du rififi en Terre Sainte. La princesse Shirahoshi en danger !
Seichi Souzen: Nerawareta Shirahoshi-hime!
The Holyland in Tumult! The Targeted Princess Shirahoshi!
Святая Земля в смятении! Принцесса Ширахоши в опасности!
اضطرابات في الأرض المقدّسة! الأميرة شيراهوشي مستهدفة!
聖地騒然 狙われたしらほし姫!

REGULAR.description:
The Emperors of the Sea, Big Mom and Kaido decide to team up against Luffy! Meanwhile, Garp hears about the wild exploits of his grandson, all while a mysterious outsider visits the highest authority in the world!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Explosive Situation! Two Emperors of the Sea Going After Luffy!
Isshokusokuhatsu: Luffy Nerau Futari no Yonkou
La poudrière. Deux Empereurs contre Luffy !
Wie ein Pulverfass! – Zwei Kaiser wollen Ruffys Kopf!
Взрывоопасная ситуация! Два Ёнко начинают охоту на Луффи!
وضع متفجّر! يسعى اثنان من اليونكو خلف لوفي!
一触即発 ルフィ狙う二人の四皇

REGULAR.description:
After sneaking into the Land of the Gods, Sabo sees the shocking figure of his friend – Kuma! Abused by the World Government as a pawn in their games, Kuma, who was made an example of what happens when you disobey the gods!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La colère de Sabo. La tragédie de Kuma le révolutionnaire !
Sabo Enraged! The Tragedy of the Revolutionary Army Officer Kuma!
Sabos Zorn! – Die Tragödie von Bär, dem Offizier der Revolutionsarmee!
Sabu Ikaru: Kakumeigun Kanbu Kuma no Higeki
Сабо в ярости! Трагическая история революционера Кумы!
سابو غاضب! مأساة ضابط الجيش الثّوريّ كوما!
サボ怒る 革命軍幹部くまの悲劇

REGULAR.description:
The Reverie has begun! The representative kings and queens first discuss what to do with Straw Hat Luffy. Meanwhile the Revolutionary Army confirms its desire to save Kuma! All while they recount how the Straw Hats have grown from upstarts into world players!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Endlich beginnt sie! – Eine Reverie voller Intrigen!
Finally, It Starts! The Conspiracy-filled Reverie!
Le coup d`envoi. Rêverie et complots !
Tsui ni Kaimaku: Inbou Uzumaku Reverie!
Начало конца! Заговор во время Собрания королей!
بدأت أخيرًا! قمّة ليفيلي المليئة بالمؤامرات!
遂に開幕 陰謀渦巻く世界会議[レヴェリー]!

REGULAR.description:
In order to recruit a strong ally towards bringing down Kaido, Cat Viper and his crew stop by Whitebeard’s homeland to see Marco, the 1st division commander of the Whitebeard Pirates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Marco! Shirohige no Katami no Shugosha
Marco! The Keeper of Whitebeard`s Last Memento!
Marco! – Der Hüter von Whitebeards Vermächtnis!
Marco. Le gardien du souvenir !
Марко! Хранитель последних воспоминаний о Белоусе!
ماركو! حارس ذكرى اللّحية البيضاء الأخيرة!
マルコ! 白ひげの形見の守護者

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and the others become excited as they see familiar faces in a newspaper article about the Reverie while they close in on the Land of Wano. But this dangerous and foreboding land is as inaccessible as it is mysterious! The sea itself is a barrier!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Climbing up a Waterfall! A Great Journey Through the Land of Wano`s Sea Zone!
Den Wasserfall hinauf! – Eine Reise durch die Meereszone von Wano Kuni!
La remontée de la cascade. À l`assaut de Wa !
Takinobori! Wano Kuni no Kaiiki Dai Koukai!
Забраться на водопад! Великое путешествие в страну Вано!
صعود شلاّل! رحلة عظيمة عبر منطقة بلاد وانو البحريّة!
滝登り! ワノ国の海域大航海!

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious country, a rampaging slasher, ancient samurai rituals of seppuku - and Zoro in the crosshairs! When a street assault occurs, all signs point to Zoro! Meanwhile, Luffy finally arrives at the Land of Wano but all his friends are nowhere to be found.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le pays de Wa. Samouraïs et fleurs de cerisier !
The Land of Wano! To the Samurai Country Where Cherry Blossoms Flutter!
Wa No Kuni! – Auf ins Land der Samurai und tanzenden Kirschblüten!
Wano Kuni! Sakura Mau Samurai no Kuni e
Страна Вано! Земли самураев с цветущей сакурой!
بلاد وانو! إلى بلاد السّاموراي حيث تتمايل براعم الكرز!
ワノ国! 桜舞うサムライの国へ

REGULAR.description:
Stranded alone on the beach, Luffy tries to gather his bearings only to be confronted by some mysterious, and dangerous, local fauna! And then, he meets a little girl named Otama! Meanwhile, Zoro makes trouble for the others who are trying to blend in!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: O-Tama apparaît. Luffy face aux sbires de Kaido !
O-Tama erscheint! – Ruffy gegen Kaidos Untergebene!
Otama Appears! Luffy vs. Kaido`s Army!
Otama Toujou: Luffy tai Kaidou Gun!
Появление О-Тамы! Луффи против армии Кайдо!
ظهور أوتاما، لوفي ضدّ جيش كايدو!
お玉登場 ルフィVS[たい]カイドウ軍!

REGULAR.description:
Otama`s gratitude towards Luffy knows no bounds! But the feast she cooks him exhausts her food stores completely! As she suffers from poor drinking water, her companion tells the story of the mysterious outsider she waits for - Ace!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Er wird kommen! – Die Legende von Ace auf Wano Kuni!
He`ll Come! The Legend of Ace in the Land of Wano!
Je reviendrai. La légende d`Ace à Wa !
Kanarazu Kuru: Wano Kuni no Ace Densetsu!
Он идёт! Появление Эйса в стране Вано!
سيأتين أسطورة إيس في بلاد وانو!
必ず来る ワノ国のエース伝説!

REGULAR.description:
Ambushed and outgunned by a skilled bounty hunter Cidre’s group, the Straw Hats rely on the Sunny`s Coup de Burst to escape! But they end up stranded without cola! A nearby soda island offers a solution - but Luffy is quickly in over his head! Luckily a vivacious old friend is nearby!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bonus-Folge! – Cidre, der größte Kopfgeldjäger der Welt!
Ellipse. Cidre, le terrible chasseur de primes !
Side Story! The World`s Greatest Bounty Hunter, Cidre!
Tokubetsu Hen! Saikyou no Shoukingari Cidre
Специальный эпизод! Величайший охотник за головами Сидр!
قصّة جانبيّة! سيدر، أعظم صيّادي المكافآت في العالم!
特別編! 最強の賞金狩りシードル

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Boa Hancock square off against the Cidre Guild! These unscrupulous bounty hunters have one thing in mind - profit at any cost! When the battle looks won, Cidre gears up in a menacing power suit!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bonus-Folge! – Ruffy gegen den Kohlensäure-König!
Ellipse. La fin du combat : Luffy contre le roi de gaz carbonique !
Side Story! Clash! Luffy vs. the King of Carbonation!
Tokubetsu Hen! Kessen! Luffy vs Tansan Ou
Специальный эпизод! Схватка! Луффи против Короля газировки!
قصّة جانبيّة! صدام! لوفي ضدّ ملك الكربنة!
特別編! 決戦! ルフィVS炭酸王

REGULAR.description:
Otama recounts her promise to Ace while Luffy rushes her to medical attention. But just as they reach the wasteland, a familiar face comes into view! But Kaido`s underlings show up too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il faut sauver O-Tama. Cavalcade à travers les friches !
Otama Sukue: Mugiwara Kouya o Kakeru!
Rettet O-Tama! – Der Strohhut eilt durchs Ödland!
Save Otama! Straw Hat, Bounding Through the Wasteland!
Спасти О-Таму! Путешествие Мугивар по пустоши!
إنقاذ أوتاما، قبّعة القشّ يجوب الأرض القفرة!
お玉救え 麦わら荒野を駆ける!

REGULAR.description:
Otama’s temperature is going up and Luffy has no time to waste! However, Hawkins, one of Kaido’s Headliners, blocks their way by showing his unique powers and skills which can harm his own men.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Headliner! – Hawkins, der Magier erscheint!
Le Mestre. Hawkins le magicien abat ses cartes !
Shin`uchi! Majutsushi Hawkins Toujou
The Headliner! Hawkins the Magician Appears!
Лидер! Появление фокусника Хокинса!
النّجم! ظهور هوكينس السّاحر!
真打ち! 魔術師ホーキンス登場

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Zoro have been stalled by Hawkins but their fortune looks bright as they are guided by a woman who Zoro had saved. She leads them to a teahouse and to an herbal remedy for the river poison. All the while, old acquaintances look on from a distance!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: De la défaite dans l`air. L`homme de paille attaque !
Defeat Is Inevitable! The Strawman`s Fierce Attack!
Eine sichere Niederlage! – Der gewaltige Angriff des Strohmanns!
Haiboku Kakutei: Strawman no Moukou!
Поражение неизбежно! Жестокая атака соломенной куклы!
لا مفرّ من الهزيمة، هجوم رجل القشّ الضّاري!
敗北確定 ストローマンの猛攻!

REGULAR.description:
Otama`s life is saved by Otsuru at her teahouse. The proud Otama finds it hard to take more kindness. The group learns of the Okobore Town - living on the cast-offs of the officials! Then, suddenly, they were attacked by the Shogun’s men!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der schönste Tag! – O-Tamas erste süße Bohnensuppe!
Le plus beau jour de sa vie. O-Tama et la pâte de haricot rouge !
Saikou no Hi: Otama Hajimete no Oshiruko
The Greatest Day of My Life! Otama and Her Sweet Red-bean Soup!
Лучший день в жизни! Первая сирука О-Тамы
أفضل يوم في حياتي، أوتاما وحساء الفاصولياء الحمراء الحلوة
最高の日 お玉初めてのおしるこ

REGULAR.description:
Otama has been kidnapped by the Gifters! She is taken to a flourishing town called Bakura Town where a creepy-looking Headliner was expecting her. Luffy and Zoro rush to rescue her along with a samurai, Okiku!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Charging into the Enemy`s Territory! Bakura Town: Where Officials Thrive!
Percée en territoire ennemi. Bakura, la ville des administrateurs !
Tekijin Totsunyuu: Yakunin Habikoru Bakura-chou!
Vorstoß in feindliches Gebiet! – Bakura, die Stadt der Beamten!
На территории врага! Город Баккура, где процветают чиновники!
الاندفاع نحو منطقة العدوّ، بلدة باكورا، حيث يعيش المسؤولون برخاء!
敵陣突入 役人はびこる博羅町!

REGULAR.description:
As Luffy, Zoro, and Okiku bounce through Bakura Town on Komachiyo’s back, looking for the kidnapped Otama, a sumo wrestler comes flying towards them! Interested, they go down to watch sumo but the undefeated yokozuna Urashima has been expecting Okiku there and shows his brutal nature!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auftritt des Yokozuna – Die Jagd des unbesiegbaren Urashima auf O-Kiku!
L`offensive du yokozuna. Urashima et O-Kiku !
The Yokozuna Appears! The Invincible Urashima Goes After Okiku!
Yokozuna Toujou: Okiku Nerau Muteki no Urashima!
Появление Ёкодзуны! Непобедимый Урошима идёт за Аокику!
ظهور اليوكوزونا، أوراشيما المنيع يلاحق أوكيكو!
横綱登場 お菊狙う無敵の浦島!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy challenges Urashima, the strongest yokozuna in the Land of Wano, to a sumo match! Urashima even uses illegal moves to beat Luffy at any cost! Meanwhile, Holdem tells Otama that he knows she committed a crime and he has to punish her for it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Climactic Sumo Battle! Straw Hat vs. the Strongest Ever Yokozuna!
Combat de sumo. Luffy affronte le yokozuna !
Ein gnadenloser Sumo-Wettkampf! – Der Strohhut gegen den stärksten Yokozuna!
Sumou Kessen: Mugiwara vs Saikyou no Yokozuna!
Кульминация битвы сумо! Мугивара против сильнейшего Ёкодзуны!
معركة سومو حامية، قبّعة القشّ ضدّ اليوكوزونا الأقوى!
相撲決戦 麦わらVS最強の横綱!

REGULAR.description:
After sending the yokozuna Urashima flying, Luffy and his clan continue their search for Bakura Town’s boss to save Otama! They finally find the boss, Holdem, one of the Beast Pirates’ Headliners, and Otama who is hanging in the mouth of a lion in Holdem’s stomach.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La colère de Luffy. À la rescousse d`O-Tama !
Luffy Gekido: Pinch no Otama o Sukue!
Luffy Rages! Rescue Otama from Danger!
Ruffys Zorn! – Rettet O-Tama!
Луффи в ярости! Спасти О-Таму из плена!
يستشيط لوفي غضبًا، إنقاذ أوتاما من أنياب الخطر!
ルフィ激怒 ピンチのお玉を救え!

REGULAR.description:
Facing Holdem who is holding Otama as hostage, Luffy prepares for a fight but Okiku tries to stop him by sharing who is really ruling the region. Meanwhile, Basil Hawkins who is also working for Kaido and chasing after Luffy, is confronted by a mysterious figure.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Il faut libérer O-Tama. L`affrontement contre Holdem !
Otama Dakkan: Gekitou! Holdem Sen!
Rettet O-Tama! – Ein erbitterter Kampf gegen Holdem!
Taking Back Otama! A Fierce Fight Against Holdem!
Вернуть О-Таму! Яростная битва против Холдема!
استعادة أوتاما! قتالٌ شرس ضدّ هولديم!
お玉奪還 激闘! ホールデム戦!

REGULAR.description:
Taking down Holdem, Luffy rescues Otama and tries to catch up to Zoro and Okiku who stole the food treasure ship and started a mad dash to get out of the town! Meanwhile, Trafalgar Law’s attempt to silence Basil Hawkins fails when he hears bad news about his alliance.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel! The Magician and the Surgeon of Death!
Duell! – Der Magier und der Chirurg des Todes!
Ikkiuchi: Majutsushi to Shi no Gekai!
Le duel. Magicien et le chirurgien de la mort !
Дуэль! Маг и Хирург смерти!
نزال! السّاحر ضدّ جرّاح الموت!
一騎打ち 魔術師と死の外科医!

REGULAR.description:
This is a story of Luffy in an alternate reality. While sailing on the sea by himself, a strange bird crashes into his small boat. He looks up to find a giant ship where a girl named Ann has been captured. It seems like the bird belongs to her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 20 Shuunen Tokubetsu Hen "Romance Dawn"
20周年特別編「ROMANCE DAWN」
Romance Dawn
Romance Dawn!
Épisode spécial 20 ans. Romance Dawn !
Специальный выпуск к двадцатилетию One Piece! Romance Dawn
حلقة فجر المغامرة الخاصّة

REGULAR.description:
Zoro and the others dash out of BakuraTown on the treasure ship filled with food! Luffy catches up to them bringing ahuge bucket of fresh water! Then, they distribute the food and the water to thepeople of Okobore Town who were thirsty and hungry.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Ankunft des Essensschiffes! – Ruffytaro revanchiert sich!
Le char de vivres. Luffytaro s`acquitte de ses dettes !
Takarabune Tourai: Luffytarou no Ongaeshi!
The Coming of the Treasure Ship! Luffytaro Returns the Favor!
Прибытие корабля с сокровищами! Луффитаро возвращает долг!
قدوم سفينة الكنز! لوفيتارو يردّ المعروف!
宝船到来 ルフィ太郎の恩返し!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy arrives at the ruins of Oden Castle following Law and finds the graves of his friends, Kin’emon and the others. As Law starts telling the already-stunned Luffy about the creepy story of Kin’emon’s ghost, Luffy sees it coming towards him!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mysterious Grave Markers! A Reunion at the Ruins of Oden Castle!
Mysteriöse Grabsteine! – Wiedervereinigung in den Ruinen von Schloss Oden!
Mystérieuses pierres tombales. Retrouvailles au château !
Nazo no Bohyou: Oden Jou Ato de no Saikai!
Загадочные надписи на могилах! Воссоединение на руинах замка Оден
شواهد قبور غامضة! لقاء في أنقاض قلعة أودن!
謎の墓標 おでん城跡での再会!

REGULAR.description:
Kin’emon tells Luffy and the others about how Kozuki Oden made Kuri into a peaceful region and became its Daimyo. However, he was set up by Kaido and Kurozumi Orochi and executed. Kin’emon and his fellow vassals ran to Oden Castle in flames to save Oden’s wife Toki and children but Toki told him a shocking truth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Legendary Samurai! The Man Who Roger Admired!
Densetsu no Samurai: Roger ga Horeta Otoko!
Ein legendärer Samurai! – Der Mann, den Roger bewunderte!
Le samouraï légendaire. L`homme qui charma même Roger !
Легендарный самурай! Человек, которым восхищался Роджер!
ساموراي أسطوريّ! الرّجل الّذي حظي بإعجاب روجر!
伝説の侍 ロジャーが惚れた男!

REGULAR.description:
Kin’emon and the others crossed through time by the power of Kozuki Toki, Momonosuke’s mother, and arrived at the Land of Wano 20 years later, a totally different country before their eyes. However, discovering that there were still their allies there, they started preparing to take down Kaido and Orochi who ruined the country.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bringing Down the Emperor of the Sea! A Secret Raid Operation Begins!
Datou Yonkou: Gokuhi Uchiiri Sakusen Hatsudou
Détrôner l`empereur. Une opération secrète est lancée !
Sturz eines Kaisers der Meere! Die geheime Überfalloperation beginnt!
Свергнуть Йонко! Секретная рейдовая операция началась!
أطيحوا باليونكو! عمليّة إغارة سرّيّة تبدأ!
打倒四皇 極秘討ち入り作戦発動

REGULAR.description:
Ashura Doji, one of the allies Kin’emon wants to search for, has become the head of a thieves brigade and they now raid Okobore Town taking away the food that Luffy gave to the people. Ashura Doji, under the name Shutenmaru, then faces Kaido’s right-hand man and gets into a fierce fight!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der stärkste Mann! Shutenmaru der Anführer der Diebesbande!
Le plus puissant des hommes. Le chef des brigands, Shutenmaru !
Saikyou no Otoko: Touzokudan Touryou Shutenmaru!
The Strongest Man in the World! Shutenmaru, the Thieves Brigade Chief!
Сильнейший человек! Шутенмару—предводитель воров!
الرّجل الأقوى في العالم! شوتنمارو، قائد جماعة اللّصوص!
最強の男 盗賊団棟梁・酒天丸!

REGULAR.description:
The drunken Kaido flies above Okobore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shutenmaru and all the people in the town. Luffy, Law, Kin’emon, and Okiku start running towards the town to rescue them. However, Kaido heads towards the ruins of Oden Castle where they left their crew behind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auf einen Schlag! Kaidos lodernder Flammen-Atem!
Everyone Is Annihilated! Kaido`s Furious Blast Breath!
L`équipage décimé. Le souffle ardent de Kaido !
Zen`in Shoumetsu: Kaidou Ikari no Boro Breath!
Все уничтожены! Взрывное дыхание Кайдо!
الجميع هالكون! نفَس كايدو الغاضب المفجّر!
全員消滅 カイドウ怒りのボロブレス!

REGULAR.description:
After Luffy sees Kaido shattering the ruins of Oden Castle where he left his friends, he becomes enraged and attacks Kaido! Soon after, he finds out Kaido even assaulted Otama who was riding on Speed’s back to her home. Furious, Luffy reveals himself to Kaido and starts to retaliate!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein gnadenloser Kampf! Ruffy gegen Kaido!
Enfin, la rencontre. Luffy, enragé, défie Kaido !
Finally Clashing! The Ferocious Luffy vs. Kaido!
Tsui ni Gekitotsu: Moukou Luffy vs Kaidou
Долгожданное столкновение! Луффи против Кайдо!
اصطدما أخيرًا! لوفي الكاسر ضدّ كايدو!
遂に激突 猛攻ルフィVSカイドウ

REGULAR.description:
An infuriated Luffy strikes blow after blow on the drunken Kaido. When he activates Gear Four Bounce-Man and launches even more powerful attacks, Kaido fights back and knocks him out with just one blow. Law tries to rescue Luffy but is interrupted by Hawkins and now Kaido approaches Luffy, unconscious on the ground.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Destructive! One Shot, One Kill: Thunder Bagua!
Dévastation. Le Grondement du tonnerre divin !
Hakaiteki! Ichigeki Hissatsu no Raimei Hakke!
Überwältigende Macht! Der vernichtende Bagua-Donnerschlag!
Разрушительный! Один удар, одно убийство - Восемь триграмм!
مدمّرة! الضربة الواحدة القاتلة - باغوا الرعديّة!
破壊的! 一撃必殺の雷鳴八卦!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy gets beaten by Kaido and is sent to a great mine where prisoners are made to work in forced labor. There, he finds an unexpected reunion. Meanwhile, Okiku is rushing to the ruins of Oden Castle in order to confirm the safety of the Straw Hats and the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Living Hell! Luffy, Humiliated in the Great Mine!
Hölle auf Erden! Ruffys Demütigung in der großen Mine!
Ikijigoku: Luffy Kutsujoku no Dai Saikutsuba
L`enfer sous terre. Luffy et l`ignominie minière !
Настоящий Ад! Униженный Луффи в Великой Шахте!
جحيم حي! لوفي، مهان في منجم عظيم!
生き地獄 ルフィ屈辱の大採掘場

REGULAR.description:
On Gloom Island in the Grand Line, Perona finds out that her captain, Gecko Moria, is alive and she is about to leave Dracule Mihawk who let her stay there for the last two years. Meanwhile, Moria raids the Pirate Island of Fullalead with his zombie army to take back his friend from Blackbeard.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das heilige Land in Aufruhr! Kaiser Blackbeards überhebliches Lachen!
Grabuge en Terre sainte. Barbe Noire n`a peur de rien !
Seichi Gekidou: Futeki ni Warau Yonkou Kurohige
The Holyland in Tumult! Emperor of the Sea Blackbeard Cackles!
Святая Земля в смятении! Бесстрашный смех Йонко Чёрной Бороды!
اضطراب في الأرض المقدسة! ضحكة اليونكو اللحية السوداء الجريئة!
聖地激動 不敵に笑う四皇黒ひげ

REGULAR.description:
Dogstorm fights against Shutenmaru to ally with him for their operation but Shutenmaru still rejects their call. Meanwhile, Sanji and the others are on their mission to recruit like-minded people who become skeptical as they receive the secret message from the Kozuki Clan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En avant ! Un complot pour évincer Kaido !
Er setzt sich in Bewegung - Der große Plan zum Sturz Kaidos!
It`s On! The Special Operation to Bring Down Kaido!
Ugokidasu: Datou Kaidou Dai Keikaku!
Началось! Специальная операция по уничтожению Кайдо!
بدأت! الخطة الخاصة للإطاحة بكايدو!
動き出す 打倒カイドウ大計画!

REGULAR.description:
In the Excavation Labor Camp, Luffy competes against Kid by hauling stones for food and they both get tons of it. However, Dobon, a vice warden, becomes furious when he finds out all their provisions are gone, and gives Luffy and Kid a new sentence: death.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ooabare! Shuujin Luffy to Kid!
Rampage! The Prisoners: Luffy and Kid!
Remue-ménage. Les prisonniers, Luffy et Kid !
Riesenaufstand! Ruffy und Kid hinter Gittern!
Ярость! Заключённые Луффи и Кид!
ثوران! السجينان، لوفي وكيد!
大暴れ! 囚人ルフィとキッド!

REGULAR.description:
Sanji’s Special Soba becomes very popular but some gang members come to disturb his business and knock over a customer’s bowl. Infuriated, Sanji takes them down and gives the customer, a little girl named Toko, another serving. Later, Sanji and his friends find out that Toko is an attendant to an important figure in the Land of Wano.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Sensation! Sanji`s Special Soba!
Dai Hyouban! Sanji no Ohako Soba!
Die Riesensensation! - Sanjis Spezial-Buchweizennudeln!
Un succès fou. Les nouilles spéciales de Sanji !
Большая сенсация! Особая соба Санджи!
ضجّة كبيرة! سوبا سانجي الخاصة!
大評判! サンジの十八番[おはこ]そば!

REGULAR.description:
Wano’s top courtesan Komurasaki is in procession and slowly makes her way to Orochi Palace. There is a crowd of people on the street as well as Sanji and the others. While everyone is fascinated by her, some seeking vengeance get in the Oiran’s way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eine Augenweide: Die Schönheit Wano-Lands – Komurasaki
Goukakenran: Wano Kuni Ichi no Bijo Komurasaki!
Luxe et splendeur. La courtisane de Wa, Komurasaki !
Luxurious and Gorgeous! Wano`s Most Beautiful Woman: Komurasaki!
Роскошная и Великолепная! Самая красивая женщина Страны Вано - Комурасаки!
فاخرة وفاتنة! أجمل نساء وانو، كوموراساكي!
豪華絢爛 ワノ国一の美女・小紫

REGULAR.description:
Zoro who has been wandering around the Land of Wano since he got separated from his friends meets a sycophant named Tonoyasu. Tonoyasu paid for Zoro’s sushi and to pay him back, Zoro gambles at dice. However, he realizes that the dealer and the others are cheating.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Tale of Chivalry! Zoro and Tonoyasu`s Little Trip!
Eine Geschichte über Ritterlichkeit! - Zorro und Tonoyasu auf Reisen!
Ninkyou Den! Zoro to Tonoyasu Futari Tabi!
Roman de chevalerie. Les tribulations de Zoro et de Tonoyasu !
Повесть о рыцарстве! Маленькое путешествие Зоро и Тоноясу
قصّة شهامة! رحلة زورو وتونوياسو الصّغيرة!
任侠伝! ゾロとトの康二人旅!

REGULAR.description:
Zoro is taken to the sycophant Tonoyasu’s poor hometown, Ebisu Town where people laugh away their misfortune. On the other hand, Wano’s Shogun – Orochi has a lavish banquet while Big Mom is closing in on the country at a furious speed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A State of Emergency! Big Mom Closes In!
Der Ausnahmezustand - Big Moms gewaltiger Anmarsch!
Kinkyuujidai: Big Mom Dai Sekkin!
État d`urgence. Big Mom en approche !
Чрезвычайное положение! Появление Большой Мамочки
حالة طارئة! بيغ مام تقترب!
緊急事態 ビッグ・マム大接近!

REGULAR.description:
As the Big Mom Pirates approach the Land of Wano, Kaido’s subordinates led by King and Queen try to get rid of them. Meanwhile, in the Flower Capital, another member of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, Page One, attacks every soba restaurant in the city, in search of Sanji.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Miyako Souzen! Sanji Nerau Arata na Shikaku
The Capitol in an Uproar! Another Assassin Targets Sanji!
Tumult in der Hauptstadt! - Ein neuer Attentäter nimmt Sanji aufs Korn
Tumulte à la capitale. Un nouveau tueur menace Sanji !
Волнение в столице! Ещё один убийца нацелен на Санджи!
اضطراب في العاصمة! قاتل آخر يستهدف سانجي!
都騒然! サンジ狙う新たな刺客

REGULAR.description:
Sanji faces Page One, a Headliner of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, who questions the soba cook’s true identity. Sanji uses Germa’s device for the first time and transforms himself into Stealth Black while dubbing himself Soba Mask.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Katsuyaku! Seigi no Osoba Mask!
Dashing! The Righteous Soba Mask!
Die Heldentat! Der Buchweizen-Ranger der Gerechtigkeit!
Un fier guerrier. O-soba Mask, le justicier masqué !
Стремительный! Особая соба-маска!
اندفاع! مقنّع السّوبا النّزيه!
大活躍! 正義のおそばマスク!

REGULAR.description:
While the banquet grows livelier at Orochi’s Castle, Robin is confronted by his ninja force called Oniwabanshu. In the meanwhile in Kuri, Chopper, Tama, and Momonosuke train themselves preparing for the incoming battle but are interrupted when they find someone washed up on the beach.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Desperate Situation! Orochi`s Menacing Oniwabanshu!
Catastrophe. Les redoutables espions d`Orochi !
Eine verzweifelte Situation - Die bedrohlichen Orochi-Geheimagenten
Zettaizetsumei: Kyoui no Orochi Oniwaban Shuu
Отчаянная ситуация! Грозные Онивабаншу Орочи!
وضع يائس! أونيوابانشو، قوّات أوروتشي الخطيرة!
絶体絶命 脅威のオロチお庭番衆

REGULAR.description:
At the banquet, the Shogun Orochi starts to talk about his late old enemy which bores the attendees. Suddenly, the Oiran’s child attendant Toko bursts with laughter and won’t stop. Orochi becomes furious and attacks her, but an unexpected person stands in his way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Bankett des Gemetzels - Die Riesenschlange des Zorns, Shogun Orochi
Pandemonium! The Monster Snake, Shogun Orochi!
Shuraba! Ikareru Daija: Shougun Orochi
Une scène de cauchemar. Orochi, le monstre à écailles !
Ад кромешный! Змей-монстр сёгун Орочи!
فوضى عارمة! الثّعبان الوحش، الشّوغن أوروتشي
修羅場! 怒れる大蛇 将軍オロチ

REGULAR.description:
In order to save her child attendant Toko, the top Oiran Komurasaki stands up to the Shogun Orochi, but the yakuza boss Kyoshiro interrupts and does something that no one expected. Meanwhile, Robin is trying to get out of Orochi’s Castle with the help of Nami and Brook.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Blüte fällt ab! Der letzte Moment der Schönheit von Wano-Land
Hana Chiru! Wano Kuni Ichi no Bijo no Saigo
The Flower Falls! The Final Moment of the Most Beautiful Woman in the Land of Wano!
Un pétale s`envole. La grande beauté de Wano s`éteint !
Падение цветка! Последний миг самой красивой женщины Вано!
سقوط الزّهرة! اللّحظة الأخيرة لأجمل نساء بلاد وانو!
花散る! ワノ国一の美女の最期

REGULAR.description:
Nami, Robin, and the others got away from Oden’s Castle and now discuss what they have found out about the enemy so far. Meanwhile, Chopper’s group sets off to rescue Luffy from the Excavation Labor Camp where, at the same time, Luffy is in big trouble.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Band zwischen Gefangenen - Ruffy und Opa Hyo!
L`amitié derrière les barreaux. Luffy et le vieux Hyo !
Shuujin no Kizuna: Luffy to Hyou-jii!
The Bond Between Prisoners! Luffy and Old Man Hyo!
Связь между заключёнными! Луффи и Дедуля Хё!
الرّابط بين سجينين، لوفي والعجوز هيو!
囚人の絆 ルフィとヒョウじい!

REGULAR.description:
At the Excavation Labor Camp in Udon, Luffy tries to save Old Man Hyo and stands up to Vice Warden Daifuku and Warden Babanuki with his physical strength weakened by the Sea Prism Stone cuffs. Then when a Lead Performer of the Animal Kingdom Pirates, Queen the Plague, comes to the camp, Luffy makes an escape!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Lead Performer! Queen the Plague Emerges!
All-Star! Queen, die Seuche, erscheint auf der Bühne!
Ookanban! Ekisai no Queen Arawaru!
Une superstar entre en scène. Queen la Pandémie !
Верховный лидер! Появление Бедствия Квин!
من كبار النّجوم! ظهور كوين الطّاعون!
大看板! 疫災のクイーン現る!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Old Man Hyo try to climb up the wall and break out of the Excavation Labor Camp, but Queen the Plague stands in their way and gives them a hard time! Meanwhile, Nami and Robin experience a public bathhouse along with Shinobu and come to know about the Land of Wano’s great yakuza boss.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Climb Up! Luffy`s Desperate Escape!
Klettere hinauf - Ruffys verzweifelter Fluchtversuch!
Yojinobore: Luffy Kesshi no Tousougeki!
À l`assaut de la muraille. Luffy tente de s`échapper !
Подъем наверх! Отчаянный побег Луффи!
تسلّق! هروب لوفي اليائس!
よじ登れ ルフィ決死の逃走劇!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy fights quite a few Queen’s men at once in the deadly sumo match while protecting Old Man Hyo! Meanwhile, Nami, Robin, and Shinobu are cornered as Hawkins comes to raid the bathhouse. However, someone who they don’t expect to be there pops up from nowhere to save them.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Dead or Alive! Queen`s Sumo Inferno!
La vie ou la mort. Le grand Sumo Inferno de Queen !
Sei ka Shi ka: Queen no Oosumou Inferno
Tot oder lebendig - Queens Sumo-Inferno
Живой или мертвый! Адское сумо Квина!
حيّ أو ميت! سومو الجحيم الخاصّ بكوين!
生か死か クイーンの大相撲地獄[インフェルノ]

REGULAR.description:
Luffy deals with the endless supply of opponents trying to figure out the way to use Haki that Rayleigh taught him a while ago. Meanwhile, Zoro faces Gyukimaru who is accusing him of stealing Shusui, however, their duel is interrupted by a woman’s scream.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyukimaru! Zoro Fights a Duel on Bandit`s Bridge!
Gyukimaru! Zorros Kampf auf der Wegelagererbrücke
Gyukimaru. Zoro se bat sur le pont des brigands !
Gyuukimaru! Zoro Oihagi Bashi no Kettou
Гюкимару! Зоро сражается на дуэли на бандитском мосту!
غيوكيمارو! يخوض زورو نزالاً على جسر قطّاع الطّرق!
牛鬼丸! ゾロおいはぎ橋の決闘

REGULAR.description:
The duel between Zoro and Gyukimaru is interrupted by Kamazo, Orochi’s assassin who came after a little girl Toko. Without Shusui, Zoro has a hard time fighting the two at the same time, but he finds an unlikely third sword to take down the enemies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Big Turnover! The Three-Sword Style Overcomes Danger!
Dai Gyakuten! Shisen o Koeta Santou Ryuu!
Das Blatt wendet sich! Der Dreischwertstil überwindet die Todesschwelle!
Retournement de situation. Sauvé par les trois sabres
Большой круговорот! Трехмечевой стиль побеждает опасность!
تغيّر كبير! يتخطّى أسلوب السّيوف الثّلاثة الخطر!
大逆転! 死線を越えた三刀流!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy’s next enemies in the deadly sumo match in the Excavation Labor Camp are two tough Gifters. Much to Old Man Hyo’s surprise, Luffy keeps practicing using Haki properly at the same time as he fights them. Meanwhile, the wounded Zoro wakes up to find out the stunning identity of the mysterious woman he saved.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zoro Kyougaku: Shougeki! Nazo no Bijo no Shoutai
Zoro est stupéfait. La troublante révélation de la beauté !
Zoro, Stunned! The Shocking Identity of the Mysterious Woman!
Zorro ist verblüfft - Die schockierende Identität der mysteriösen Schönheit
Зоро ошеломлён! Шокирующая личность таинственной женщины!
ذهول زورو، هويّة المرأة الغامضة الصّادمة!
ゾロ驚愕 衝撃! 謎の美女の正体

REGULAR.description:
Hiyori tells Zoro a stunning story of escaping the incident 20 years ago and surviving until the present day. Meanwhile, Luffy stills struggles to master the Haki of the Color of Arms, but a surprising person steps up and gives an example.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Etoku Seyo: Wano Kuni no Haki Ryuuou!
Get the Hang of It! The Land of Wano`s Haki: Ryuo!
Meistere die Technik - Das Haki Wano-Lands, Ryuo!
Un coup à prendre. Le courant, le Fluide de Wano !
Всё получится! Хаки страны Вано - Рюо!
إدراك الأمر برمّته، هاكي بلاد وانو، ريو!
会得せよ ワノ国の覇気・流桜!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy continues training himself to use Haki with Old Man Hyo’s help, but the battle is suddenly suspended and shortly thereafter Raizo appears in front of them. Meanwhile, Nami, Usopp, and the others are wondering who Tonoyasu, Ebisu Town’s hero, really is.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tonoyasu! Der meistgeliebte Mensch in ganz Ebisu!
Tonoyasu! Ebisu Chouichi no Ninkimono!
Tonoyasu! Ebisu Town`s Most Loved!
Tonoyasu. La coqueluche d’Ebisu !
Тоноясу! Самый любимый в городе Эбису!
تونوياسو! أكثر الأشخاص المحبوبين في بلدة إبيسو!
トの康! えびす町一の人気者!

REGULAR.description:
Ushimitsu Kozo the great thief who robbed from the rich and gave to the poor gets caught and his true identity stuns Orochi and the others. When Toko hears the news, she gets very upset and so is Zoro when he hears the reason.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hohe Wellen werden geschlagen - Die Identität des edlen Diebes Kozo Ushimitsu
La rumeur se répand. L`identité du voleur au grand cœur !
Shaking the Nation! The Identity of Ushimitsu Kozo the Chivalrous Thief!
Shougeki Hashiru: Gizoku Ushimitsu Kozou no Shoutai
Народ в шоке! Личность вора-рыцаря Ушимитсу Кодзо!
خبرّ يهزّ البلاد، هويّة اللّص الشّهم أوشيميتسو كوزو
衝撃走る 義賊丑三つ小僧の正体

REGULAR.description:
Tonoyasu has been strung up and is soon-to-be executed. The people of the Land of Wano recognize who he really is and start raising their voice while the Straw Hats rush to save him. Then, Tonoyasu starts addressing the nation and the corrupt Shogun Orochi.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Sprint der Strohhüte! Die Rettung des gefangenen Tonoyasus
Ichimi Hashiru! Sukue Toraware no Tonoyasu
L`équipage s`élance. Il faut sauver Tonoyasu !
The Straw Hats Run! Save the Captive Tonoyasu!
Мугивары в действии! Спасти пленного Тоноясу!
اندفاع طاقم قبّعة القشّ! إنقاذ تونوياسو الأسير
一味疾[はし]る! 救え囚われのトの康

REGULAR.description:
By the time Kin’emon and the others notice that Yasuie is trying to sacrifice his life to save their raid plan, it was all too late. Ebisu Town`s people laughing out loud annoys Zoro, but when Hiyori tells him the reason behind it, he is in for a shock!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La colère de Zoro. La vérité sur les Smiles !
Zoro no Ikari: Smile no Shinjitsu!
Zoro`s Fury! The Truth About the Smile!
Zorros Zorn - Die Wahrheit über SMILE!
Ярость Зоро! Правда о SMILE!
غضب زورو، الحقيقة وراء سمايل!
ゾロの怒り SMILEの真実!

REGULAR.description:
Hiyori and Shinobu tearfully tell the Straw Hats the truth behind Ebisu Town residents` cheerfulness and smiles, which infuriates them. When Yasuie’s daughter, Toko, runs to her father’s body, Orochi recognizes who she is and takes a shot at her!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les larmes de Toko. Les balles cruelles d`Orochi !
Toko no Namida! Orochi Hijou no Juudan!
Toko`s Tears! Orochi`s Pitiless Bullets!
Tokos Tränen - Orochis erbarmungslose Kugeln
Слёзы Токо! Безжалостные пули Орочи!
دموع توكو! رصاصات أوروتشي عديمة الرّحمة!
トコの涙! オロチ非情の銃弾!

REGULAR.description:
Zoro and Sanji start fighting against Orochi’s clan. Nami and the rest of the Straw Hats join them. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp, a new criminal, Hitokiri Kamazo, has arrived. And someone else who is brought to the site reveals the shocking truth about Kamazo.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Strohhüte greifen ein - Tumult! Todeskampf auf dem Hinrichtungsplatz
Ichimi Rannyuu! Souzen! Shokeijou no Gekitou
L`équipage monte au créneau. Combat sur la place des supplices !
The Straw Hats Step In! An Uproarious Deadly Battle at the Execution Ground!
Мугивары вступают в игру! Шумная битва на месте казни!
تدخّل طاقم قبّعة القشّ! معركة مميتة مدوّية في ساحة الإعدام!
一味乱入! 騒然! 処刑場の激闘

REGULAR.description:
Zoro keeps fighting Kyoshiro, but Orochi’s Oniwabanshu comes to back Kyoshiro up. Meanwhile, at the Excavation Labor Camp, Queen announces the restart of the Sumo Inferno with a new cruel rule which is painful not only to Luffy, but also to Drake and Killer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La résolution de Luffy. Le Sumo Inferno doit prendre fin !
Luffy no Ketsui: Yabure Oozumou Inferno!
Luffy`s Determination! Win Through the Sumo Inferno!
Ruffys Entschlossenheit - Triumphiere beim Sumo-Inferno!
Решимость Луффи! Победить в Адском сумо!
عزيمة لوفي! الفوز بنزالات سومو الجحيم!
ルフィの決意 破れ大相撲地獄[インフェルノ]!

REGULAR.description:
Kin’emon apologizes Ashura Doji AKA Shutenmaru for goading Holdem to attack Atamayama where Ashura’s hideout was located, and asks him to join the fight against Kaido. Meanwhile, Chopper and his group finally arrived at the Excavation Labor Camp and Big Mom forces her way in to find her favorite soup!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Arashi Tourai! Ooabare Big Mom!
Der Sturm ist gekommen - Big Mom läuft Amok
La tempête s’abat. Big Mom fait un carnage !
The Storm Has Come! A Raging Big Mom!
И грянул гром! Разъярённая Большая Мамочка!
ضربت العاصفة! بيغ مام الهائجة!
嵐到来! 大暴れビッグ・マム!

REGULAR.description:
Craving red-bean soup, Big Mom attacks Queen, the Animal Kingdom Pirates’ Lead Performer who reins over Udon. However, when she finds out that the pot is empty, she turns her wrath against the one who ate it all: Luffy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Grudge over Red-bean Soup! Luffy Gets into a Desperate Situation!
Der Süßbohnensuppen-Groll - Ruffys Leben steht auf Messers Schneide
Les haricots de la colère. Ça sent le roussi pour Luffy !
Oshiruko no Urami: Luffy Zettaizetsumei
Обида из-за сируко! Луффи в отчаянном положении!
ضغينة بسبب حساء الفاصولياء الحمراء! يُوضع لوفي في وضع يائس!
おしるこの恨み ルフィ絶体絶命

REGULAR.description:
After finding out that Luffy ate the whole pot ofthe red-bean soup that she was looking for, Big Mom becomes infuriated and goesafter him. Meanwhile, Queen, the Lead Performer, comes up with a plan to stopthe rampaging Big Mom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haltet die Kaiserin der Meere auf - Queens Geheimplan
Neutraliser l`Impératrice. La ruse de Queen !
Stop the Emperor of the Sea! Queen`s Secret Plan!
Yonkou o Tomero! Queen no Hisaku
Остановить Йонко! Тайный план Квина!
إيقاف اليونكو! خطّة كوين السّرّيّة
四皇を止めろ! クイーンの秘策

REGULAR.description:
Queen hastily ties up the sleeping Big Mom and carries her to Onigashima leaving Udon to Babanuki. Babanuki uses a weapon that Queen made to threaten inmates and make them catch Luffy, but a mysterious figure emerges from the forbidden cell to save Luffy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brutal Ammunition! The Plague Rounds Aim at Luffy!
De funestes munitions. Luffy contre les balles excidémiques !
Die bizarrste Waffe - Ruffy im Visier der Seuchenkugeln
Saikyou Heiki! Luffy o Nerau Excite Dan
Безжалостное оружие! Чумные Пули, нацеленные на Луффи!
ذخيرة وحشيّة! تستهدف طلقات الطّاعون لوفي
最凶兵器! ルフィを狙う疫災[エキサイト]弾

REGULAR.description:
Kawamatsu the Kappa is freed and stands up against Babanuki and his underlings! Listening to Old Man Hyo’s suggestion, Raizo and Kiku reveal their true identities which give the desperate prisoners not only a shock but also some hope.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Beginn des Gegenschlags! Ruffy und die Akazaya-Samurai!
Hangeki Kaishi! Luffy to Akazaya no Samurai!
La riposte. Luffy et les Neuf Fourreaux Rouges !
Start Fighting Back! Luffy and the Akazaya Samurai!
Луффи и самураи Девяти Красных Ножен!
بداية المقاومة! لوفي والسّاموراي من الأكازايا!
反撃開始! ルフィと赤鞘の侍!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy faces those who are infected by the Plague Rounds and the non-infected prisoners who submit to the authority of Udon. To open their eyes, Luffy takes a measure that will risk his life. However, the Chief Warden Babanuki has something up his sleeve.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Kachi ni Kita! Luffy Kesshi no Sakebi
On est venu pour gagner. Le cri de guerre de Luffy
We`re Here to Win! Luffy`s Desperate Scream!
Wir sind hier, um zu siegen! Ruffys verzweifelter Aufschrei
Мы здесь за победой! Отчаянный крик Луффи!
نحن هنا للفوز! صرخة لوفي اليائسة!
勝ちに来た! ルフィ決死の叫び

REGULAR.description:
The freed prisoners in Udon refuse to fight alongside Luffy because he is a pirate. Raizo and Old Man Hyo try their best to convince them, but an unexpected person stands up to bring the prisoners hope after taking down Kaido!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Traum der Soldaten! Ruffys Eroberung von Udon!
Le rêve des guerriers. Luffy à la conquête d`Udon !
Tsuwamonodomo ga Yume! Luffy Udon Seiatsu!
Warriors` Dream! Luffy`s Conquer of Udon!
Мечта Воинов! Победа Луффи в Удоне!
حلم المحاربين! إخضاع لوفي لأودون!
兵[つわもの]どもが夢! ルフィ兎丼制圧!

REGULAR.description:
After standing against Orochi, Zoro and Hiyori are chased by Orochi’s ninja group. Meanwhile, Orochi is told that they captured Trafalgar Law as the people of the Flower Capital prepare for the upcoming Fire Festival.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les sbires d`Orochi. Zoro face aux ninjas !
Orochi no Otte! Ninja Gundan vs Zoro
Orochi`s Hunting Party! The Ninja Group vs. Zoro!
Orochis Verfolger! Die Ninjaeinheit vs. Zorro
Охота Орочи! Отряд ниндзя против Зоро!
فرقة أوروتشي للمطاردة! مجموعة النّينجا ضدّ زورو!
オロチの追手! 忍者軍団VSゾロ

REGULAR.description:
Nami and Franky join Kanjuro who has taken Yasuie’s dead body to bury him with Oden, and together they hit the road. Robin, Usopp, and Brook are at the dock trying to figure out a way to pass through a check point. Meanwhile, Big Mom and Kaido finally clash at Onigashima.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Geladene Spannung auf Onigashima! Die Begegnung der zwei Kaiser?!
Onigashima Kinpaku! Souguu!? Futari no Yonkou
Tension Rises in Onigashima! Two Emperors of the Sea Meet?!
Tensions à Onigashima. Les deux empereurs face à face !
Накал страстей на Онигашиме! Двое Йонко встретятся?!
يزداد التّوتّر في أونيغاشيما! لقاء بين اثنين من اليونكو؟!
鬼ヶ島緊迫! 遭遇!? 二人の四皇

REGULAR.description:
As the clash between Kaido and Big Mom continues, Queen looks for a way to get out of Onigashima. Meanwhile in Udon, Old Man Hyo finds his former allies, four bosses from each region. At Bandit’s Bridge, Hiyori and Kawamatsu finally see each other after a long time.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Hiyori no Kokuhaku! Oihagi Bashi no Saikai
Hiyori`s Confession! A Reunion at Bandit`s Bridge!
Hiyoris Geständnis! Wiedersehen auf der Banditenbrücke
La confession de Hiyori. Retrouvailles au pont des brigands !
Исповедь Хиёри! Воссоединение на Бандитском мосту!
اعتراف هيوري! لمّ شمل على جسر قطّاع الطّرق!
日和の告! おいはぎ橋の再会

REGULAR.description:
Zoro runs after the warrior-monk who took his Shusui and Kawamatsu shares with Hiyori his memory of a fox that was guarding the graves in Ringo. As they catch up to Zoro, they find a room filled with swords. And Hiyori tells Zoro to give Shusui back to the Land of Wano.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Its Name Is Enma! Oden`s Great Swords!
Sein Name lautet Enma - Odens berühmtes Schwert
Sono Na wa Enma! Oden no Meitou!
Un sabre nommé Enma. L’arme légendaire d’Oden !
Имя ему Энма! Великие мечи Одена!
اسمه إنما! سيف أودن العظيم!
その名は閻魔! おでんの名刀!

REGULAR.description:
As the day of the raid approaches, Law finds someone who might help him escape the prison and Kin’emon gathers up most of his main allies to discuss the raid plan. Meanwhile, at Onigashima, Kaido and Big Mom make a stunning declaration!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Alliance?! Kaido`s Army Gathers!
Arata na Doumei!? Kaidou Gun Dai Shuuketsu
Eine neue Allianz?! Kaidos Armee versammelt sich
Une nouvelle alliance ? Kaido rassemble ses troupes !
Новый альянс?! Армия Кайдо в сборе!
تحالف جديد؟! تجمّع جيش كايدو!
新たな同盟!? カイドウ軍大集結

REGULAR.description:
Kin’emon, Momonosuke, and the others can’t fight back tears when they hear that Hiyori is alive.
Zoro is stunned by Enma’s demonic power and its ties to him.
And as the day of the Fire Festival is finally in sight, Kin’emon and the others head out for the rendezvous point.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Entscheidungsschlacht rückt näher! Die Strohhüte nehmen Kampfhaltung ein
Le grand soir approche. L`équipage se prépare !
Semaru Kessen! Mugiwara Ichimi Sentoutaisei
Ticking Down to the Great Battle! The Straw Hats Go into Combat Mode!
Приближается Великая битва! Мугивары в боевой готовности!
وقت المعركة الكبرى وشيك! يدخل قراصنة قبّعة القشّ وضع القتال
迫る決戦! 麦わら一味戦闘態勢

REGULAR.description:
The resolution that passed the Reverie and the incidents surrounding the conference stun people all over the world and corner the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Meanwhile, a Navy captain Koby secretly contacts someone who is currently in the Land of Wano.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big News! An Incident That Will Affect the Seven Warlords!
Big News! Shichi Bukai o Osou Jiken
Grande nouvelle. Les Corsaires dans la tourmente !
Große Neuigkeiten! Der Vorfall, der die Sieben Samurai der Meere heimsucht
Большие новости! Инцидент, который затронет Шичибукаев!
أخبار مهمّة! الحادثة الّتي ستؤثّرعلى الشّيتشيبوكاي!
大[ビッグ]ニュース! 七武海を襲う事件

REGULAR.description:
Admiral Issho and Fleet Admiral Sakazuki argue over the abolition of the Seven Warlord system and the alliance of the two Emperors of the Sea. Meanwhile, ex-Fleet Admiral Sengoku teaches the young Navy soldiers about the legendary Rocks Pirates that Kaido and Big Mom once belonged to along with all the other big names.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Legendary Battle! Garp and Roger!
Densetsu no Tatakai! Garp to Roger
Der legendäre Kampf! Garp und Roger
Un combat de légende. Garp et Roger !
Легендарная битва! Гарп и Роджер!
معركة أسطوريّة! غارب وروجر!
伝説の戦い! ガープとロジャー

REGULAR.description:
On the day of the Fire Festival, Orochi leaves the mainland of the Land of Wano heading for Onigashima where a big banquet will take place. Meanwhile, at Tokage Port, the rendezvous point for the rebel group, Kin’emon and the others are stunned by the fact that none of their allies are there.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der ausgemachte Hafen! Vorhang auf für Akt 3 der Wano-Land-Saga
Rendez-vous au port. Troisième acte de l`arc de Wano !
The Rendezvous Port! The Land of Wano Act Three Begins!
Yakusoku no Minato! Wano Kuni Hen Daisanmaku Kaimaku
Встреча в порту! Начинается третий акт "Страны Вано"!
ميناء اللّقاء! بداية فصل بلاد وانو الثّالث
約束の港! ワノ国編第三幕開幕

REGULAR.description:
The night before the great battle, Orochi orders the destruction of the Sunny along with some bridges across the country to block Akazaya samurai’s allies from their rendezvous. Disappointed, the group of samurai still sets out for Onigashima with the memory of their beloved lord, Oden, in their hearts. However, 41 years ago, Oden was not respected by everyone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Nummer 1 der Samurais von Wano-Land! Oden Kozuki betritt die Bühne
Le plus grand samouraï de Wano. Kozuki Oden entre en scène !
The Number-One Samurai in the Land of Wano! Here Comes Kozuki Oden!
Wano Kuni Ichi no Samurai! Kouzuki Oden Toujou
Самурай номер один в стране Вано! А вот и Кодзуки Оден!
السّاموراي الأوّل في بلاد وانو! ها هو ذا كوزكي أودن
ワノ国一の侍! 光月おでん登場

REGULAR.description:
When the angry mountain god, the giant boar, almost kills Kin’emon, Oden steps in. Kin’emon is impressed when he sees Oden’s strength and pledges his life to serve him. Disavowed by his father, Oden decides to go on a journey around the country and gathers more followers along the way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les larmes de l`allégeance. Oden et Kinémon !
Namida no Deshiiri: Oden to Kin`emon
Tearfully Swearing Allegiance! Oden and Kin`emon!
Treueschwur unter Tränen. Oden und Kinemon
Слёзная клятва в верности! Оден и Кинемон!
قسم ولاء بالدّموع، أودن وكينييمون
涙の弟子入り おでんと錦えもん

REGULAR.description:
Oden transforms the wild land of Kuri into a habitable region and is made Daimyo over it. Then he meets Kawamatsu the Kappa and the two Minks, Dogstorm and Cat Viper, who become his followers like the others. Kin’emon and the other vassals are scolded by Yasuie when they try to steal money from him, and they begin reforming themselves for their lord Oden.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Changing Destiny! The Whitebeard Pirates Cast Ashore!
Das Schicksal im Wandel. Ankunft der Whitebeard-Piratenbande!
La roue du destin. L’équipage de Barbe Blanche débarque !
Ugoku Unmei: Hyouchaku! Shirohige Kaizoku Dan!
Изменить судьбу! Пираты Белоуса выброшены на берег!
تغيير المصير! انجراف قراصنة اللّحية البيضاء!
動く運命 漂着! 白ひげ海賊団!

REGULAR.description:
Whitebeard and his crew dock at one of the ports in the Land of Wano with their broken ship and the news excites Oden. He runs to the port and asks Whitebeard to let him get on board the ship but the request is rejected. When the ship`s repairs are complete, Whitebeard tries to sneak out of the country, but he finds Oden tagging along.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La Ténacité d’Oden et l’Épreuve de Barbe Blanche
Oden no Ketsui! Shirohige no Shiren!
Oden`s Determination! Whitebeard`s Test!
Odens Entschlossenheit - Whitebeards Feuerprobe
Решимость Одена! Испытание Белоуса!
عزيمة أودن! اختبار اللّحية البيضاء!
おでんの決意! 白ひげの試練!

REGULAR.description:
Oden’s journey finally begins. He is in awe of all the things that he has never seen before. And for the first time in his life, he becomes a wanted person and makes the headlines which catches the eye of a high-profile figure. Meanwhile he becomes romantically involved with Toki and they have a child together.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le petit frère de Barbe Blanche. Oden part à l’aventure !
Shirohige no Otouto! Oden no Daibouken!
Whitebeard`s Little Brother! Oden`s Great Adventure!
Whitebeards kleiner Bruder! Odens großes Abenteuer!
Младший брат Белоуса! Великое приключение Одена!
أخو اللّحية البيضاء الصّغير! مغامرة أودن العظيمة!
白ひげの弟! おでんの大冒険!

REGULAR.description:
In the Land of Wano, the Shogun Sukiyaki falls critically ill and names Orochi proxy Shogun until Oden returns in case he dies. Meanwhile, Whitebeard’s ship carrying Oden docks at some island overseas, unaware that Gold Roger and his clan are fighting against the Navy on the other side of the island.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Barbe Blanche et Roger croisent le fer !
Crossing Swords! Roger and Whitebeard!
Kreuzende Klingen! Roger und Whitebeard!
Majieru Yaiba! Roger to Shirohige!
Скрестить мечи! Роджер и Белоус!
وتتصادم الأنصال! روجر واللّحية البيضاء
交える刃! ロジャーと白ひげ!

REGULAR.description:
Roger is amazed when he finds out that Oden can read the script on the Ponegliff since he believes it will guide him to the last, undiscovered island where no man has ever been. Roger begs Whitebeard for permission to take Oden with him on a one-year journey. But Oden gives it some thought and speaks his mind as well!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le souhait de Roger ! Un tout nouveau voyage
Roger no Negai! Arata na Tabidachi
Roger`s Wish! A New Journey!
Rogers Wunsch! Aufbruch zu einer neuen Reise
Желание Роджера! Новое путешествие!
أمنية روجر! رحلة جديدة!
ロジャーの願い! 新たな旅立ち

REGULAR.description:
Singing out loud, the Roger Pirates continue on with their journey. They soar up to the island above the clouds and go down into the deep sea to get to the island at the sea bottom. Oden deciphers the Ponegliffs on those islands for Roger who believes those inscriptions will tell them the location of the last island on the Grand Line.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Leben in der Waagschale! Rogers Abenteuer
Devoting His Life! Roger`s Adventure!
L’ambition de sa vie. L’aventure de Roger !
Shougai o Kakete! Roger no Bouken
Посвятить свою жизнь! Приключение Роджера!
كرّس حياته لها! مغامرة روجر
生涯をかけて! ロジャーの冒険

REGULAR.description:
Oden and the Roger Pirates head for the Land of Wano to obtain a copy of the Road Ponegliff. Oden sees Kin’emon and the others for the first time in years, but he immediately returns to the sea leaving his wife and children behind. Then, after stopping by at the Mokomo Dukedom and getting a copy of the last Road Ponegliff, the Roger Pirates finally make it to the last island.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Geburt des Piratenkönigs - Ankunft auf der „letzten Insel“!
Kaizokuou Tanjou: Toutatsu! "Saigo no Shima"
L’avènement du roi des pirates. Arrivée sur la dernière île !
The King of the Pirates Is Born! Arriving at the Last Island!
Рождение Короля Пиратов! Прибытие на Последний остров!
وُلد ملك القراصنة! الوصول للجزيرة الأخيرة!
海賊王誕生 到達! "最後の島"

REGULAR.description:
After reaching Laugh Tale, Roger declares the disbanding of his pirate group and disembarks first. Oden gets dropped off at the Land of Wano and reunites with his family and retainers. Later, he hears that Orochi took over the country with the help of a strong pirate named Kaido after the Shogun Sukiyaki’s death and becomes enraged by stories of his tyrannical acts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auf nach Wano-Land! Die Roger-Piratenbande löst sich auf
Retour à Wano ! L’équipage de Roger se dissout
To the Land of Wano! The Roger Pirates Disband!
Wano Kuni e! Roger Kaizoku Dan Kaisan
В страну Вано! Расформирование Пиратов Роджера!
إلى بلاد وانو! حلّ قراصنة روجر
ワノ国へ! ロジャー海賊団解散

REGULAR.description:
Enraged by Orochi’s tyrannical acts, Oden raids his castle in the Flower Capital and points his sword at Orochi. However, hours later, people who were waiting for Oden to come out after defeating Orochi see the unexpected. Meanwhile, the King of the Pirates Roger’s execution and last words are printed in newspapers and spread across the world.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kanashiki Shirase: Dai Kaizoku Jidai Makuake
Sad News! The Opening of the Great Pirate Era!
Terrible nouvelle ! Le rideau se lève sur l’âge d’or de la piraterie
Traurige Nachrichten - Vorhang auf für das große Piratenzeitalter
Печальная новость! Открытие Великой эры пиратов!
أخبار محزنة! بداية عصر القراصنة العظيم!
悲しき知らせ 大海賊時代幕開け

REGULAR.description:
Oden keeps dancing naked in the Flower Capital and losing all the trust of the people. One day, Orochi comes to Kuri and reveals his evil plan for the Land of Wano as well as his brutalities against the country’s mobster and Oden’s friend, Hyogoro and his wife. Despairing and in a rage, Oden finally decides to take down Orochi’s supporter, Kaido.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Raid! Oden and the Akazaya Nine!
Uchiiri! Oden to Akazaya Kunin Otoko
Vengeance ! Oden et les Neuf Fourreaux rouges
Überfall! Oden und die Neun Akazaya
Восстание! Оден и Девять Красных Ножен!
غارة! أودن والأكازايا التّسعة!
討ち入り! おでんと赤鞘九人男

REGULAR.description:
Kaido comes to the mainland along with his troops to fight against Oden and the Akazaya samurai who were on their way to raid Kaido’s mansion. Even though Oden’s group are unprepared and outnumbered, they fight hard to save the future of the Land of Wano.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Zeit der Entscheidung! Oden vs. Kaido!
Kecchaku no Toki! Oden vs Kaidou!
The End of the Battle! Oden vs. Kaido!
Un tournant décisif ! Oden contre Kaido
Конец битвы! Оден против Кайдо!
نهاية المعركة! أودن ضدّ كايدو!
決着の時! おでんVSカイドウ!

REGULAR.description:
Oden and the Akazaya members are sentenced to death by boiling in a pot. Oden asks for a chance to survive which is accepted by Kaido. Then, Oden enters the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head. Shinobu watches from among the spectators and reveals what Oden had been doing to save the country, to the surprise of the citizens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Boiled to Death! Oden`s One-hour Struggle!
Die Hinrichtung im Kochkessel - Odens todesmutige Stunde
Kamayude no Kei: Oden Kesshi no Ichijikan
L’ébouillantage d’Oden ! Une heure pour vaincre la mort
Сварен заживо! Часовая борьба Одена!
غليان حتّى الموت، صراع أودن لساعة من الزّمن
釜茹での刑 おでん決死の一時間

REGULAR.description:
As Oden continues trying to survive in the boiling pot holding his retainers over his head, people learn the truth from Shinobu and get shocked.
At the same time, Oden tells his retainers the importance of opening the borders of the Land of Wano. Time ticks down for Oden and his clan’s freedom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Niete Nanbo no Oden ni Sourou"
"煮えてなんぼのおでんに候"
Bouillir, tel est le propre du Oden
Oden Wouldn`t Be Oden If It Wasn`t Boiled!
Оден, что был рожден, дабы кипеть!
ما كان الأودن ليُسمّى أودن إن لم يكن يغلي
„Wäre dieses Gericht nicht heiß gekocht, wäre es kein Oden"

REGULAR.description:
As Kin’emon and the others run to Oden Castle to save Oden’s family, the castle is set on fire and Kaido attacks Toki and her children. Leaving Momonosuke to Kin’emon and Hiyori to Kawamatsu, Toki appears in front of the desperate people of the Land of Wano and gives a prophecy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Château en proie aux flammes ! Le sort du clan Kozuki
Das brennende Schloss! – Das Schicksal des Kozuki-Klans!
Moeru Shiro! Kouzuki no Ichizoku no Unmei!
The Castle on Fire! The Fate of the Kozuki Clan!
Замок в огне! Судьба клана Кодзуки!
القلعة تحترق! مصير عشيرة كوزكي!
燃える城! 光月の一族の運命!

REGULAR.description:
After 20 years since Oden Castle burned down, Oden’s surviving retainers are working hard separately at their own missions, believing in Toki’s prophecy. The day of the Fire Festival has finally come and the whole army is now getting ready to head for Onigashima to raid Kaido!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Back to the Present Day! 20 Years Later!
Futatabi Genzai! Nijuunen no Toki o Koete
Retour au présent ! Un bond de vingt ans
Wieder zurück in der Gegenwart! – 20 Jahre später
Обратно в настоящее! Двадцать лет спустя!
العودة لليوم الحاضر! بعد 20 سنة!
再び現在! 二十年の時をこえて

REGULAR.description:
The Straw Hats and thousands of allies who were supposed to be there are nowhere to be found, but Kin’emon and the others decide to set sail to the stormy sea in a small boat. Kaido’s army that appears out of nowhere and a betrayal drive the Akazaya members into a corner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: En mer, on affronte les pirates ! Raid sur Onigashima
Piraten auf dem Meer! – Überfall! Auf nach Onigashima!
The Sea Is for Pirates! Raid! To Onigashima!
Umi wa Kaizoku! Uchi Iri! Iza Onigashima
Море для пиратов! Рейд на Онигашиму!
البحر للقراصنة! الغارة على أونيغاشيما
海は海賊! 討入り! いざ鬼ヶ島

REGULAR.description:
Luffy, Law, and Kid join the Akazaya samurai and begin to fight Kaido’s army. The three rivals from the Worst Generation compete with each other as they attack the enemy fleet with their ultimate skills. When it seems like they gain upper hand in the battle, another strong enemy appears to help Kaido’s army.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Ansturm der Schlimmsten Generation! – Die stürmische Seeschlacht
La génération terrible débarque ! Combat en pleine tempête
Saiaku no Sedai Shingeki! Arashi no Umi no Tatakai
The Worst Generation Charges In! The Battle of the Stormy Sea!
Худшее Поколение атакует! Битва в штормовом море!
اندفاع الجيل الأسوأ للهجوم! معركة البحر العاصف
最悪の世代進撃! 嵐の海の戦い

REGULAR.description:
The Akazaya members are surprised by help from their old mate and Kin’emon notices he made a big mistake which has luckily saved all his allies. As their battle against Kaido’s army heats up, the cornered Kanjuro makes a stunning move.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Good Luck?! Leader Kin`emon`s Plot!
Großes Glück?! – Der Plan von Anführer Kinemon
Kyouun!? Leader Kin`emon no Ikkei
Une chance terrifiante ? La stratégie de Kinémon
Удача?! План лидера Кинемона!
حظّ موفّق؟! خطّة القائد كينييمون
強運!? リーダー錦えもんの一計

REGULAR.description:
