Swept away by Kanjuro, Momonosuke remembers his father, tries to rise above his fear, and speak to his allies. Luffy and the others start heading for Onigashima, but Kaido’s army gets in their way again with a formidable weapon. However, a surprising figure comes to help the cornered Straw Hats.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Tearful Promise! The Kidnapped Momonosuke!
Ein Versprechen unter Tränen! – Der entführte Momonosuke
Namida no Yakusoku! Sarewareta Momonosuke
Promesse dans les larmes ! Momonosuké enlevé
Слёзное обещание! Похищенный Момоноске
وعد بدموع! مومونوسكي المختطَف
涙の約束! さらわれたモモの助

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hat crew are excited to see Jimbei again and welcome him as a new member. Meanwhile, Law and the Akazaya members strategize on how to enter Onigashima and attack Kaido. As the Straw Hats approach the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima, they are attacked out of the blue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Member! `First Son of the Sea` Jimbei!
Arata na Nakama! Kaikyou no Jinbee!
Der neue Kamerad! – Jinbei, der Ritter der Meere!
L’équipage s’agrandit ! Jinbe le paladin des mers
Новый товарищ! "Рыцарь моря" Джимбей!
عضو جديد! فارس البحر جينبي!
新たな仲間! 海侠のジンべエ!

REGULAR.description:
To Law and the others’ surprise, Luffy and the rest of the Straw Hats attack the giant torii gate in front of Onigashima. Meanwhile, Kaido and Orochi are having a big banquet on the island where Kaido’s formidable subordinates are also called in.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaido`s Trump Card! The Tobi Roppo Appear!
Kaidos Trumpf – Auftritt der Sechs Überflieger!
Kaidou no Kirifuda: Tobi Roppou Toujou
L’atout de Kaido ! Les Tobi Roppo entrent en scène
Козырная карта Кайдо! Появление Летающей Шестёрки!
ورقة كايدو الرّابحة، ظهور التّوبي روبّو!
カイドウの切り札 飛び六胞登場

REGULAR.description:
The Straw Hats and the samurai warriors finally reach Onigashima! Before they set out for the castle as they planned, the samurai warriors use surprising but determined tactics to cut off their retreat which leave the Straw Hats in shock.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Ernsthaftigkeit der Samurais! – Die Strohhüte legen auf Onigashima an
La détermination des samouraïs ! Accostage à Onigashima
Samurai-tachi no Honki! Ichimi Onigashima Jouriku
The Samurai Warriors` Earnestness! The Straw Hats Land at Onigashima!
Серьёзность самураев! Мугивары высаживаются на Онигашиме!
جدّيّة محاربي السّاموراي! نزول طاقم قبّعة القشّ في أونيغاشيما!
侍たちの本気! 一味鬼ヶ島上陸

REGULAR.description:
Eustass Kid and his clan start heading for Kaido`s castle head on waving Luffy off. Luffy and Zoro go after them to stop them from causing trouble, but they happen to step into Kaido’s banquet. Meanwhile, Kanjuro loses his way to Kaido in underground passages with Momonosuke who he kidnapped in tow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Bousou!? Sennyuu Kaidou no Utage
Luffy Goes Out of Control?! Sneaking into Kaido`s Banquet!
Luffy explose ! Infiltration à la fête de Kaido
Ruffys Amoklauf?! – Die Infiltration von Kaidos Bankett
Луффи выходит из себя!? Проникновение на пир Кайдо!
يخرج لوفي عن السّيطرة؟! التّسلّل إلى وليمة كايدو!
ルフィ暴走!? 潜入カイドウの宴

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Zoro each witness Kaido’s subordinates waste food at the banquet and make fun of the poor people in the Land of Wano. Thinking of Otama, a small girl who liked red-bean soup so much, both Luffy and Zoro become infuriated and create turmoil.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: In Gedanken an Tama – Ruffys Zornattacke
Otama e no Omoi: Luffy Ikari no Ichigeki
Pour O-Tama ! L’ire de Luffy au bout du poing
Thinking of Otama! Luffy`s Furious Strike!
Мысли об О-Таме! Яростная атака Луффи!
أوتاما في البال، هجوم لوفي الغاضب
お玉への思い ルフィ怒りの一撃

REGULAR.description:
After making a scene at the Golden Festival, Luffy and Zoro try to get away, but Queen announces his subordinates that anyone who catches them will be rewarded with a position in the Tobi Roppo. Scratchmen Apoo stands Luffy and Zoro’s way and with his ability to use music as a weapon, he launches unpredictable attacks which corner Luffy and Zoro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fighting Music! An Ability That Harms Luffy!
Kampfmusik! – Eine Teufelskraft, die Ruffy verletzt!
Musique de combat ! Luffy mis à mal
Tatakau Music! Luffy o Osou Nouryoku!
Музыка битвы! Сила, которая ранила Луффи!
موسيقى القتال! قدرة تؤذي لوفي!
戦う音楽[ミュージック]! ルフィを襲う能力!

REGULAR.description:
Haccha, a supergiant Number, joins in and the pursuit of Luffy and the others becomes even more intense. Meanwhile, Kin’emon changes his strategy and his group tries to infiltrate the castle from its side, but there is an unexpected change of the floor plan which coincidentally makes Sanji excited.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: His Dream Broken?! The Trap That Lures Sanji!
Sein Traum wurde ruiniert?! – Die Falle, die Sanji in ihren Bann zieht!
Un rêve brisé ? Sanji piégé !
Yume Yabureru!? Sanji o Sasou Wana!
Разбитая мечта!? Санджи попадает в ловушку!
حُطّم حُلمه؟! الفخّ الّذي استدرج سانجي!
夢やぶれる!? サンジを誘う罠!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy, Law, Kin’emon, and all the others are trying to infiltrate Kaido’s castle from all sides. Meanwhile, Big Mom’s children are climbing up the waterfall towards Onigashima again, but this time, Marco the Phoenix appears from nowhere and stands in their way!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ankunft der Verstärkung! – Der Kommandant der Whitebeard-Piraten!
Arrivée des renforts ! Les commandants de Barbe Blanche
Engun Touchaku! Shirohige Kaizokudan Taichou!
Reinforcements Arrive! The Commander of the Whitebeard Pirates!
А вот и подкрепление! Командир Пиратов Белоуса!
وصول التّعزيزات! قائد قراصنة اللّحية البيضاء!
援軍到着! 白ひげ海賊団隊長!

REGULAR.description:
The furious Big Mom chases Brachio Tank driven by Chopper and Usopp, but they bravely fight back! Meanwhile, Kanjuro takes the battered and bruised Momonosuke to Kaido and Orochi, then breaks the news to them about Oden’s retainers who were thought to be dead.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Schwur unter Männern! – Brachio Tanks erbitterter Kampf
Le serment d’un homme ! À l’assaut, Brachio Tank
Otoko no Chikai! Gekitou Brachio Tank
The Pact Between Men! The Fierce Fighting of Brachio Tank!
Мужская клятва! Бой «Брахиотанка»!
العهد بين الرّجال! قتال دبّابة براكيو الضّاري!
漢[おとこ]の誓い! 激闘ブラキオタンク

REGULAR.description:
Luffy runs into Ulti and Page One, members of the Tobi Roppo from the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Hearing that he aims to become the King of the Pirates, the brother and sister duo become infuriated and turn themselves into massive beasts. When Luffy is driven into a corner, someone wearing a demon mask appears and whisks him away.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Donnerschlag der acht Trigramme! – Kaidos Sohn betritt die Bühne
Grondement de tonnerre divin ! Le fils de Kaido débarque
Raimei Hakke! Toujou Kaidou no Musuko
Thunder Bagua! Here Comes Kaido`s Son!
Гром Восьми Триграмм! Знакомьтесь, сын Кайдо!
باغوا الرّعد! ها قد أتى ابن كايدو!
雷鳴八卦! 登場カイドウの息子

REGULAR.description:
Evading Ulti and Page One, strong members of the Tobi Roppo, Luffy tries to find out what Kaido’s son Yamato’s motive is. However, the two get in a fight. Taking Luffy’s punishing attacks, Yamato remembers someone he fought against in the past.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Enemy or Ally? Luffy and Yamato!
Ennemis ou alliés ? Luffy et Yamato
Freund oder Feind? – Ruffy und Yamato
Teki ka? Mikata ka? Luffy to Yamato
Враг или союзник? Луффи и Ямато!
عدوّ أم صديق؟ لوفي وياماتو
敵か? 味方か? ルフィとヤマト

REGULAR.description:
The Akazaya members who were on board Law’s Polar Tang finally reach Onigashima and see someone who they didn’t expect. Kaido’s son Yamato starts telling his story to Luffy, shares his passion, and reveals what’s behind his mask!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Desire to Be Oden! Yamato`s Dream!
Devenir Oden ! Le souhait de Yamato
Ich möchte Oden sein – Yamatos Wunsch
Oden ni Naritai: Yamato no Omoi
Желание быть Оденом! Мечта Ямато!
الرّغبة في أن يكون أودن! حلم ياماتو!
おでんになりたい ヤマトの思い

REGULAR.description:
At the back entrance of Onigashima, the Akazaya members try to get inside the gate, but they’re blocked by their former colleague Kanjuro. Meanwhile, as Kaido’s son Yamato shows Luffy the handcuffs that have restricted his freedom for years, they hear Kaido making a speech on his grand plan.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bakuhatsu!? Yamato no Jiyuu o Shibaru Jou!
Explosion?! – Die Fesseln, die Yamatos Freiheit binden!
Explosive?! The Handcuffs That Shackle Yamato`s Freedom!
Menottes explosives ? La cage de Yamato
Взрыв? Скованная кандалами Ямато!
انفجار؟! الأصفاد الّتي تقيّد حرّيّة ياماتو!
爆発!? ヤマトの自由を縛る錠!

REGULAR.description:
Kaido’s plan to obtain the great treasure infuriates Orochi, but his unexpected violent move silences everyone. Meanwhile at the back entrance of Onigashima, Kikunojo squares off against Kanjuro and gets into an emotional fight with her former colleague.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Akazaya Ikkiuchi: Kikunojou vs Kanjurou
Das Duell der Akazayas – Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro
Duel à mort entre Fourreaux rouges ! Kikunojo contre Kanjuro
The Akazaya Face-off! Kikunojo vs. Kanjuro!
Бой между «Алыми Ножнами»! Кикунодзё против Кандзюро!
مواجهة الأكازايا! كيكونوجو ضدّ كانجورو!
赤鞘一騎打ち 菊之丞VSカン十郎

REGULAR.description:
The Akazaya members start charging towards Kaido from the back of Onigashima. Meanwhile, at the Performance Floor, Kaido closes in on Momonosuke shivering in terror and asks him the ultimate question which will determine his fate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Raid! Inheriting Oden`s Will
Uchiiri! Uketsugu Oden no Ishi
Vengeance ! Que la volonté d’Oden soit faite
Überfall! – Odens weitergereichter Wille
Нападение! Унаследованная воля Одэна!
غارة! إرادة أودن الموروثة!
討入り! 受け継ぐおでんの意志

REGULAR.description:
The Akazaya members deliver a crushing blow to Kaido. Luffy and Yamato try to back them up, but Ulti stands in their way and Big Mom spots Luffy. Meanwhile, Nami and Carrot free themselves from their enemies and move on to take back Zeus!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chaos à Onigashima ! Luffy déclare la guerre totale
Onigashima Gekidou: Luffy Zenmensensou Kaishi
Onigashima in Aufruhr – Ruffys Schlacht mit allen Mitteln beginnt
Onigashima in Tumult! Luffy`s All-Out War Begins!
Онигашима в смятении! Тотальная война Луффи начинается!
شغب في أونيغاشيما! تبدأ حرب لوفي الشّاملة!
鬼ヶ島激動 ルフィ全面戦争開始

REGULAR.description:
The Animal Kingdom Pirates gasp with surprise to see thousands of samurai warriors coming into the castle. In his dragon form, Kaido goes outside to fight the Akazaya members under the moon. However, the Akazaya members have secret weapons to use against him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gekka no Tatakai: Kyousenshi "Sulong"
Kampf im Mondschein – Su Long, die Berserkerkrieger
Sous la lune ! Le combat des berserks Sulong
The Battle Under the Moon! The Berserker, Sulong the Moon Lion!
Битва под луной! Неистовый Сулонг!
المعركة تحت القمر! المحاربون الهائجون، سولونغ أسد القمر!
月下の戦い 狂戦士"月の獅子[スーロン]"

REGULAR.description:
Shinobu tries to rescue the weakened Momonosuke but is found by King and attacked. On the other hand, Nami takes back Zeus from Big Mom and runs away but loses him again and gets chased by Zeus who is ordered to kill to her by Big Mom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Zeus no Hangyaku!? Nami Zettaizetsumei!
Zeus se révolte ! Nami au bord du gouffre
Zeus` Treason?! The Cornered Nami!
Zeus` Verrat?! – Nami in der Zwickmühle!
Зевс - предатель?! Нами загнана в угол!
خيانة زوس؟! نامي محاصرة!
ゼウスの反逆!? ナミ絶体絶命!

REGULAR.description:
Franky faces Big Mom with the help of Robin and Jimbei, but the Numbers come interrupting their battle. One of them holds Brachio Tank with Usopp and Chopper inside in his hand. Meanwhile, Yamato, the self-proclaimed Oden, finally meets his son Momonosuke.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I`ll Protect You! Yamato Meets Momonosuke!
Ich werde dich beschützen – Yamato und Momonosukes Zusammenkunft
Je te protégerai ! Yamato rencontre Momonosuké
Kimi o Mamoru: Kaikou Yamato to Momonosuke
Я тебя защищу! Ямато встречает Момоноскэ!
سأحميك! لقاء ياماتو بمومونوسكي!
君を守る 邂逅ヤマトとモモの助

REGULAR.description:
As the Minks struggle with a poor hand against the Gifters, Kin’emon tries to assist them, but Dogstorm and Cat Viper stop him and start fighting for the other Minks! Meanwhile, Luffy and Zoro try to get to the rooftop to help Kin’emon and the others, but Queen and King get in their way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Attoteki Senryoku! Mugiwara no Ichimi Shuuketsu
Overwhelming Strength! The Straw Hats Come Together!
Puissance hors du commun ! L’équipage du chapeau de paille au complet
Überwältigende Kampfkraft! – Die Strohhüte versammeln sich
Невероятная сила! Соломенные шляпы в сборе!
قوّة ساحقة! اجتماع طاقم قبّعة القشّ!
圧倒的戦力! 麦わらの一味集結

REGULAR.description:
Who’s-Who invites Drake and Hawkins to a plot to kill Queen. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats are facing two large monsters that remind them of the Giant who they once struggled to take down. As Luffy charges towards them, someone unexpected comes in to help.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Risky Invitation! A Plot to Eliminate Queen!
Eine gefährliche Einladung – Der Plan zur Auslöschung von Queen
Funeste invitation ! Le plan pour éliminer Queen
Kiken na Sasoi! Queen Massatsu Keikaku
Рисковое предложение! План устранения Квина!
دعوة محفوفة بالمخاطر! مكيدة للإطاحة بكوين!
危険な誘い! クイーン抹殺計画

REGULAR.description:
Drake vows to fight alongside Luffy, but Zoro becomes skeptical and challenges him to a fight. Meanwhile, Usopp’s practical joke pushes Nami into confronting Ulti, who is infuriated since her brother got attacked.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Rivalry! Nami and Ulti!
Arata na Innen! Nami to Ulti!
Eine neue Rivalität – Nami und Ulti
Nouvel affrontement fatidique ! Nami et Ulti
Новая вражда! Нами и Ульти!
منافسة جديدة! نامي وأولتي!
新たな因縁! ナミとうるティ!

REGULAR.description:
Queen uses a new version of the Plague Bullets which will turn the samurai into ogre-like monsters. Meanwhile, the Minks keep pushing the fight against the Gifters and drive Jack into a corner. However, Kaido stands up for his subordinate.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Heroic Blade! Akazaya vs. Kaido, Again Once More!
Die Klinge der Heroen! – Die Akazayas vs. Kaido, Runde zwei
Hisou no Yaiba! Akazaya vs Kaidou Futatabi
Tragique héroïsme. Les Fourreaux rouges contre Kaido, le retour
Героические клинки! Реванш «Алых Ножен» против Кайдо!
نصل بطوليّ! الأكازايا ضدّ كايدو مرّة أخرى!
悲壮の刃! 赤鞘VSカイドウ再び

REGULAR.description:
While Luffy is hurrying to the rooftop and Yamato is trying to catch up to Momonosuke to protect him, the Akazaya members finally face off against Kaido. Hearing Kaido jeering at them for being weak, the samurai retainers attack him relentlessly, remembering the day Oden told them to master his sword skill.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Inherited Technique! Unleashing Oden`s Secret Swordplay!
Die geerbte Technik – Lasst Odens Geheimklinge aufblitzen
Le secret passe de main ! Que s’abatte la lame d’Oden !
Uketsugishi Waza: Sakuretsu Oden no Hiken
Унаследованная техника! Стиль боя Одэна!
تقنية متوارثة! إطلاق مسايفة أودن السّرّيّة!
受け継ぎし技 炸裂おでんの秘剣

REGULAR.description:
Queen, the Lead Performer, blazes away at samurai on the Performance Floor with the special version of the Plague Rounds, which turns them into hideous ogres that corner Zoro and Drake. Meanwhile, Luffy and Sanji, who are on their way to the rooftop, run into another Headliner with a special ability.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Koorioni" no Iryoku! Arata na Excite Dan
Die Macht der "Eisoger"! – Die neuartigen Seuchenkugeln
La force des démons de glace ! Une nouvelle balle excidémique
The Power of "Ice Oni"! A New Version of the Plague Rounds!
Сила «Ледяного Беса»! Новая версия чумных пуль!
قوّة أوني الجليد! نسخة جديدة لطلقات الطّاعون!
「氷鬼」の威力! 新たな疫災[エキサイト]弾

REGULAR.description:
King orders his subordinates to go after Momonosuke. Shinobu tries to protect him, but they are cornered by one of the strong Lead Performers from the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Meanwhile, seeing people suffering from Queen’s Plague Rounds, Chopper is determined to save everyone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dafür wird er büßen! – Choppers Entschluss!
I Won`t Forgive Him! Chopper`s Determination!
Tu vas payer ! La détermination de Chopper
Yurusanee! Chopper no Ketsui!
Он заплатит! Решимость Чоппера!
لن أسامحك أبدًا! عزيمة تشوبّر!
許さねェ! チョッパーの決意!

REGULAR.description:
Yamato fights Sasaki and the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division to protect Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Zoro tries to get rid of the Gifters who have turned into Ice Oni, but Queen starts a horrible game which involves the antibody for the virus.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’assaut de Zoro ! Les démons de glace jouent à chat
Zoro no Tsuigeki! Koorioni in Onigokko
Zoro`s Pursuit! Ice Oni Tag!
Zorro nimmt die Verfolgung auf! – Fangen mit den Eisogern
Зоро бросается в погоню! Салочки с ледяными бесами!
مطاردة زورو! لعبة ملاحقة أوني الجليد!
ゾロの追撃! 氷鬼 in 鬼ゴッコ

REGULAR.description:
Ulti and Page One of the Tobi Roppo chase Nami and Usopp, after being infuriated by their attack as well as Luffy’s declaration of becoming the King of the Pirates. Cornered, Nami gives in and Ulti pushes her to say the unthinkable.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nami Koufuku!? Ulti no Mou Zutsuki
Nami Surrenders?! Ulti`s Fierce Headbutt!
Nami capitule ? Les coups de boule d`Ulti
Namis Kapitulation?! – Ultis heftige Kopfnuss
Нами сдаётся?! Убийственный лоб Ульти!
استسلام نامي؟! نطحة أولتي الوحشيّة!
ナミ降伏!? うるティの猛頭突き

REGULAR.description:
Carrot and Wanda step in to help Marco, who is cornered by Big Mom and Perospero. In the meantime, Yamato fights a fierce battle against the Animal Kingdom Pirates Armored Division led by Sasaki, while protecting Shinobu and Momonosuke.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’assaut effréné de Sasaki ! La division blindée contre Yamato
Sasaki no Moukou: Soukoubutai vs Yamato
Sasaki`s Onslaught! Armored Division vs. Yamato!
Sasakis Sturmangriff – Die Gepanzerte Einheit gegen Yamato
Сасаки наступает! Бронеотряд против Ямато!
بطش ساساكي! الوحدة المدرّعة ضدّ ياماتو!
ササキの猛攻 装甲部隊VSヤマト

REGULAR.description:
Zoro and Drake continue to chase Apoo to get the antibody against Ice Oni, while Chopper is trying to figure out how to fight the virus. In the castle, Luffy, Jimbei, and Sanji are climbing up the stairs to reach the rooftop where the Akazaya members’ tough battle against Kaido rages on.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eliminate the Ice Oni! Chopper`s Fire Trick!
Koorioni o Yabure: Chopper no Hi Saku!
La fin des démons. Chopper et la tactique du feu !
Vernichte die Eisoger – Choppers Feuertrick!
Уничтожим «Ледяного беса»! Огненный трюк Чоппера!
القضاء على أوني الجليد! خدعة تشوبّر النّاريّة!
氷鬼を破れ チョッパーの火策!

REGULAR.description:
Sanji hears a woman’s scream for help and dashes into the room the scream can be heard from. However, it’s a trap set up by Black Maria of the Tobi Roppo. Meanwhile, Luffy and Jimbei who are trying to reach the rooftop get help from the unexpected.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das ist nicht in Ordnung! – Die Spinne, der Sanji ins Netz geht
Hors de question ! L’araignée qui leurre Sanji
It`s Not Okay! The Spider Lures Sanji!
Yokanee yo!! Sanji o Sasou Kumo
Она против! Санджи в паучьей сети!
هذا ليس صائبًا! تستدرج العنكبوت سانجي!
よかねェよ!! サンジを誘う蜘蛛

REGULAR.description:
While Kaido begins the New Onigashima Project, Marco appears in front of Chopper and the others, who are struggling with Ice Oni. The members of the Tobi Roppo continue to give the Straw Hats a hard time while their former member helps Zoro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Turnaround Move! The Flames of Marco the Phoenix!
Gyakuten no Itte! Fushichou Marco no Honoo
Kehrtwende des Schicksals! – Die Flammen von Marco dem Phönix
Retournement de situation ! Les flammes de Marco le Phénix
Победный гамбит! Пламя Феникса Марко!
انقلاب الموازين! لهيب ماركو العنقاء!
逆転の一手! 不死鳥マルコの炎

REGULAR.description:
Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu that he once confronted a man, who came to Onigashima looking to get Kaido’s head. His name was Ace. The two of them engaged in a fierce battle that eventually turned into an important friendship.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le passé de Yamato. L’homme qui voulait la tête d’un empereur
Yamato no Kako: Yonkou no Kubi o Nerau Otoko
Yamato`s Past! The Man Who Came for an Emperor of the Sea!
Yamatos Vergangenheit – Der Mann, der es auf einen Kaiser absah
Прошлое Ямато! Тот, кто пришёл за головой Ёнко!
ماضي ياماتو! الرّجل الّذي أتى ساعيًا خلف اليونكو!
ヤマトの過去 四皇の首を狙う男

REGULAR.description:
The formidable Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates stand in Zoro’s way as he tries to get to the rooftop. Marco sees his late comrade in Zoro’s determination and tries to pave the way for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les larmes de Marco. La fraternité de l’équipage de Barbe Blanche
Marco no Namida! Shirohige Kaizokudan no Kizuna
Marco`s Tears! The Bond of the Whitebeard Pirates!
Marcos Tränen! – Das Band der Whitebeard-Priatenbande
Слёзы Марко! Узы пиратов Белоуса!
دموع ماركو! رابطة قراصنة اللّحية البيضاء
マルコの涙! 白ひげ海賊団の絆

REGULAR.description:
Yamato tells Momonosuke and Shinobu about how Ace gave him hope for the future. Meanwhile, Luffy and the other allied pirates from the Worst Generation make it to the rooftop to finally face off against Kaido and Big Mom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy au chapeau de paille. Le futur Roi des pirates !
Mugiwara no Luffy: Kaizokuou ni Naru Otoko
Straw Hat Luffy! The Man Who Will Become the King of the Pirates!
Strohhut Ruffy – Der Mann, der König der Piraten wird
Мугивара Луффи! Человек, который станет Королем Пиратов!
قبّعة القشّ لوفي! الرّجل الّذي سيصبح ملك القراصنة!
麦わらのルフィ 海賊王になる男

REGULAR.description:
Luffy’s strong attack reminds Kaido of all the strong ones he’s ever met. On the other hand, Luffy, Law, and Kid keep quarreling amongst themselves. Meanwhile, Sanji is caught and interrogated by Black Maria in what he calls “heaven.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Entscheidungsschlacht der Ungeheuer! – Die Hartnäckigkeit dreier Kapitäne
Kaibutsu Kessen! Ijihari Au San Senchou
The Battle of the Monsters! The Three Stubborn Captains!
Un combat de monstres. L’orgueil des trois capitaines !
Битва чудовищ! Три упрямых капитана!
معركة الوحوش! القباطنة الثّلاثة العنيدون!
怪物決戦! 意地張りあう三船長

REGULAR.description:
Luffy, Law, Kid, Zoro, and Killer keep landing hard blows against Kaido in tandem despite the arguing. However, when Big Mom steps in and unleashes powerful lightning strikes, the tide turns for all except one of the rookies.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Barrage of Powerful Techniques! The Fierce Attacks of the Worst Generation!
Déluge d`attaques. La génération terrible s`acharne !
Ein Feuerwerk der Ultratechniken! – Die Schlimmste Generation bläst zum Angriff!
Oowaza Renpatsu! Saiaku no Sedai no Moukou!
Шквал сильнейших атак! Яростный натиск худшего поколения!
وابل من التّقنيّات القويّة! هجمات شرسة من الجيل الأسوأ!
大技連発! 最悪の世代の猛攻!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy pummels Kaido with his well-trained Kong Gatling and delivers a final blow using all his strength. Big Mom tries to fight back, but Law gets in her way and Kid and Killer also try to finish Kaido off.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kaido Laughs! The Emperors of the Sea vs. the New Generation!
Kaido hilare. Les Empereurs contre la relève !
Kaidos Gelächter! – Die Kaiser der Meere gegen die neue Generation!
Warau Kaidou! Yonkou vs Shin Sedai!
Смех Кайдо! Императоры против нового поколения!
كايدو يضحك! اليونكو ضدّ الجيل الأسوأ!
笑うカイドウ! 四皇VS新世代!

REGULAR.description:
After watching the Straw Hats’ departure to Onigashima, Tama wondered if there was anything she could do to help the Straw Hats and the samurai. Now that she’s here on Onigashima, it’s time to execute her powerful plan – Operation Kibi Dango!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le plan secret d’O-Tama. Opération Boulette de millet !
Otama no Hisaku! Kibi Dango Daisakusen
Otama`s Secret Plan! Operation Kibi Dango!
Otamas Geheimplan! – Operation Kibi Dango
Тайный план О-Тамы! Операция Киби Данго!
خطّة أوتاما السّرّيّة! عمليّة الكيبي دانغو
お玉の秘策! きびだんご大作戦

REGULAR.description:
Sanji is captured and tortured by the merciless Black Maria. She names the terms of his release: to turn over one of his crewmates. He hesitates but has no other option. After much distress, he makes a move that surprises everyone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le cri de Sanji. Un SOS qui résonne sur l`île !
Sanji Zekkyou! Shimajuu ni Hibiku SOS
Sanji`s Scream! An SOS Echoes over the Island!
Sanjis Schrei! – Ein SOS, das über die ganze Insel hallt
Крик Саджи! Сигнал бедствия эхом разносится над островом!
صرخة سانجي! نداء استغاثة يدوّي في الجزيرة!
サンジ絶叫! 島中に響くSOS

REGULAR.description:
Robin bursts in to rescue Sanji along with Brook, and faces Black Maria, who is trying to keep Sanji as her pet. Meanwhile, Yamato, Momonosuke, and Shinobu are spotted hiding by the enemy, and they find themselves on the run again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Spank Sakuretsu! Sanji no Jonan!
Spank Strikes! Sanji`s Woman-trouble!
Spank explosif. Sanji et son mal des femmes !
Spank-Trommelfeuer! – Sanjis Frauenproblem!
Шлепок! От женщины Санджи одни беды!
هجمات صفع! مشاكل سانجي النّسويّة!
スパンク炸裂! サンジの女難!

REGULAR.description:
Chopper works hard to make the cure for Ice Oni, even though he is turning into one himself. Meanwhile, the infected Boss Hyogoro the Flower regains his youth and fights fiercely to protect Chopper and the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aucun regret ! Hyogoro et Luffy, maître et disciple
Keine Reue – Das Meister-Schüler-Band von Ruffy und dem Boss
Kui Nashi: Luffy to Oyabun Shitei no Kizuna
No Regrets! Luffy and Boss, a Master-Disciple Bond!
Без сожалений! Луффи и Босс, связь между учителем и учеником!
بلا ندم! لوفي والزّعيم، رابطة تلميذ ومعلّم!
悔いなし ルフィと親分師弟の絆

REGULAR.description:
Seeing everyone turning into Ice Oni, there is nothing that the samurai warriors can do other than grieve. However, it wasn’t just them who were devastated by Queen’s raging virus. When their desperation and frustration peak, they hear a hopeful voice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All Set! Chopperphage Nebulizer!
Junbi OK! Chopperphage Nebulizer
Préparatifs achevés. Chopperphage Nebulizer !
Vorbereitung abgeschlossen! – Chopperphage Nebulizer
Всё готово! Распылитель Чопперофага
كلّ شيء جاهز! مدفع ضباب تشوبّر الملتهِم!
準備OK! チョパファージ霧砲[ネブライザー]

REGULAR.description:
The wounded Akazaya members are surprised to see Kozuki Oden alive. They were disappointed by their failure to take down Kaido, but now with their lord, they are filled with hope to face their sworn enemy again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le retour d`Oden. Les Fourreaux rouges vacillent !
Oden Appears! The Confused Hearts of the Akazaya Members!
Oden Arawaru! Yureru Akazaya no Kokoro!
Oden betritt die Bühne! – Die verwirrten Herzen der Akazayas!
Появление Одена! Смятение в сердцах «Красных ножен»!
ظهور أودن! قلوب الأكازايا الحائرة!
おでん現る! 揺れる赤鞘の心!

REGULAR.description:
The Akazaya members run to save Momonosuke, but an unexpected contender stands in their way. Queen gets infuriated after Chopper ruined his plot and goes after him. Meanwhile, on the rooftop, Kaido and Big Mom unleashes a combination attack on Luffy and the others.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Schlimmste Generation wird vernichtet?! – Die Mördertechnik der Kaiser!
La fin de la génération terrible. Les Empereurs sortent le grand jeu !
Saiaku no Sedai Zenmetsu!? Yonkou no Oowaza!
The Worst Generation Gets Wiped Out?! The Emperors` Deadly Attack!
Худшее поколение уничтожено?! Смертельная атака Йонко!
هزيمة الجيل الأسوأ؟! هجوم اليونكو المميت!
最悪の世代全滅!? 四皇の大技!

REGULAR.description:
The returned Orochi clashes the Akazaya members who are trying to save Momonosuke. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others are all covered in bruises, but they unite their strength and launch an attack.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Choushinsei Hangeki! Yonkou Bunkai Sakusen
Gegenschlag der Supernovas! – Operation: Treibt die Kaiser auseinander
Les Supernovae contre-attaquent. Le plan de séparation des Empereurs !
The Supernovas Strike Back! The Mission to Tear Apart the Emperors!
Ответный удар Сверхновых! Разнести Йонко на части!
النّاشئون الخارقون يردّون الهجوم! مهمّة تفريق اليونكو
超新星反撃! 四皇分解作戦

REGULAR.description:
Even after Big Mom was pushed off of the island, Zoro and the others keep fighting the exhausting battle against Kaido. When Kaido tries to beat up the unconscious Luffy, Zoro launches an all-out attack at the risk of his life.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Defend Luffy! Zoro and Law`s Sword Technique!
Luffy o Mamore! Zoro to Law no Kengi
Protège Luffy. L’escrime de Zoro et Law !
Verteidigt Ruffy! – Zorro und Laws Schwerttechniken
Защитить Луффи! Техника владения мечом Зоро и Ло!
الدّفاع عن لوفي! تقنية سيف زورو ولو!
ルフィを守れ! ゾロとローの剣技

REGULAR.description:
Luffy remembers how he was advised by his friends, how he was saved by his comrades, and the frustrations of being defeated. As Kaido mocks him to his face, the Color of the Supreme King Haki gushes out and they clash again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Surclasser l`Empereur. Luffy ou le poing de la rébellion !
Surpass the Emperor of the Sea! Luffy Strikes Back with an Iron Fist!
Yonkou o Koero: Luffy Hangeki no Tekken
Übertriff den Kaiser – Ruffys Eisenfäuste holen zum Gegenschlag aus
Превзойти Йонко! Луффи наносит удар Железным Кулаком!
التّغلّب على اليونكو! يردّ لوفي الهجوم بقبضة حديديّة!
四皇を超えろ ルフィ反撃の鉄拳

REGULAR.description:
A young Luffy who has been dreaming about getting out of Windmill Village one day to accomplish something great meets a young girl named Uta who came along with Shanks and the Red-Hair Pirates calling herself the musician of the pirate group. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Faint Memory! Luffy and Red-Haired`s Daughter Uta!
Eiga Rendou Episode: Awai Kioku - Luffy to Akagami no Musume Uta
Flüchtige Erinnerungen – Ruffy und die Tochter von Rothaar, Uta
Vagues souvenirs. Luffy et Uta, la fille du Roux !
Смутное воспоминание! Луффи и дочь Красноволосого Ута!
ذكرى خافتة! لوفي وأوتا ابنة أحمر الشّعر!
映画連動エピソード 淡い記憶 ルフィと赤髪の娘ウタ

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Uta run across Windmill Village, compete with each other, and share their dreams with each other. They also pledge to build a new genesis for everyone to live happily. However, one day, the unexpected happens. 
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Pledge for the New Genesis! Luffy and Uta!
Der Schwur einer brandneuen Ära! – Ruffy und Uta
Eiga Rendou Episode: Shinjidai no Chikai! Luffy to Uta
Serment pour une nouvelle ère. Luffy et Uta !
Обещание новой эры! Луффи и Ута!
عهد للعصر الجديد! لوفي وأوتا
映画連動エピソード 新時代の誓い! ルフィとウタ

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Kaido who have both infused themselves with the Color of the Supreme King clash! Meanwhile, Nami, Usopp, and Tama are running from Page One to get to the Performance Floor, but they bump into another tough enemy, Big Mom.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Les hurlements de Nami. Course désespérée contre la mort !
Nami Screams - A Deadly Death Race!
Nami Zekkyou: Zettai Zetsumei Death Race!
Namis Schrei – Das lebensbedrohliche Death Race
Крик Нами! Смертельная гонка со смертью!
صرخات نامي، سباق هلاك مميت!
ナミ絶叫 絶体絶命デスレース!

REGULAR.description:
Kin’emon and the Akazaya members are rushing to help Momonosuke and everyone else while Yamato leaves Momonosuke and Shinobu in a hide-out to lure away their enemies. At the same time, Ulti tries to avenge her brother against Big Mom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Morgendämmerung von Wano-Land – Die gesamte Schlacht spitzt sich zu!
L`aube point sur Wano. De l`huile sur le feu de la guerre !
The Dawn of the Land of Wano - The All-Out Battle Heats Up!
Wano Kuni no Yoake: Zenmen Taiketsu Gekika!
Рассвет страны Вано! Разгорается тотальная битва!
فجر بلاد وانو، حمِيَ وطيس المعركة الشّاملة أكثر!
ワノ国の夜明け 全面対決激化!

REGULAR.description:
Sanji is forced to run with Zoro on his shoulder. Meanwhile, Nami bravely stands up against Ulti and Big Mom. On the rooftop, the intense battle between Luffy and Kaido finally comes to an end.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Entscheidung! – Ruffys beschleunigte Königshaki-Faust
Kecchaku! Luffy Kasoku Suru Haou no Kobushi
L`apothéose du combat. Le poing au fluide royal de Luffy !
The Conclusion! Luffy, Accelerating Fist of the Supreme King
Конец! Луффи, усиливающий кулак Королевским Хаки!
الخاتمة! لوفي، قبضة الملك الأسمى المتسارعة!
決着! ルフィ加速する覇王の拳[こぶし]

REGULAR.description:
Luffy is pushed off the rooftop by Kaido. Meanwhile, Zeus intervenes in a fight between Big Mom and Nami’s group and stands up for the one who he wants to save. On the Performance Floor, Chopper is in a fierce battle against Queen.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Haiboku! Mugiwara no Ichimi Kyuuchi!?
Luffy défait. Son équipage à la peine !
Luffy, Defeated! The Straw Hats in Jeopardy?!
Ruffys Niederlage! – Die Strohhüte in Gefahr?!
Луффи побеждён! Соломенные Шляпы в опасности?!
هُزم لوفي! طاقم قبّعة القشّ في خطر محدق؟!
ルフィ敗北! 麦わらの一味窮地!?

REGULAR.description:
While the Straw Hats and their allies are all having a hard time, they are shocked by the news that Luffy lost to Kaido. At the same time, Kanjuro closes in on Momonosuke to destroy the Kozuki lineage.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hyakujuu Juurin! Kouzuki-ke no Shuuen!
Les Cent Bêtes se déchaînent. La fin des Kozuki !
Niedergetrampelt von 100 Bestien! – Der Untergang des Kozuki-Klans!
The Animal Kingdom Pirates Trample Down! The End of the Kozuki Clan!
Растоптать Пиратов Зверей! Конец клана Кодзуки!
رهس قراصنة مملكة الحيوان! نهاية عشيرة كوزكي!
百獣蹂躙! 光月家の終焉!

REGULAR.description:
Like all the other samurai, Chopper is discouraged by the news of Luffy’s loss and Queen doesn’t miss the chance to finish him off! Meanwhile, Kin’emon fights for his life to save Momonosuke and that motivates Momonosuke to rise up!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fight Against the Dark Night - The Commander-in-Chief of the Land of Wano Sounds Off
Résistez dans la nuit noire. Le cri du généralissime de Wano !
Widerstand in finsterer Nacht – Der Oberbefehlshaber Wano-Lands ergreift das Wort
Yamiyo ni Aragae: Wano Kuni Soudaishou Hoeru
Борьба в темноте ночи! Слова главнокомандующего страны Вано!
قتالُ اللّيلة المظلمة، صرخة قائد قوّات وانو
闇夜に抗え ワノ国総大将吠える

REGULAR.description:
Momonosuke and Shinobu face Kaido while Kid and Law challenge Big Mom. Meanwhile, Nami, heading towards the stage on the Performance Floor along with Usopp and Tama, hears a strange voice.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Believe in Luffy! The Alliance`s Counterattack Begins!
Croyez en Luffy. La contre-attaque de l`alliance !
Glaubt an Ruffy! – Die Allianz holt zum Gegenschlag aus!
Luffy o Shinjiro! Doumei Hangeki Kaishi!
Верить в Луффи! Начало контратаки альянса!
ضعوا ثقتكم في لوفي! بداية هجوم التّحالف المضاد!
ルフィを信じろ! 同盟反撃開始!

REGULAR.description:
Nami strikes a thunder blast to clear the way to the stage on the Performance Floor. However, the elite corps of the Gifters shows up to crush their inferior opponents. Upset but unbroken, Otama stands up to give a command!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coup fatal de Nami. O-Tama tente le tout pour le tout !
Nami Hissatsu! Otama Kesshi no Ooichiban!
Nami`s Lethal Attack! Otama`s Desperate Challenge!
Namis vernichtender Schlag! – Otamas todesmutiger Entscheidungskampf!
Смертельная атака Нами! Отчаянный вызов О-Тамы!
هجوم نامي المميت! تحدّي أوتاما اليائس!
ナミ必殺! お玉決死の大一番!

REGULAR.description:
Hearing Otama’s command, the Gifters side with the samurai and upset the Tobi Roppo and others! Chopper starts to take care of Zoro while suffering from the side effect of the enhanced Rumble Ball. Meanwhile, Jimbei gets stunned by Who’s-Who’s story.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Dramatic Increase of Allies! Straw Hats Fight Back!
Mikata Gekizou! Mugiwara no Ichimi Gyakushuu!
Pléthore d`alliés. L`équipage du chapeau de paille riposte !
Starker Verbündetennachschub! – Die Strohhüte schlagen zurück!
Резкое увеличение союзников! Соломенные Шляпы дают отпор!
تزايد جذريّ في الحلفاء! يردّ طاقم قبّعة القشّ الهجوم!
味方激増! 麦わらの一味逆襲!

REGULAR.description:
Who’s-Who expresses fierce resentment toward Luffy and Jimbei fights back out of his loyalty to Luffy. As Who’s-Who asks Jimbei a question, he tramples on the dignity of the Fish-Men and that sparks Jimbei’s outrage.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Stolz eines Steuermanns – Der wutentbrannte Jinbei!
La fierté du timonier. Jinbe se fâche !
Soudashu no Hokori: Ikari no Jinbee!
The Pride of a Helmsman - The Enraged Jimbei!

To cut ties with Kaido, Yamato unleashes his true power. Meanwhile, Queen repeatedly attacks Sanji with his power as a cyborg, and Sasaki in his Man-Beast Form launches tricky attacks on Franky and drives him into a corner.
Source: Crunchyroll

Entscheidungskämpfe der Ungeheuer! – Yamato und Franky

Kaido tries to convince Yamato to become the Shogun of the Land of Wano and rule the country with the special power he obtained by accident. Meanwhile, Saul, Professor Clover, and Robin’s mother Olvia suddenly appear in front of her.
Source: crunchyroll

In the dense mist, Brook is surprised to see his old friends, the Rumbar Pirates and Laboon. They reminisce about the old days and play music together, however, they suddenly attack Brook.

titles.title: Akumu o Kiru: Brook no Koori no Battou!

REGULAR.description:
Black Maria torments Robin both physically and spiritually. As she burns in hellfire, Robin remembers the people who gave her a hard time and the people who supported her, and she as Demon Child shows what she is really capable of.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clutch! A Demon Incarnate, Robin!

REGULAR.description:
Killer is shocked to find out who Hawkins’ straw doll he slashed represents. Meanwhile, Sanji who is in a hard battle against Queen and King sees enemy brutes going after the injured Zoro, and no one else is there to save him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Spell! Kid and Zoro Facing Threats!
Der Bann! Gefahr im Verzug – Kid und Zorro!

Zoro gets back on his feet and along with Sanji, confronts King and Queen, the Lead Performers of the Animal Kingdom Pirates. Watching Zoro fight, Hyogoro and Kawamatsu remember someone from way back.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Alles oder nichts! – Die Hände des Kapitäns ziehen in die Schlacht!

انتهاز الفرصة! يدخل الجناحان ساحة المعركة!

REGULAR.description:
Dogstorm confronts his sworn enemy who destroyed his country. Meanwhile, Cat Viper faces Perospero who is responsible for Pedro’s death. At Tokage Port, Momonosuke roars with his determined eyes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ascend to the Dawn! A Pink Dragon Gets Agitated

Steig empor zur Morgendämmerung! – Der pinke Drache wütet herum

REGULAR.description:
The battle between Kaido and Yamato gets intense. Backed into a corner, Yamato remembers three great swordsmen who he met when he was a child. Their stunning choice for the future of the Land of Wano encourages Yamato.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Future! Yamato and the Great Swordsmen`s Pledge

REGULAR.description:
Luffy amps up the reluctant Momonosuke, who is afraid of heights, in his giant pink dragon form, to fly and take him to Onigashima in the sky. Meanwhile, Yamato, in a hard battle against Kaido, vows to survive until Luffy returns.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Hishou! Hyakujuu e no Revenge

REGULAR.description:
Momonosuke faces Kaido once again trembling in fear. However, with Luffy’s encouragement, he bravely steps up and shows his dragon fangs remembering what he had to go through because of Kaido.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel de dragons. La détermination de Momonosuké !

مواجهة تنّينين! عزيمة مومونوسكي!

REGULAR.description:
Asked to stop Onigashima by Luffy, Momonosuke once again gets cold feet, but this time, he has a reliable ally who can teach him how to fly. The clash between Luffy and Kaido shakes up the sky and enables Dogstorm and Cat Viper to exert all their strength.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Legend All Over Again! Luffy`s Fist Roars in the Sky
Densetsu no Sairai! Ten ni Todoroku Luffy no Kobushi

Retour légendaire. Le poing de Luffy ébranle les cieux !
Снова легенда! Кулак Луффи взмывает в небо!
تتكرّر الأسطورة ثانية! قبضة لوفي تزأر في السّماء!
伝説の再来! 天に轟くルフィの拳

REGULAR.description:
Realizing Onigashima’s impending threat, imperiling everyone’s life, Yamato and Momonosuke launch a secret operation. Meanwhile, Sanji and Zoro are both in a deadly battle against Queen and King.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Situation spitz sich zu! – Das Ende von Onigashima!
Fuun Kyuu o Tsugeru! Onigashima no Matsuro!
Situation critique. La fin d`Onigashima !

Напряжённая ситуация! Конец Онигасимы!

REGULAR.description:
Queen’s unforeseen move stuns everyone on the Performance Floor. And then, he goes on to utilize another special technique which can break every bone in Sanji’s body. On the verge of a crisis, Sanji feels something strange again.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le trouble de Sanji. Coup d`arrêt pour les ailes !

REGULAR.description:
Killer tries to figure out how to fight against Hawkins whose power enables him to transfer damage against him to Kid. Kid is dying not knowing where his damage is coming from. Killer takes a chance with Kid’s life on the line.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Aibou ni Shi o! Killer Kesshi no Oobakuchi

Sanji still wonders what is happening to his body as he receives attacks. Meanwhile, the dying Kin’emon hears an unexpected voice calling for the also dying Kanjuro. Through the Smail, the voice of Orochi tries to stir up Kanjuro to make him perform one last time.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shadowy Figure Pulls the Strings! Onigashima in Flames

Manœuvres en coulisse. Onigashima en flammes !

مناورات ظلال خفيّة! تلتهم النّيران أونيغاشيما!
闇の者の暗躍! 鬼ヶ島炎上

REGULAR.description:
Law and Kid are having a tough battle against a formidable Emperor of the Sea, Big Mom. However, when they decide to work collaboratively and use their awakened Devil Fruit powers, they see the possibility of taking down the old generation.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Countercharge! Law and Kid`s Return-Attack Combination
Gegenangriff! – Die Vergeltungsallianz von Law und Kid

La contre-attaque. Law et Kidd sonnent la révolte !
هجوم مضادّ! لو وكيد يردّان بهجوم متّحد!
逆襲! ローとキッドの反撃同盟

REGULAR.description:
Sanji is tormented by the idea of becoming a cruel Germa warrior like his siblings and torn between being strong or being humane as he is now. When he makes up his mind, he asks Zoro the ultimate favor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For Luffy - Sanji and Zoro`s Oath
Für Ruffy – Sanjis und Zorros Schwur

Pour Luffy. Le serment de Sanji et Zoro !
من أجل لوفي؟ قَسم سانجي وزورو

Kazenbo, the giant specter of fire symbolizing the burning wrath of the Kurozumi Clan, rampages through the castle creating panic among both the Animal Kingdom Pirates and the samurai. Orochi who is watching in excitement suddenly hears a sound that brings back memories.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Angriff des Kazenbos – Orochis teuflische Fänge kommen näher

REGULAR.description:
Zoro is facing a hard fight against King who seems invincible. Even one of Zoro’s deadliest attacks doesn’t leave a scratch on him. On top of that, one of Zoro’s swords goes out of control and gets in his way.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Gyakkyou no Zoro: Kaibutsu! Kasai no King

REGULAR.description:
Zoro still can’t gain control of Enma which keeps extracting his Haki. Backed into a corner by the formidable King, Zoro remembers the encounter with an old man in his hometown when he was a child.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Geheimnis von Enma! – Das verfluchte Schwert, das Zorro anvertraut wurde

سرّ إنما! السّيف الملعون الّذي عُهد به لزورو!

Queen’s formidable attacks remind Sanji of his family. Annoyed by Queen’s provocations, Sanji remembers a young woman mysteriously getting hurt in front of him and realizes what happened at that time, which lights a fire within him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Tritt des Dämonengottes! – Sanji vs. Queen
Majin no Ichigeki! Sanji vs Queen
The Strike of an Ifrit! Sanji vs. Queen
Un coup à l`ifrit. Sanji contre Queen !
هجوم عفريت! سانجي ضدّ كوين!
魔神の一撃! サンジVSクイーン

Zoro tries to figure out a way to damage King. Meanwhile, King remembers when he first met his captain Kaido and declares that his captain is the one to become the King of the Pirates, which leads Zoro to set his swords alight with hellfire.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Haki-Dreischwertstil! – Zorro vs. King
Haou no Santou Ryuu! Zoro vs King
Les trois sabres du roi. Zoro contre King !
The Three-Sword Style of the Supreme King! Zoro vs. King
أسلوب السّيوف الثّلاثة للملك الأسمى! زورو ضدّ كينغ!
覇王の三刀流! ゾロVSキング

Usopp finds Kin’emon’s upper body and the heavily wounded Kiku. However, they are surrounded by the Gifters and can’t find a way out. Seeing the samurai giving up hope, Usopp remembers his determination.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Is on the Move! A Turning Point to a New Era!
Luffy Yakudou! Shin Jidai no Bunkiten
Luffy d`attaque. À la croisée des ères !
Ruffy macht seinen Zug! – Der Scheideweg der neuen Ära!
لوفي يتحرّك! نقطة تحوّل لحقبة جديدة!
ルフィ躍動! 新時代の分岐点!

REGULAR.description:
In the Flower Capital, the Fire Festival is about to end. On Onigashima, the battle between Luffy and Kaido is getting even more intense. However, Kaido who is excited about having a strong opponent starts drinking too much.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Drunken Dragon Bagua! The Lawless Dragon Closing in on Luffy
L`ivresse du dragon divin. Luffy contre un adversaire intenable !
Schnapsdrache der acht Trigramme! – Der brutale Drache nimmt Ruffy aufs Korn

باغوا التّنّين الثّمل! يدنو التّنّين الجامح من لوفي!
酒龍八卦! ルフィに迫る無法の龍

REGULAR.description:
With the ongoing battles in various parts of Onigashima, everyone is reaching their limits. In the face of Big Mom, Law and Kid are exhausted and deeply wounded. Mocking them, Big Mom tries to head for the rooftop.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Vernichtung der Allianz?! – Der brennende Wille der neuen Generation!
Doumei Kaimetsu!? Moero Shin Sedai no Ishi!
La fin de l`alliance ? Que brûle la volonté de la relève !
The Destruction of the Alliance?! Fire Up, the Will of the New Generation!
دمار التّحالف؟! اشتعلي يا إرادة الجيل الأسوأ!
同盟壊滅!? 燃えろ新世代の意志!

REGULAR.description:
Big Mom’s strong life force discourages Law and Kid. Law tells Kid that he only has enough energy for one last strike. However, a monster Big Mom summons puts the two in even more of a bind.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clap de fin. La puissance de l`onde et du magnétisme !

Here Comes the Main Act! Powerful Techniques of Shockwave and Magnetism
Ootori Kitaru! Hadou to Jiki no Oowaza
سيبدأ العرض الرّئيسيّ! تقنيات قويّة للصّدمات والمغنطة!
大トリ来る! 波動と磁気の大技

REGULAR.description:
Kid’s all-out deadly attack and Law’s tactical action leave Big Mom in the lurch. Then she remembers what Roger said in the past and wonders if the treasure he mentioned is out there after all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auf zur neuen Ära! – Entscheidung! Die Entschlossenheit der Bengel
Le début d`une nouvelle ère. La détermination des avortons !
Shinjidai e! Kecchaku! Gakidomo no Kakugo
To the New Era! Settled! The Determination of the Brats
إلى العصر الجديد! النّتيجة! عزيمة الأشقياء!
新時代へ! 決着! ガキ共の覚悟

REGULAR.description:
Kaido mourns Big Mom’s defeat and remembers the day he met her for the first time. Meanwhile, backed into a corner, Orochi sees the true nature of Komurasaki, the woman he loves, and trembles with fear.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Echo der Mondprinzessin! – Die Endphase von Wano-Land!
L`écho de la Princesse de la Lune. Le pays de Wano bientôt libéré !
Moon Princess Echoes! The Final Phase of the Land of Wano!
Tsukihime ga Hibiku! Wano Kuni Saishuu Kyokumen!
صدى أميرة القمر! المرحلة الأخيرة لبلاد وانو!
月姫が響く! ワノ国最終局面!

REGULAR.description:
On orders from the Five Elders, the CP-0 agent Guernica tries to get to Luffy, but Drake stands in his way. Meanwhile, Luffy who only has very little energy left uses his last Gear Four to emancipate the people of the Land of Wano from Kaido.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Es kann nur einen Sieger geben – Ruffy vs. Kaido
Shousha wa Hitori: Luffy vs Kaidou
There Is Only One Winner - Luffy vs. Kaido
Un seul vainqueur. Luffy contre Kaido !
هناك منتصر واحد - لوفي ضدّ كايدو!
勝者はひとり ルフィVSカイドウ

REGULAR.description:
The battle between Luffy and Kaido comes to an unexpected end. Kaido comes down and tells everyone that Luffy has been defeated and the Land of Wano is finished. Momonosuke and Yamato argue over whether they should still continue fighting.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Haiboku!? Nokosareta Mono no Kakugo
Luffy Is Defeated?! The Determination of Those Left Behind
Luffy au tapis ? La détermination des survivants !
Ruffys Niederlage?! – Die Entschlossenheit der übrigen Leute
هُزم لوفي؟! عزيمة من بقوا في الخلف!
ルフィ敗北!? 残された者の覚悟

REGULAR.description:
As Luffy’s heart pounds in a funny way, the Five Elders reveal the secret behind the Gum-Gum Fruit. Meanwhile, Orochi tries to convince Komurasaki to escape with him, but when he sees Kanjuro, he makes a malicious decision.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`apogée de Luffy. L`éveil au Gear Fifth !
Luffy no Saikou Chiten: Toutatsu! "Gear 5"
Luffy`s Peak - Attained! Gear Five
Ruffys Maximum – "Gear 5" ist errecht
ذروة لوفي، الوصول للمستوى الخامس!
ルフィの最高地点 到達! "ギア5"

REGULAR.description:
Bouncing on the ground and becoming a giant, Luffy enjoys his new, bizarre power while Kaido is bewildered and can’t make sense of it. Meanwhile, Kid, Law, and Luffy’s other allies continue the fight down below against flames and enemies alike, waiting for Luffy to emerge victorious.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die absurde Fähigkeit! – Gear 5 kommt richtig in Fahrt
Fuzaketa Nouryoku! Yakudou Suru Gear 5
The Ridiculous Power! Gear Five in Full Play
Un pouvoir extravagant. Le Gear Fifth en pratique !
أكثر القوى سخافة! انطلاق المستوى الخامس!
ふざけた能力! 躍動するギア5

REGULAR.description:
Now the whole Onigashima is ablaze. Chopper reunites with Nami while Sanji and the others are each trying to escape from the flames. However, Raizo who harbors a great regret from his past stands up to the fire with the help of Jimbei.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kein Entkommen! – Die Hölle bildet sich auf Onigashima ab
Nigeba Nashi! Jigokuezu no Onigashima
No Way Out! A Hellish Scene on Onigashima
Nulle part où fuir. Onigashima, enfer à ciel ouvert !
لا مهرب! مشهد من الجحيم على أونيغاشيما!
逃げ場なし! 地獄絵図の鬼ヶ島

REGULAR.description:
Momonosuke struggles to create Flame Clouds to sustain Onigashima which is in free fall. In the Flower Capital, the Fire Festival is ending with people flying their Sky Boats in the air. To fulfill the promise to free the Land of Wano, Luffy inflates his fist to strike Kaido.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Confiance inébranlable en Momo. Le dernier coup fatal de Luffy !
I Trust Momo - Luffy`s Final Powerful Technique!
Ich vertraue Momo – Ruffys letzte Megatechnik!
Momo o Shinjiru: Luffy Saigo no Oowaza!
ثقة عمياء في مومو! هجوم لوفي الأخير!
モモを信じる ルフィ最後の大技!

REGULAR.description:
When Oden died 20 years ago, Orochi took over the Land of Wano. People were separated from their loved ones, forced into labor, and starved. Now they pray that Kaido will vanish as Luffy’s battle against him reaches a climax.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 20 Years` Worth of Prayers! Take Back the Land of Wano
Gebete über 20 Jahre hinweg! – Holt euch Wano-Land zurück
Nijuunen no Inori! Wano Kuni o Torimodose
Vingt ans de prières. Reprenez le pays de Wano !
عشرون سنة من الصّلوات! استعادة بلاد وانو!
二十年の祈り! ワノ国を取り戻せ

REGULAR.description:
Kaido remembers how he was treated unfairly in the past and how he believes the world should be. While his friends struggle to survive on Onigashima, Luffy is asked by Kaido to picture his ideal world as he throws a destructive punch.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Welt, die Ruffy anstrebt!
Le monde que veut Luffy
Luffy no Mezasu Sekai!
The World That Luffy Wants!
العالم الّذي يصبو له لوفي!
ルフィの目指す世界!

REGULAR.description:
The samurai and the Straw Hats shout for joy as they hear that Luffy defeated Kaido. Meanwhile, Momonosuke informs Zunesha of a major decision that he made. However, when Yamato calls on the Animal Kingdom Pirates to stop fighting, the earth trembles.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Baisser de rideau. Vainqueur, Luffy au chapeau de paille !
Der Vorhang fällt! – Der Sieger heißt Strohhut Ruffy!
Makuhiki! Shousha: Mugiwara no Luffy!
The Curtain Falls! The Winner, Straw Hat Luffy!
أسدل السّتار! المنتصر هو قبّعة القشّ لوفي!
幕引き! 勝者 麦わらのルフィ!

REGULAR.description:
The people of the Flower Capital get flustered when Kin’emon and the other Akazaya samurai who were supposed to be dead appear from the smoke. However, the last one who walks out of the smoke, and what he says, confuses the people even more.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: He Returns! The Shogun of the Land of Wano, Kozuki Momonosuke

عاد للبلاد! شوغن وانو، كوزكي مومونوسكي!

REGULAR.description:
The Land of Wano is in a celebratory mood now that the years of tyranny are over. However, Yamato is holding back his hunger alone until Hiyori arrives with the news he was waiting for. Meanwhile, some unknown figure approaches the Land of Wano.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Asa ga Kita! Luffy-tachi no Kyuusoku!
Der Morgen ist gekommen! – Ruhepause für Ruffy und seine Kameraden!
L`aube est venue. Repos mérité pour Luffy et les siens !
The Morning Comes! Luffy and the Others Rest!
بزغ الفجر! استراحة محارب استحقّها لوفي والبقيّة!
朝が来た! ルフィ達の休息!

REGULAR.description:
The news of the defeat of the Emperors of the Sea spreads across the world. Luffy enjoys the banquet but just as he is about to make a toast, an enraged Kid comes in to strike him. The reason behind his action surprises Luffy
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Celebration Banquet! The New Emperors of the Sea!
Ein feierliches Bankett! – Die neuen Kaiser der Meere!

Shukusai no Utage! Atarashiki Umi no Koutei-tachi!
مأدبة الاحتفال! اليونكو الجدد!
祝祭の宴! 新しき海の皇帝達!

REGULAR.description:
As the Navy Admiral Ryokugyu comes to strike the Flower Capital, the Akazaya samurai notice and try to stop him, but his Woods-Woods Fruit power overwhelms them. Meanwhile, another formidable, yet friendly, guest approaches the Land of Wano
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Welt wird brennen! – Ein Marine-Admiral greift an!
Le monde brûle. L`assaut de l`amiral de la Marine !
Sekai ga Moeru! Kaigun Taishou Shuurai!
The World Will Burn! The Onslaught of a Navy Admiral!
سيحترق العالم! هجوم أميرال البحريّة!
世界が燃える! 海軍大将襲来!

REGULAR.description:
Navy Admiral Ryokugyu keeps up a savage assault against the Akazaya samurai who are still recovering from the last battle. Momonosuke tries to defend the Land of Wano with all his might, but he gets driven into a corner.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Ankunft der neuen Ära! – Der Zorn des Rothaar-Kaisers
Nouvelle ère en approche. L`ire de l`Empereur roux !
Shinjidai Tourai! Akagami no Koutei no Ikari
The Coming of the New Era! The Red-Haired`s Imperial Rage
اقتراب حقبة جديدة! غضب اليونكو أحمر الشّعر!
新時代到来! 赤髪の皇帝の怒り

REGULAR.description:
Momonosuke and Hiyori are happy to see their grandfather who was supposed to be dead and the Straw Hats are surprised when Robin tells them about Pluton the Ancient Weapon. Meanwhile, Momonosuke is kept busy in his role as the new Shogun.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Welt in Bewegung! – Die neue Organisation Cross Guild
The World That Moves On! A New Organization, Cross Guild
Ugoku Sekai! Shin Soshiki Cross Guild
Un monde en mouvement. La création de la Cross Guild !
يشهد العالم تغيّرًا جديدًا - المنظّمة الجديدة كروس غيلد!

REGULAR.description:
An untold story from before the Straw Hats’ departure. Luffy visits the ruins of Oden Castle where Oden’s grave once was and Zoro visits Yasuie’s grave where he meets Hiyori. Later, Luffy and Tama eat red-bean soup together for the last time and share their feelings with each other.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tabidachi no Toki: Wano Kuni to Mugiwara no Ichimi
Time to Depart - The Land of Wano and the Straw Hats
Zeit, um in See zu stechen – Wano-Land und die Strohhüte
À l`heure du départ. Wano et l`équipage au chapeau de paille !
وقت المغادرة، بلاد وانو وطاقم قبّعة القش
旅立ちの時 ワノ国と麦わらの一味

REGULAR.description:
Angered by Luffy`s attempt to leave without saying goodbye, Momonosuke rushes with Kin’emon and Yamato to the port from where the Straw Hats are about to leave, thinking back on his days with Luffy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Vorhang fällt! – Ruffy und Momonosukes Schwur
Rideau. Le serment de Luffy et Momonosuké !
Shuumaku! Luffy to Momonosuke no Chikai
The Last Curtain! Luffy and Momonosuke`s Vow
أسدل السّتار! عهد لوفي ومومونوسكي!
終幕! ルフィとモモの助の誓い

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and the other Straw Hats’ new bounties are revealed. Meanwhile, at Emptee Bluffs Island,　Crocodile and the greatest swordsman in the world Mihawk, visit Buggy to discuss their newly-established organization, Cross Guild.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Emperor! Buggy the Genius Jester!
Ein neuer Kaiser! – Buggy, der 1000-Münzen-Clown!
Le nouvel Empereur. Baggy le Clown aux mille pièces !
Shin Koutei! Senryou Douke no Buggy!
اليونكو الجديد! المهرّج العبقريّ باغي!
新皇帝! 千両道化のバギー!

REGULAR.description:
Navy Captain Koby comes to the Island of Women to arrest Pirate Empress Hancock with the new Pacifistas. While the Navy and Kuja fighters clash, Blackbeard comes to raid, also targeting　Hancock.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chaos sur l`île des femmes. L`affaire du héros Kobby !
Nyougashima no Ran! Eiyuu Koby no Ikken
The War on the Island of Women! A Case Involving Koby the Hero
Tumult auf der Insel der Frauen! – Der Vorfall um den Helden Corby
الحرب على جزيرة النّساء! قضيّة تتعلّق بالبطل كوبي!
女ヶ島の乱! 英雄コビーの一件

REGULAR.description:
The three-way struggle between the Navy, the Blackbeard Pirates, and the Kuja Pirates comes to an end when an unexpected figure shows up. On the Sunny, the Straw Hats talk about the recent incidents around the world and Luffy’s words surprise everyone.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Luffy no Yume"
"ルフィの夢"
Le rêve de Luffy
Luffy`s Dream
Ruffys Traum
حلم لوفي

REGULAR.description:
Sabo, the Chief of Staff of the Revolutionary Army, contacts Koala and everyone in Kamabakka Queendom. He explains to them about the things that he is accused of, but someone who was eavesdropping on the call takes a stunning action.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Beginn eines neuen Kapitels! – Ruffys und Sabos Pfade!
Entering a New Chapter! Luffy and Sabo`s Paths!
Shinshou Totsunyuu! Luffy to Sabo no Shinro!
Une nouvelle saga commence. Le cap de Luffy et Sabo !
بداية فصل جديد! دروب لوفي وسابو!
新章突入! ルフィとサボの針路!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Chopper fall into the rough cold sea along with the mysterious girl. Jimbei tries to help them but another attack comes from the unknown creature. Meanwhile, the Sunny is hit by torpedoes and the rest of the Straw Hats are thrown into the sea, too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Island! Future Island Egghead
Atarashii Shima! Miraijima Egghead
Eine neue Insel! – Egghead, die Zukunftsinsel
Une nouvelle île. Egghead, l`île futuriste !
جزيرة جديدة! جزيرة المستقبل إيغهيد!
新しい島! 未来島エッグヘッド

REGULAR.description:
Luffy and Chopper fall into the rough cold sea along with the mysterious girl. Jimbei tries to help them but another attack comes from the unknown creature. Meanwhile, the Sunny is hit by torpedoes and the rest of the Straw Hats are thrown into the sea, too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Brimming with the Future! An Adventure on the Island of Science!
Mirai Mansai! Kagaku no Kuni no Bouken!
Un futur exaltant. Voyage au pays de la science !
Zukunft, so weit das Auge reicht! – Abenteuer im Wissenschaftsreich!
مستقبل ناضح! مغامرة في جزيرة العلوم!
未来満載! 科学の国の冒険!

REGULAR.description:
While Luffy and the others are enjoying the futuristic machines of Egghead, someone who resembles Bartholomew Kuma comes after them. When Luffy tries to fight back, Bonney stops him and reveals her shocking relationship with Kuma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bonney no Doukoku! Miraijima ni Hisomu Yami
Bonney`s Lamentation! Darkness Lurking on the Future Island
Bonneys Tränenausbruch! – Finsternis verbirgt sich auf der Zukunftsinsel

فاجعة بوني! الجزء المظلم من جزيرة المستقبل!
ボニーの慟哭! 未来島に潜む闇

REGULAR.description:
The Blackbeard Pirates ambushed the Heart Pirates led by Law. The Blackbeard Pirates’ top officers use a variety of formidable Devil Fruit powers and keep pushing the Heart Pirates in order to obtain the copies of the Road Ponegliffs.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Gewinner kriegt alles! – Law vs. Blackbeard!
Le gagnant remporte la mise. Law contre Barbe Noire !
Shousha Soudori! Law vs Kurohige!
The Winner Takes All! Law vs. Blackbeard!

勝者総取り! ローVS 黒ひげ!

REGULAR.description:
The Straw Hats without Luffy, Chopper, and Jimbei are taken to the laboratory on the clouds far above the ground by Lilith. They get excited about the things they`ve never seen before. However, inside the laboratory, a new threat is waiting for them.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Mysterium vertieft sich! – Egghead Labophase
Fukamaru Nazo! Egghead Labophase
Le mystère s`épaissit. L`étage du laboratoire d`Egghead !

يتعمّق الغموض أكثر! طابق مختبر إيغهيد!
深まる謎! エッグヘッド研究層[ラボフェーズ]

REGULAR.description:
Nami and the others are attacked by a Pacifista who resembles Jimbei and while they’re in battle, some of Vegapunk’s Satellites look on with excitement. Meanwhile, Luffy and the others find something extraordinary at the scrap heap.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Verstand eines Genies – Die sechs Vegapunks!

Tensai no Zunou: Rokunin no Vegapunk!
The Brain of a Genius - Six Vegapunks!

REGULAR.description:
Vegapunk Shaka shares with Robin and the others his theory about an ancient kingdom and the 100-Year Void. He even says that he visited Ohara after its destruction. Meanwhile, Luffy and Chopper try to activate the giant robot and something surprising happens.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Forbidden Piece of History! A Theory Concerning a Kingdom
Die verbotene Geschichte! – Eine Hypothese über ein gewisses Königreich

L`histoire censurée. La thèse d`un royaume oublié !
جزء محرّم من التّاريخ! نظريّة عن مملكة معيّنة!

REGULAR.description:
Shaka reveals the secret behind the foundation of the Revolutionary Army and how the relationship between Vegapunk and Dragon affected it. Meanwhile, Vegapunk explains to Luffy and the others about his special power and how his clones work.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Wille Oharas! – Die übernommene Forschung
La volonté d`Ohara. Recherches en héritage !
Ohara no Ishi! Uketsugareru Kenkyuu
The Will of Ohara! The Inherited Research
إرادة أوهارا! البحث المتوارث!
オハラの意志! 受け継がれる研究

REGULAR.description:
Vegapunk reveals the shocking history of the ancient giant robot and asks Luffy to take him off Egghead. Rob Lucci and his fellow Cipher Pol agents arrive at the island and ask for permission to enter the port.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Eine originelle Idee! – Der Traum eines Genies!
Kisoutengai! Tensai ga Omoi Egaku Yume!
The Eccentric Dream of a Genius!
Un rêve hors du commun. L`avenir idéal vu par un génie !
حلمُ العبقريّ غريب الأطوار!
奇想天外! 天才が想い描く夢!

REGULAR.description:
CP-0 led by Rob Lucci makes a forced landing at Egghead and people on the Fabriophase are plunged into confusion while Shaka and the others prepare to fight back on the Labophase. The enraged Atlas stands up to defend the peace of the island.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Envoyez le comité d`accueil. Rob Lucci attaque !
Geigeki Junbi! Rob Lucci Shuurai!
Preparations for Interception! Rob Lucci Strikes!
Vorbereitung zum Gegenangriff! – Rob Lucci schlägt zu!
الاستعداد للاعتراض! هجوم روب لوتشي!
迎撃準備! ロブ・ルッチ襲来!

REGULAR.description:
Luffy transforms into the Warrior of Liberation as Rob Lucci also shows his awakened Devil Fruit form. As the two clash, Vegapunk reveals the shocking truth of the Gum-Gum Fruit and his eye-opening theory on Devil Fruits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ijigen no Chikara! Luffy vs Lucci!
Kräfte auf anderem Niveau! – Ruffy vs. Lucci!
Pouvoir d`une autre dimension. Luffy contre Lucci !
Powers on a Different Level! Luffy vs. Lucci!
قوى من مستوى مختلف! لوفي ضدّ لوتشي
異次元の力! ルフィVSルッチ!

REGULAR.description:
Vegapunk describes how he managed to grant the Seraphim Devil Fruit powers, which surprises Franky and the others. Meanwhile, Luffy is still facing Lucci in his savage, awakened form, but the rocket to the Labophase is about to leave.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Au sommet du genre humain. La puissance des Séraphins !
Die stärksten Geschöpfe der Menschheit! – Die Macht der Seraphim!

The Strongest Form of Humanity! The Seraphim`s Powers!

最強の人類! セラフィムの能力!

REGULAR.description:
Vegapunk asks the Straw Hats to take him on board their ship which makes Franky and Usopp happy but annoys Nami. Lucci orders his troops to block off all Vegapunk’s escape routes and looks to invade the heavily-secured Labophase.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Schlängelnde Verschwörungen! – Die Operation zur Flucht von Egghead
Sinister Schemes! The Operation to Escape Egghead
Ugomeku Inbou! Egghead Dasshutsu Sakusen
Un complot ourdi dans l`ombre. Opération Évasion d`Egghead !
مكائد شرّيرة! عمليّة الهروب من إيغهيد!
蠢く陰謀! エッグヘッド脱出作戦

REGULAR.description:
CP-0 enters the Labophase and starts attacking the Thousand Sunny as soon as they find it. Luffy reunites with Nami and the others but finds out that Vegapunk is missing. Meanwhile, Bonney is pressing Vegapunk to change back her father Kuma.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chichi o Modose! Hakanaki Bonney no Negai!
Rends-moi mon père. Le rêve éphémère de Bonney !
Turn Back My Father! Bonney`s Futile Wish!
Verwandle meinen Vater zurück! – Bonneys vergeblicher Wunsch!
أعد إليّ أبي! أمنية بوني العقيمة!
父を戻せ! 儚きボニーの願い!

REGULAR.description:
The Seraphim come following CP-0 to the Labophase, pitting Zoro and Brook against the seven of them. Sanji, Franky, Edison, and Lilith leave the lab to fight them, but the Seraphim launch a full-scale attack on the lab.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Desperate Situation! The Seraphim`s All-out Attack!
Pure Verzweiflung! – Der Großangriff der Seraphim!
Situation désespérée. L`attaque générale des Séraphins !
Zettai Zetsumei! Seraphim Soukougeki!
وضع يائس! هجوم السّيرافيم الشّامل
絶体絶命! セラフィム総攻撃!

REGULAR.description:
Stussy suddenly knocked out Lucci to the Straw Hats’ surprise, and when Shaka reveals her true identity, they’re stunned again. Meanwhile, a major incident occurs on an island called Sphinx where Whitebeard came from.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Beautiful Act of Treason! The Spy, Stussy!
Une trahison pleine de grâce. Stussy l`agent double !
Uruwashiki Hangyaku! Naitsuusha Stussy
Wunderschöner Verrat! – Stussy, der Maulwurf!
سبب الخيانة الجميل! ستوسي الجاسوسة!
華麗的反叛 臥底絲媞希
麗しき反逆! 内通者ステューシー

REGULAR.description:
CP-0 takes control of the Fabriophase but gets attacked by an unknown force. Meanwhile, in the Labophase, the Straw Hats and Dr. Vegapunk’s Satellites find out that Vegapunk has disappeared and begin searching for him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein ungewöhnlicher Vorfall! – Sucht Dr. Vegapunk!
Ijou Hassei! Sagase! Dr. Vegapunk
Problème à signaler. Trouvez le Dr Végapunk !
Trouble Occurs! Seek Dr. Vegapunk!
وتستمرّ المشاكل! البحث عن الدّكتور فيغابانك!
異常発生! 探せ! Dr.ベガパンク

REGULAR.description:
Bonney witnesses her father Bartholomew Kuma’s painful memories. Meanwhile at the lab, Shaka notices that their communications and surveillance cameras are being cut off by somebody.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Shudder! The Evil Hand Creeping Up on the Laboratory
Frissons d`horreur. Le mal s`infiltre au laboratoire !
Schauder! – Die im Labor heranschleichende Teufelshand
Senritsu! Kenkyuujo e Shinobiyoru Ma no Te
قشعريرة! تدنو اليد الشّرّيرة من المختبر!
戦慄! 研究所へ忍び寄る魔の手

REGULAR.description:
The Seraphim suddenly start attacking the Straw Hats and the Vegapunk Satellites. They are not stopping even when the Satellites order them to. When Luffy and Zoro are cornered, Lucci and Kaku wake up and make them a surprising offer.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Incomprehensible! The Seraphim`s Rebellion!
Inconcevable. La rébellion des Séraphins !
Rikai Funou! Seraphim no Hangyaku!
Unbegreiflich! – Die Rebellion der Seraphim!
وضع يصعب فهمه! تمرّد السّيرافيم!
理解不能! セラフィムの反逆!

REGULAR.description:
Lucci and Kaku from CP0, who came to Egghead with a mission to eliminate the seven Vegapunks, ask Luffy and Zoro to uncuff them so they can fight alongside them against the Seraphim, but Luffy and Zoro are reluctant to do so.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Tough Decision! An Unusual United Front!
Décision difficile. Une équipée bien baroque !
Eine bittere Entscheidung! – Eine einzigartige gemeinsame Front!
Kujuu no Ketsudan! Ishoku no Kyoutou Sensen!
قرار صعب! جبهة متحالفة غير اعتياديّة!
苦渋の決断! 異色の共闘戦線!

REGULAR.description:
The Straw Hats and CP0 relentlessly attack the Seraphim, but the Seraphim keep getting back up. Then, Zoro notices that the Seraphim remind him of someone who he fought before. Meanwhile, Shaka goes to check one place where he thinks Vegapunk Stella might be.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikinokore! Saikyou no Jinrui to no Shitou
Pour survivre. Combat acharné contre les surhommes !
Survive! Deadly Combat with the Strongest Form of Humanity!
Übertlebt! – Todeskampf gegen die Stärksten der Menschheit
النّجاة! معركة مميتة ضدّ أقوى أشكال البشريّة!
生き残れ! 最強の人類との死闘

REGULAR.description:
Stussy and Sentomaru discuss how big the threat that closes in on Egghead is as Luffy and the others keep fighting the uncontrollable Seraphim. Meanwhile, in an underground lab, someone approaches Vegapunk, who is being held captive.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Wiederkunft Oharas! – Die Ambitionen des Drahtziehers!
Ohara no Sairai! Kuromaku no Yabou!
The Second Ohara! The Mastermind`s Ambition!
Une nouvelle Ohara. Un complot ourdi par ambition !
أوهارا الثّانية! طموح العقل المدبّر!
オハラの再来! 黒幕の野望!

REGULAR.description:
Kid gives his crew a pep talk before the battle with Shanks. Shanks also prepares for the battle, but learns how his own subordinates do as they like to protect their beloved boss. Finally, Kid has his Damned Punk ready to shoot.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Clash! Shanks vs. Eustass Kid
Duel au sommet. Shanks contre Eustass Kidd !
Gekitotsu! Shanks vs Eustass Kid
Zusammenprall! – Shanks vs. Eustass Kid
صِدام! شانكس ضدّ يوستاس كيد!
激突! シャンクスVSユースタス・キッド

REGULAR.description:
Held at the Pirate Island of Beehive, Koby gets a chance to be free but decides to become a decoy to liberate slaves on the island. Pirates from all over the island come after him because of the big bounty on his head.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Cours, Kobby. L`évasion ou la mort !
Hashire Koby! Kesshi no Dasshutsu Sakusen!
Renn, Corby! – Eine verzweifelte Strategie zur Flucht!
Run, Koby! A Desperate Escape Strategy!
اركض يا كوبي! خطّة هروب يائسة!
走れコビー! 決死の脱出作戦!

REGULAR.description:
A massive warship comes flying towards the Pirate Island of Beehive and Vice Admiral Garp launches a crushing attack on top of it to save his pupil Koby. Koby almost reaches the ship with Navy HQ Commander Hibari running by his side.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: For the Beloved Pupil - The Fist of Vice Admiral Garp!
Für den lieben Schüler – Die Faust von Vizeadmiral Garp!
Manadeshi no Tame: Garp Chuujou no Genkotsu!
Pour son disciple favori. Les poings du vice-amiral Garp !
من أجل تلميذي العزيز! قبضة نائب الأميرال غارب!
愛弟子のため ガープ中将の拳骨!

REGULAR.description:
Kuzan, a former Navy Admiral, stands in the way of Garp who came to rescue Koby. He was once Garp’s pupil but is now a member of the Blackbeard Pirates. What happened to him after he was defeated by Sakazuki is now revealed.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein Schock für die Marine! – Ex-Admiral vom Marine-Hauptquartier Kuzan
Kaigun Kyougaku! Moto Kaigun Honbu Taishou Kuzan
La stupéfaction de la Marine. Kuzan, l`ancien amiral !
The Navy Surprised! The Navy Headquarters` Former Admiral, Kuzan
البحريّة في حالة ذهول! الأميرال السّابق في مقّر البحريّة، كوزان!
海軍驚愕! 元海軍本部大将クザン

REGULAR.description:
Sengoku, the former Admiral of the Fleet, and Great Adviser Tsuru discuss the murder of Vice Admiral T-Bone and concerns about Cross Guild. Meanwhile, Buggy gives a passionate speech to Crocodile, Mihawk, and his crew.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Let`s Go Get It! Buggy`s Big Declaration
Notre heure est venue. La déclaration de Baggy !
Schnappen wir es uns! – Buggys große Ansage
Tori ni Ikouze! Buggy no Dai Sengen
لنسعَ خلفه! إعلان باغي الضّخم!
取りに行こうぜ! バギーの大宣言

REGULAR.description:
Sabo returns to Kamabakka Queendom and starts recounting what happened at the Holy Land Mary Geoise. A month ago, during the Reverie, he and the captains of the Revolutionary Army raided the Land of Gods and Sabo witnessed Bartholomew Kuma being the Celestial Dragons’ slave.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le retour de Sabo. La terrible vérité enfin révélée !
Sabo Returns - The Shocking Truth to Be Told!

SPECIAL.description:
After two years of training, the Straw Hats reunited at Sabaody Archipelago. Getting past the Fish-Man Island, they finally made it to the final sea – the New World. At Punk Hazard Island, they met Trafalgar Law again by accident who suggested them to form a “pirate alliance” with him in order to take down the Four Emperors, which they accepted, and together with Law, they went for Doflamingo who is connected to the Four Emperors. They entered Dressrosa, the country Doflamingo reigns over, and got into action according to Law’s instruction but Luffy suddenly decided to enter a competition which prize was his late brother Ace’s Flare-Flare Fruit under the name Lucy, and made it to the final. Meanwhile, Law fell for Doflamingo’s trap and got captured. At the same time, the Straw Hats learned the “darkness” of the country from a toy soldier who they met on their way. Becoming furious about Doflamingo’s dirty trick, they joined the Little People to fight to take back freedom. Luffy was competing in the Colosseum but to rescue Law, he was trying to get out of there and that’s when Sabo who he thought was dead, showed up…
Source: crunchyroll

SPECIAL.description:
Adventure of Nebulandia is a TV special of the One Piece anime.
The special has the Straw Hat Pirates fight Foxy again in the New World, on Mushroom Island. This soon gives way to a battle against the Marines on an island called Nebulandia that can nullify Devil Fruit powers.

One Piece: Adventure of Nebulandia
One Piece: Adventure of Nebulandia
ワンピース ~アドベンチャー オブ ネブランディア~

SPECIAL.description:
While Exploring the New World, Luffy and the members of the Straw Hats meets a mysterious girl named Olga. She is pretty on the outside but twisted and savage inside and she told them she is chased by the Navy and a powerful treasure hunter named Mad Treasure. The reason she is targeted is because she was from Alchemi, an island of steel which suddenly disappeared two centuries ago. Rumor has it that the metal called the Pure Gold that was created on the island is worth a fortune – that you can even buy the whole world with it. Thus, people have been seeking it from long ago. Olga managed to escape from Alchemi by accident but was caught by the Navy, and the Navy Headquarters and Mad Treasure who is working on orders from Guild Tesoro, the lord of the underground community, came to notice that there was a remaining survivor from Alchemi. Being pushed around by the cranky Olga, Luffy decides to hunt for the treasure that everybody wants. And the mysterious girl Olga is looking to make a lot of money using Luffy and the others. The members of the Straw Hats are excited about hunting the never-seen-before treasure. Will they be able to get the legendary treasure, Pure Gold, while having the formidable treasure hunter as their opponent?
Source: crunchyroll

ワンピース ハートオブゴールド

SPECIAL.description:
The words that Gold Roger, the King of the Pirates, uttered just before his death excited the masses and the world has entered a Great Pirate Era! There is a group of young pirates who are about to set sail on the Grand Line. Monkey D. Luffy, a rubber man. Roronoa Zoro aka “Pirate Hunter.” Usopp, a sniper. Sanji, a seafaring cook. And “Cat Burglar” Nami. They, the Straw Hats, all place a foot upon a barrel and make their vows before their next journey across the great ocean. Luffy shouts “In order to be the King of the Pirates!”
A decade ago in the Windmill Village...
A little boy Luffy was enthralled with a pirate boss Red-Haired Shanks. But a group of mountain bandits shows up and makes fun of the pirates. “Why didn`t you fight them?!” Luffy yells out angrily but Shanks says that it`s nothing worth getting mad over. At that time, Luffy snatches the Gum-Gum Fruit from a treasure box and eats it and as a result, his entire body becomes rubber and he loses the ability to swim for the rest of his life!
A few days later, Luffy is surrounded by the mountain bandits again and Shanks comes to help. “No matter what the reason, anyone who hurts my friends has to pay!!”
Shanks and his pirate crew are incredibly strong and they beat down the mountain bandits. Higuma, the head of the mountain bandits, runs away kidnapping Luffy and heads for the sea. However, they encounter a local Sea Monster there and are attacked. Luffy is in a desperate situation... But again, Shanks saves the day. He outstares the Sea Monster and chases it away but in exchange, he loses his left arm...
When Shanks leaves the village, he leaves his straw hat with Luffy.
“Come bring it back to me someday! Once you`ve become a great pirate!”
10 years later, Luffy has grown up strong and he sets out for an adventure on a small boat. He again encounters the local Sea Monster for that fateful day. However, Luffy takes it down with a single blow of Gum-Gum Pistol. Luffy’s journey to become the King of the Pirates now begins!
Source: crunchyroll
